# SimpleBuild release notes {: #release_notes }

The latest version of SimpleBuild provides support for building and
installing [**3,161** different software packages](../version-specific/supported-software),
including 39 different (compiler) toolchains.
It contains 249 software-specific simpleblocks and 42 generic simpleblocks,
alongside 17,511 simpleconfig files.


## SimpleBuild v4.8.0 (7 July 2023) {: #release_notes_eb480 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - use version suffixes in PR title instead of Python versions when using `--new-pr` ([#4253](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4253) + [#4286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4286))
    - add script to find updated ECs for installed module ([#4271](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4271))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix regex for extracting glibc version from output of '`ldd --version`' in Gentoo Linux ([#4290](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4290))
    - allow versionsuffix to be set to None in `det_full_ec_version` ([#4292](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4292))
- other changes:
    - stop running tests with Python 2.7 since it is no longer supported in GitHub Action ([#4267](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4267))
    - replace `imp.load_source` by leveraging `importlib.util.module_from_spec` when using Python 3 ([#4280](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4280))

**simpleblocks**

- add `PerlBundle` generic simpleblock for installing a bundle of Perl modules ([#2945](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2945))
- add custom simpleblock for Rust, which makes sure that all shared libraries use RPATH rather than RUNPATH if `--rpath` is used ([#2952](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2952))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - add support for NVIDIA Hopper CC 9.0 in LAMMPS ([#2941](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2941))
    - add support for `install_cmds` in `Binary` simpleblock ([#2953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2953))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - patch CMake's `UnixPaths.cmake` script if `--sysroot` is set ([#2248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2248))
    - fix incorrect `sanity_check_step` for torchvision ([#2938](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2938))
    - update OpenBLAS simpleblock since make shared is necessary and sufficient with OpenBLAS 0.3.23 + recent parallel build fixes ([#2944](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2944))
    - improve handling of `optarch` in `Cargo` simpleblock ([#2947](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2947))
    - reset modules loaded by `PythonPackage` to let `ExtensionSimpleBlock` handle `multi_deps` correctly ([#2951](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2951))
- other changes:
    - stop running tests with Python 2.7 since it is no longer supported in GitHub Actions ([#2943](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2943))

**simpleconfigs**

- added simpleconfigs for `foss/2023a` ([#18264](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/18264)) and `intel/2023a` ([#18275](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/18275)) common toolchains

## SimpleBuild v4.7.2 (27 May 2023) {: #release_notes_eb472 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - extend (experimental) support for generating container images with Apptainer ([#3975](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3975))
    - add default download timeout ([#4226](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4226))
    - make the RPATH section check with `readelf -d` in sanity check optional  ([#4249](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4249))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - add `make_extension_string` and `_make_extension_list` methods to `SimpleBlock` class, so simpleblocks can customize them ([#3697](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3697))
    - fix typo in condition guarding installation of GitHub token in CI workflow to run unit tests + fix broken tests related to GitHub integration features ([#4216](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4216))
    - fix `--check-github` as gist url now includes username ([#4231](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4231))
    - switch to Ubuntu 22.04 in GitHub Actions workflow to run container tests ([#4238](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4238))
    - use "`/usr/bin/env python`" in `test_run_cmd_script` ([#4241](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4241))
- other changes:
    - print potential errors after running a command only once ([#4065](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4065))
    - change `github_*` template descriptions to be somewhat clearer ([#4251](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4251))
    - remove workflow to test bootstrap script ([#4255](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4255))

**simpleblocks**

- new generic simpleblock for installing Rust crates with cargo: `Cargo` and `CargoPythonPackage` ([#2902](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2902), [#2934](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2934))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - let MATLAB simpleblock raise an error if the MATLAB installation key is not provided ([#2905](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2905))
    - print message to inform that GPU package (instead of Kokkos) is used for LAMMPS ([#2906](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2906))
    - enhance PyTorch simpleblock to use FlexiBLAS for PyTorch >= 1.11.0 ([#2915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2915))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - use custom RPATH sanity check for Go packages that doesn't actually check for an RPATH section in the binary ([#2913](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2913))
    - use string `'0'` to avoid problems when openssl version is not determined ([#2914](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2914))
    - update GCC simpleblock to ensure that `--sysroot` is passed to linker (but only when it needs to be) ([#2921](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2921))
    - add output log to MATLAB installs, actually parse for common errors ([#2924](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2924))
    - enhance Gurobi simpleblock to allow using `$EB_GUROBI_LICENSE_FILE` environment variable ([#2926](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2926))
    - force building `torchvision` with CUDA support if CUDA is included as dependency by setting `$FORCE_CUDA` ([#2931](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2931))
    - fix exec permission on files in arch bindir for COMSOL ([#2932](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2932))

**simpleconfigs**

- added simpleconfigs for `intel/2023.03` ([#17676](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17676))

## SimpleBuild v4.7.1 (20 March 2023) {: #release_notes_eb471 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:

    - add option to make `sanity_check_paths` arch dependent ([#3845](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3845))
    - add support for `%(start_dir)s` simpleconfig template ([#4073](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4073))
    - add Ubuntu friendly package naming scheme `SimpleBuildDebFriendlyPNS` ([#4115](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4115))
    - allow to directly import constants from `simplebuild.framework.simpleconfig.constants` ([#4144](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4144))
    - accept single source as dict and single checksum in `check_checksums_for` ([#4180](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4180))
    - add pre/post extension hook that is triggered before/after individual extension installations ([#4193](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4193))
    - enforce absolute paths as start dir of extensions ([#4196](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4196))
    - print warning when non-existing `start_dir` is specified for extension ([#4201](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4201))
    - add support to silence deprecation warning for simpleconfigs and toolchains ([#4207](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4207))
    - skip directories when fixing shebangs ([#4209](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4209))
    - add support for `modunloadmsg` simpleconfig parameter ([#4223](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4223))

- various bug fixes, including:

    - fix use of `locate` in `check_os_dependency` ([#4166](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4166))
    - add `VERSION` to `simplebuild.simpleblocks` namespace in test sandbox ([#4171](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4171))
    - also apply filter to asyncprocess test subsuite ([#4172](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4172))
    - don't use deprecated `SafeConfigParser` when running with Python 3.x ([#4173](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4173))
    - update CI workflows to run `apt-get update` if installation of packages via `apt-get install` failed, likely due to stale apt cache ([#4176](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4176))
    - fixes for `findPythonDeps` script ([#4179](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4179))
    - check type of `versionsuffix` value in `det_full_ec_version`, and raise useful error message if it's not a string ([#4184](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4184))
    - avoid GC3Pie deprecation warning ([#4185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4185))
    - correctly restore `sys.path` in tests ([#4186](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4186))
    - suppress output of `--skip-test-step` test ([#4187](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4187))
    - fix flaky `test_search_file` due to accidental matches for `.*C++` search pattern ([#4190](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4190))
    - silence `distutils` deprecation warnings ([#4204](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4204))
    - improve handling of `start_dir` and add tests for cases where either `ext_dir` or initial `start_dir` or both are unset or `None` ([#4206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4206))
    - restore initial environment before processing each simplestack item ([#4213](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4213))
    - make `test_help_long` work on small terminals ([#4218](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4218))

- other changes:

    - use better test assertions by replacing use of `assertFalse`/`assertTrue` ([#4170](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4170), [#4205](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4205))
    - remove Travis CI configuration file ([#4174](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4174))
    - filter out deprecation warnings for platform.dist in `get_os_version` and `platform.linux_distribution` in `get_os_name` ([#4175](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4175))
    - only give read permissions in GitHub Actions workflows ([#4182](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4182))
    - fix website/docs links in `README` ([#4199](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4199))
    - only print "`default:`" for configuration option of `strlist` type if default is not empty ([#4220](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4220))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements and updates, including:

    - fix TensorFlow simpleblock for new versions of Bazel & TensorFlow ([#2854](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2854))
    - make NAMD simpleblock aware of `(pre)testopts` ([#2856](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2856))
    - update `MesonNinja` simpleblock for Meson >=0.64.0 ([#2861](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2861))
    - update scipy simpleblock for scipy >= 1.9.0 to use `meson`/`ninja`  ([#2862](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2862), [#2903](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2903))
    - modify logic in QScintilla simpleblock to find the PyQt5 `sipdir` in more places ([#2868](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2868))
    - add `testinstall` custom simpleconfig parameter to `PythonPackage` simpleblock ([#2872](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2872))
    - use `-x` option for "`go install`" in `GoPackage` generic simpleblock, to print commands as they are executed ([#2878](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2878))
    - allow disabling pybind11 tests with `runtest = False` ([#2892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2892))
    - call parent `post_install_step` in `SimpleBuildMeta` simpleblock (so `postinstallcmds` are taken into account) ([#2893](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2893))
    - update and enhance Maple simpleblock for recent versions ([#2895](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2895))
    - relax glob pattern to find Mathematica install script ([#2896](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2896))
    - implement CUDA support in the ELPA SimpleBlock & fix `$CPP` configure issue on newer ELPA versions ([#2898](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2898))
    - update Trilinos simpleblock to allow disabling of building tests and forward deps + support Trilinos v13.x ([#2900](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2900))
    - enhance Python simpleblock to create non-versioned symlink for `python-config` + check for `bin/python` and `bin/python-config` in sanity check ([#2904](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2904))

- various bug fixes, including:

    - do not use `-g77` option when installing NVHPC 22.9+ ([#2819](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2819))
    - check that `sanity_check_module_loaded` attribute exists before querying it in `PythonPackage` simpleblock ([#2865](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2865))
    - fix `$JULIA_DEPOT_PATH` in installation of multiple `JuliaPackage` extensions ([#2869](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2869))
    - fix checking of CUDA/ROCR-Runtime dependencies for Clang to determine default build targets ([#2873](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2873))
    - show template values of `exts_default_options` in `PythonBundle` ([#2874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2874))
    - fix missing initialization of `CMakeMake` in `CMakePythonPackage` ([#2876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2876))
    - fix error when failing `pip` version check during `PythonPackage` sanity check ([#2877](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2877))
    - handle templating correctly in `CMakeMake` when playing with `configopts` ([#2882](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2882))
    - avoid crash in test step of PyTorch simpleblock if `runtest` is not a command ([#2883](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2883))
    - fix check configure option in FlexiBLAS simpleblock ([#2886](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2886))
    - use older `ncgen -H` for older netCDF ([#2889](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2889))
    - fix linking numexpr with Intel MKL's VML library for imkl >= 2021.x ([#2897](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2897))

- other changes:

    - only give read permissions in GitHub Actions workflows ([#2863](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2863))
    - use start dir of extension to install R packages ([#2867](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2867))
    - fix website/docs links in `README` ([#2870](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2870))
    - add deprecation notice to `RPackage` extensions with relative paths in `start_dir` ([#2879](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2879))

- minor enhancements, including:

    - add additional extensions to R 4.2.1 ([#17043](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17043), [#17125](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17125), [#17224](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17224), [#17493](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17493), [#17523](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17523))
    - add additional extensions to Bioconductor 3.15 ([#17126](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17126), [#17315](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17315), [#17494](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17494))
    - add sanity check command to OpenMolcas v22.10 ([#17128](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17128))
    - add `Set::Object` and `Heap::Fibonacci` extensions to Perl 5.32.1 ([#17151](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17151))
    - add additional extensions to Python 3.10.8 (required for scipy test suite) ([#17159](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17159))
    - enhance OpenFold 1.0.1 for standalone usage ([#17206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17206))
    - add SDL2 dependency for FFmpeg 5.0.1 to build `ffplay` ([#17213](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17213))
    - set `$JULIA_DEPOT_PATH` and `$JULIA_HISTORY` in Julia simpleconfigs ([#17216](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17216))
    - add `Devel::Size` + `Math::Utils` extension to recent Perl simpleconfigs ([#17246](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17246), [#17466](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17466))
    - combine errors of extension patch check into a single failure ([#17286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17286))
    - add case-insensitive name clash test ([#17303](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17303))
    - add ffnvcodec build dependency to all recent FFmpeg simpleconfigs ([#17316](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17316))
    - use '`import deap.base`' in sanity check for deap extension in `SciPy-bundle` 2022.05 ([#17429](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17429))
    - add source URL to cuDNN 8.8 simpleconfig ([#17439](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17439))
    - add missing zstd dep to Boost ([#17482](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17482))

- various bug fixes, including:

    - fix `postinstallcmds` and clarify download instructions for netMHC + netMHCpan 4.0a (#9739, #9740)
    - fix OpenBLAS 0.3.15 patch to correctly set the CPU core type for Tiger Lake ([#15845](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15845))
    - add alternative checksum for UCX 1.13.1 after source tarball was changed in-place (without actual code changes) ([#17077](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17077))
    - fix build of TensorFlow 2.5+ on `aarch64` ([#17101](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17101))
    - explictely download `qe-gipaw` source tarball from `qe-gipaw` GitHub repository in QuantumESPRESSO 7.1 simpleconfigs ([#17129](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17129))
    - add patch for `GCCcore` 11.1.0 + 11.2.0 to fix AVX2 bug ([#17135](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17135))
    - add patch to make ncbi-vdb 3.0.0 compatible with HDF5 1.12.2 ([#17140](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17140))
    - fix source URL for p7zip v17.x ([#17144](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17144))
    - add patches for Qt5 5.15.5 to fix compilation failures in abseil and breakpad with glibc 2.34 ([#17165](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17165))
    - remove dependency on Pillow from scikit-bio v0.5.7 ([#17178](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17178))
    - correctly specify path to libfabric installation prefix in PMIx 4.1.0 simpleconfig ([#17204](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17204))
    - use GCC as toolchain for serial variants of HDF5, since it has a FORTRAN API ([#17221](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17221))
    - fix CMake print summary for long hostnames for NECI ([#17230](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17230))
    - add missing pmix patch to OpenMPI 4.1.1 simpleconfig used in `iomkl/2021a` and `iomkl/2021b` ([#17240](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17240))
    - include required `stereo_chemical_props.txt` for OpenFold 1.0.1 ([#17242](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17242))
    - add patch for PAPI 7.0.0 to fix compilation error ([#17244](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17244))
    - also update `$PERL5LIB` for RepeatMasker v4.1.4 ([#17245](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17245))
    - add alternative `source_url` for MariaDB > 10.4 ([#17250](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17250))
    - remove use of rysnc in building `Kent_tools` ([#17252](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17252))
    - add missing pkgconf build dependency in recent libxslt simpleconfigs ([#17254](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17254))
    - add psycopg2, PyYAML, and Cartopy dependencies to QGIS 3.28.1 ([#17257](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17257))
    - fix `postinstallcmds` in shovill simpleconfigs ([#17279](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17279))
    - allow multiple simpleconfigs with same name if they differ by CUDA version included in `versionsuffix` ([#17289](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17289))
    - remove duplicate SlamDunk simpleconfig using lowercase name ([#17301](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17301))
    - use `https` in homepage + source URL for GenomeThreader 1.7.3 ([#17338](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17338))
    - consistently use Check capitailisation ([#17351](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17351))
    - add alternative checksum for spatial 7.3-14 extension in R 4.1.x simpleconfigs ([#17356](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17356))
    - fix homepage + source URL for ELPA (due to switch to new domain) ([#17357](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17357))
    - fix homepage in ELPA simpleconfigs (due to switch to new domain) ([#17358](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17358))
    - rename libpsml for consistency with libPSML ([#17359](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17359))
    - replace obsolete `pycrypto` with `pycryptodome` in Python 3.10.x simpleconfigs ([#17412](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17412))
    - update deap to version 1.3.3 in SciPy-bundle 2022.05 simpleconfigs (since deap 1.3.1 is broken) ([#17413](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17413))
    - add patch for Qt5 5.12.2 with `GCCcore/11.2.0` to fix template bug ([#17464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17464))
    - replace src include path with installation dir for HDF5 ([#17469](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17469), [#17488](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17488))
    - disable Python support for OTF2 v2.2, since we're not including Python 2.x as dependency ([#17499](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17499))
    - update homepage and source urls of DFT-D3 ([#17528](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17528))
    - use `Binary` simpleblock for ANIcalculator to prevent RPATH sanity check failures ([#17536](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17536))

- other changes:

    - fix invalid escape sequences in simpleconfigs by using raw strings (`r"..."`) ([#11149](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11149))
    - add exception for ncbi-vdb 3.0.0 dependency variant ([#17131](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17131))
    - use proper source tarball instead of cloning GitHub repository for wxWidgets v3.2.1 ([#17167](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17167))
    - enable `-fPIC` in GEOS 3.11.1 (required by GDAL) ([#17196](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17196))
    - fix website/docs links in `README` ([#17232](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17232))
    - remove commented out line and delete unused patch for TALON ([#17298](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17298))
    - re-enable disabled tests ([#17304](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17304))
    - rename MAGMA to MAGMA-gene-analysis to avoid name collision ([#17345](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17345))
    - Archive ARB and blasr patch files ([#17346](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17346))
    - Archive BAMM, BamM, and GroopM to avoid BAMM/BamM name collision ([#17348](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17348))
    - consistently use NanoFilt capitalisation ([#17349](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17349))
    - rename ncl to NEXUS-CL to avoid case-insensitive name clash ([#17350](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17350))
    - rename python graphviz to graphviz-python to avoid case-insensitive name clash ([#17352](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17352))
    - archive charmm and CHARMM simpleconfigs to avoid case-insensitive name clash ([#17364](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/17364))



## SimpleBuild v4.7.0 (January 9th 2023) {: #release_notes_eb470 }

feature release

**framework**

- print deprecation warning with running SimpleBuild with Python 2 ([#4136](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4136))

- various enhancements, including:

    - add support for checksums specified in external `checksums.json` file ([#3749](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3749))
    - vendor `distutils.version.LooseVersion` as `simplebuild.tools.LooseVersion` (since distutils is deprecated in Python 3.10) ([#3794](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3794), [#4156](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4156))
    - take into account custom configuration options specified in simplestack file ([#4057](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4057))
    - add support for using `--output-format=md` (MarkDown) ([#4117](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4117), [#4155](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4155))
    - add support for `--filter-rpath-sanity-libs` to skip RPATH sanity check for designated libraries ([#4119](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4119))
    - add sanity_check_load_module method to SimpleBlock to provide control over when module is loaded during sanity check step ([#4125](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4125))
    - add `eb_bash_completion_local.bash` script to `setup.py` ([#4127](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4127))
    - check whether `nvidia-smi/rocm-smi` command is available before trying to run it in `get_gpu_info` ([#4131](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4131))
    - add `gfbf` as subtoolchain of foss ([#4143](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4143))
    - add support for `postinstallmsgs` ([#4145](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4145))
    - make `iimkl` toolchain aware of `intel-compilers` ([#4146](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4146))
    - add definition for `nvofbf` toolchain ([#4157](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4157), [#4163](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4163))

- various bug fixes, including:

    - also use SimpleConfig instances cache in process_simpleconfig when `build_specs` is empty dict ([#4107](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4107))
    - fix build options that should have empty list as default value ([#4108](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4108))
    - catch simpleconfig parsing failure so we can generate and post a test report ([#4109](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4109))
    - add explicit return when no checksums match those specified in a tuple ([#4112](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4112))
    - tweak `findPythonDeps.py` script to use canonical package names ([#4118](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4118))
    - add `-fdefault-double-8` to `r8` toolchain compiler option for GCC (to be consistent with Intel) ([#4121](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4121))
    - always start with empty list for banned/requires libraries to avoid that corresponding build option is updated in-place ([#4137](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4137))
    - fix container tests by using EPEL archive URL for downloading Singularity RPM ([#4138](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4138))
    - use `-march=x86-64 -mtune=generic` instead of `-xSSE2` when using Intel oneAPI compilers ([#4147](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4147))
    - partially `skip test_det_copy_ec_specs` if no GitHub token is available ([#4149](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4149))

- other changes:

    - drop support for simplestack files using `'software'` top-level key ([#4057](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4057))
    - also run unit tests with Python 3.11 + add Python 3.11 to classifiers in `setup.py` ([#4092](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4092), [#4141](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4141))
    - use new SimpleBuild logo in README ([#4123](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4123))
    - automatically cancel Github Action workflow runs for outdated commits ([#4132](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4132))
    - auto-enable use of oneAPI C/C++ compilers for intel-compilers >= 2022.2.0 ([#4135](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4135))
    - trim CI test configurations to avoid hitting GitHub rate limits ([#4148](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4148))
    - various tweaks to docstrings and help messages to fix problems with auto-generated documentation in MarkDown format ([#4129](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4129), [#4130](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4130), [#4154](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4154), [#4160](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4160), [#4162](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4162), [#4168](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4168))
    - update copyright lines for 2023 ([#4161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4161))

**simpleblocks**

- add generic simpleblocks for installing (bundle of) Julia packages: JuliaPackage ([#2816](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2816)) and JuliaBundle ([#2830](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2830))

- minor enhancements and updates, including:

    - enhance TensorFlow simpleblock to take into account provided OpenSSL dependency ([#2575](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2575))
    - add fix_shebang to `install_step` of PythonPackage simpleblock so that we can fix shebangs when installing extensions ([#2680](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2680))
    - update PETSc simpleblock for newer versions (>= 3.17) ([#2796](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2796))
    - update Clang simpleblock to add support for new directory structure in Clang versions >= 14 + support Flang ([#2800](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2800))
    - update Xmipp simpleblock since versions >= 3.20.07 use `noAsk` option to configure ([#2809](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2809))
    - add `include/opencv4` to `$CPATH` for OpenCV versions >= 4.0 ([#2818](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2818))
    - add extra option for disabling LAPACK in ESMF ([#2821](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2821))
    - enable building of static libraries for libxml2 >= 2.10 ([#2825](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2825))
    - update Xmipp simpleblock to handle effects of CUDA at SYSTEM level and newer CUDA version requirements for stdc++ ([#2831](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2831))
    - update LLVM simpleblock to put `'cmake'` symlink in place so separate CMake modules required for LLVM 15+ can be found ([#2832](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2832))
    - set `$TEMPDIRPATH` for testsuite in the BerkeleyGW simpleblock, to avoid polluting `/tmp` ([#2836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2836))
    - add `configure_no_prefix` option to skip addition of prefix to configure command in ConfigureMake simpleblock ([#2842](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2842))
    - update `qscintilla.py` to be compatible with EB install of PyQt5 >= 5.15 ([#2845](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2845))
    - add UCC to known_dependencies in OpenMPI SimpleBlock ([#2847](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2847))
    - update Clang-AOMP simpleblock to handle version 5.2 and newer ([#2851](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2851))

- various bug fixes, including:

    - fix installing of Clang with RPATH linking ([#2799](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2799))
    - fix `--module-only` for Clang + fix sanity check for Clang 11.x ([#2800](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2800))
    - create `$XDG_CACHE_HOME` for PyTorch tests ([#2806](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2806))
    - make PythonPackage simpleblock compatible with `--sanity-check-only` by loading module early during sanity check step ([#2828](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2828))
    - fix docstring of PythonBundle generic simpleblock ([#2833](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2833))
    - fix counting of failures in PyTorch tests ([#2834](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2834), [#2840](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2840))
    - make sure that ANSYS INSTALL script has execute permissions ([#2852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2852), [#2853](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2853))

- other changes:

    - remove useless `-openmp` build option for MRtrix v3.x ([#2822](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2822))
    - update HDF5 simpleblock to use `--enable-threadsafe` configure option to make C API thread safe ([#2824](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2824))
    - use new SimpleBuild logo in README ([#2827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2827))
    - automatically cancel Github Action workflow runs for outdated commits ([#2835](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2835))
    - use fixed names for `bazel/wrapper` subdirectories used when building TensorFlow, to make debugging easier ([#2841](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2841))
    - also run unit tests with Python 3.11 ([#2844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2844))
    - tweak docstring in some generic simpleblocks so it renders nicely in auto-generated documentation ([#2849](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2849))
    - update copyright lines for 2023 ([#2850](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2850))

**simpleconfigs**

## SimpleBuild v4.6.2 (October 21st 2022) {: #release_notes_eb462 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for simplestack file that contains simpleconfig
        filenames + implement parsing of configuration options
        ([#4021](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4021))
    - skip over unset `$EB_PYTHON`/`$EB_INSTALLPYTHON` in eb wrapper
        script
        ([#4080](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4080))
    - add `GITHUB_RELEASE` and `GITHUB_LOWER_RELEASE` templates
        ([#4084](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4084))
    - add `%(cuda_cc_cmake)s` template
        ([#4087](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4087))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make `check_sha256_checksums` verify all checksums if they're
        specified as a dict value
        ([#4076](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4076))
    - replace use of symlink with copied files in `alt_location` tests
        to fix failing SimpleBuild installation on BeeGFS
        ([#4083](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4083))
    - fix trying to generate RPATH wrappers for Clang
        ([#4088](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4088))
    - make sure that GitPython version is a proper version before
        checking minimal required version
        ([#4090](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4090),
        [#4091](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4091))
    - first look for patch in `alt_location` when it is specified
        ([#4093](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4093))
- other changes:
    - make scripts executable
        ([#4081](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4081))
    - make `--inject-checksums` inject dictionary value for checksums
        which maps filename to SHA256 checksum
        ([#4085](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4085))
    - update to v3 of actions/checkout and actions/setup-python in CI
        workflows
        ([#4089](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4089))
    - use `SYSTEM` template constant in dependencies instead of `True`
        in framework tests
        ([#4094](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4094))

**simpleblocks**

- 2 new software-specific simpleblock:
    - CUDA compatibility libraries
        ([#2764](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2764))
        and mamba
        ([#2808](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2808))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - update OpenFOAM simpleblock to support OpenFOAM 10 + clean up
        variant/version checks
        ([#2766](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2766))
    - added support for ESMPy in ESMF
        ([#2789](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2789))
    - enhance OpenBLAS simpleblock to support running LAPACK test
        suite + checking how many tests fail
        ([#2801](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2801))
    - make numexpr simpleblock aware of toolchain with GCC + imkl
        ([#2810](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2810))
    - add sanity check commands for netCDF
        ([#2811](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2811))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - handle problems copying symlink that points to CUDA folder that
        is not created for non CUDA builds of SuiteSparse
        ([#2790](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2790))
    - don't install docs (to avoid trouble with Java) + add Rocky
        support for ABAQUS
        ([#2792](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2792))
    - correctly count the number of failing tests (not failing test
        suites) in PyTorch builds
        ([#2794](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2794),
        [#2803](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2803))
    - fix docstring for PyTorch simpleblock
        ([#2795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2795))
    - handle iterative builds with MakeCp simpleblock
        ([#2798](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2798))
    - accept both `None` and empty value for optarch to let OpenCV
        detect host CPU
        ([#2804](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2804))
    - enhance SimpleBuildMeta simpleblock: auto-enable installing with
        pip + fix setup.py of simpleconfigs package so installation with
        setuptools >= 61.0 works
        ([#2805](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2805))
    - use `python -m pip` instead of `pip` in PythonPackage simpleblock
        ([#2807](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2807))
- other changes:
    - make the test output from PythonPackage less verbose by
        disabling default search for error patterns done by `run_cmd`
        ([#2797](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2797))

**simpleconfigs**

- add simpleconfig for intel/2022.09 toolchain
    ([#16435](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16435))

        ([#15892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15892)),
        CWIPI
        ([#16342](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16342)),
        enchant-2
        ([#16082](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16082),
        [#16319](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16319)),
        f90wrap
        ([#16346](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16346)),
        Imath
        ([#16276](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16276)),
        Mamba

        ([#16096](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16096)),
        ngtcp2

## SimpleBuild v4.6.1 (September 12th 2022) {: #release_notes_eb461 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add script to find dependencies of Python packages
        ([#3839](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3839))
    - add `ai` default module class
        ([#4053](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4053))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix code style issues reported by recent flake8 linter
        ([#4049](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4049))
    - stick to autopep8 < 1.7.0 with Python 2.7
        ([#4055](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4055))
    - ensure we call `SimpleBlock.patch_step` for `postinstallpatches`
        ([#4063](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4063))
    - fix leaked handles in `set_columns`, `complete_cmd`,
        `run_cmd_qa`, `det_terminal_size functions` + tests
        ([#4066](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4066))
    - fix `quote_str` when string with both `'` and `"` ends with a
        double quote
        ([#4068](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4068))
    - fix type-checking of patches to allow dict values + correctly
        handle patches specified as dict values in `--new-pr`
        ([#4070](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4070))
    - relax toolchain test by accepting both `-march=native` (x86_64)
        and `-mcpu=native` (aarch64)
        ([#4071](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4071))
- other changes:
    - run python in the same process as `eb` wrapper script by using
        `exec`
        ([#4048](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4048))
    - add `get_linked_libs_raw` function, and use it from both
        `check_linked_shared_libs` and `sanity_check_rpath`
        ([#4051](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4051))
    - update CI workflows (except container tests) to use Ubuntu
        20.04, since Ubuntu 18.04 is deprecated
        ([#4064](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4064))
    - use `SYSTEM` constant for dependency that uses system toolchain
        in dumped simpleconfig
        ([#4069](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4069))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - update LAMMPS simpleblock for LAMMPS/23Jun22
        ([#2213](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2213))
    - reduce the number of command line options for `cmake` command in
        CMakeMake generic simpleblock
        ([#2514](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2514))
    - update libQGLViewer simpleblock to take into account changes in
        the shared library names depending on Qt versions they are
        compiled with
        ([#2730](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2730))
    - improve PLUMED detection in GROMACS simpleblock
        ([#2749](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2749))
    - make `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` detection more robust for LAMMPS
        ([#2765](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2765))
    - enhance NVHPC simpleblock to avoid superfluous warning
        ([#2767](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2767))
    - enhance PyTorch simpleblock to also capture tests failing with
        signal
        ([#2768](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2768))
    - enhance PythonPackage simpleblock to make sure all test command
        output makes it to the SimpleBuild log, also when
        `return_output_ec=True`
        ([#2770](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2770))
    - set `$NVHPC_CUDA_HOME` for NVHPC 22.7+
        ([#2776](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2776))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make Amber simpleblock aware of FlexiBLAS
        ([#2720](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2720))
    - update PyTorch simpleblock to configure without breakpad support
        on POWER
        ([#2763](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2763))
    - use `lib*` in `post_install` step of FFTW.MPI simpleblock to fix
        paths not being found on Linux distros favouring lib64 (like
        Suse/SLES)
        ([#2771](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2771))
    - use `det_cmake_version` function to determine CMake version in
        CMakeMake generic simpleblock
        ([#2772](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2772))
    - don't enable building of `ld.gold` when installing binutils on
        a RISC-V system + don't configure GCC to use gold as default
        linker on a RISC-V system
        ([#2780](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2780))
    - tweak Amber(Tools) simpleblock to run tests from top-level
        directory
        ([#2781](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2781))
    - fix version check for NVPTX library in sanity check of Clang
        simpleblock
        ([#2783](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2783))
- other changes:
    - update CI workflows to use Ubuntu 20.04 (since Ubuntu 18.04 is
        deprecated)
        ([#2779](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2779))

    - add patch to fix broken test on POWER for numpy in SciPy-bundle

    - refactor checksum test for extensions to use
        `collect_exts_file_info`
        ([#15973](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15973))
    - fix dependency on FOX Toolkit in SUMO

    - add missing SciPy-bundle dependency for rMATS-turbo
        ([#15988](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15988))

    - restore ploteig in EIGENSOFT 7.2.1
        ([#15996](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15996))

    - add patch to fix missing sync in LINCS and SETTLE CUDA kernels
        for GROMACS 2020
        ([#16027](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16027))
        and 2021
        ([#16026](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16026))
    - exclude failing test in TensorFlow 2.4.1
        ([#16042](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16042))
    - skip NASA performance and remote server tests in netCDF v4.9.0
        ([#16050](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16050),
        [#16158](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16158))
    - use versioned symbols in ncurses built with system toolchain (by
        adding `--with-versioned-syms` configure option)
        ([#16064](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16064))
    - add patch to fix pkgconfig file for Blitz++ v1.0.2
        ([#16102](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16102))
    - add missing BCFtools dependency for recent medaka versions
        ([#16107](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16107))
    - add GTK2 v2.24.33 as a dependency for Ghostscript v9.56.1
        ([#16112](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16112))
    - fix checksum for Stacks v2.62 (due to silent re-release without
        version bump)
        ([#16134](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16134))
    - fix libsanitzer for glibc 2.36 to build GCCcore 11.3.0
        ([#16145](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16145))
    - fix top level Makefile for AmberTools 20 and enable tests
        ([#16150](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16150))
    - add missing patches + enable running tests for AmberTools 21
        with intel/2021a
        ([#16151](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16151))
        and intel/2021b
        ([#16152](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16152))
    - replace HDF5 v1.13.1 with v1.12.1 as dependency, since we
        shouldn't use odd minor versions of HDF5 which are not stable
        releases
        ([#16153](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16153))
    - remove modextrapaths to add top-level install directory to
        `$PATH`for recent InterProScan simpleconfigs (now done by default
        by Binary simpleblock)
        ([#16167](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16167))
    - fix sources + source URL + homepage for Molekel v5.4.0
        ([#16219](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16219))
    - consistently add maeparser + CoordgenLibs dependencies to
        OpenBabel 3.1.1 simpleconfigs
        ([#16231](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16231))
    - fix checksum for CUDA 11.4.1 aarch64 installer
        ([#16234](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16234))
    - remove incorrect comment for Boost dependency in OpenBabel 3.1.1
        simpleconfigs
        ([#16238](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16238))
    - add direct Pango dependency in recent ImageMagick simpleconfigs
        ([#16237](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16237))
- other changes:
    - remove superfluous `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release`, use of
        `build_type = Release`, or enabling `separate_build_dir` from
        simpleconfigs using CMakeMake simpleblock
        ([#13384](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13384))
    - synchronize ncurses simpleconfigs using system toolchain
        ([#15903](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15903))
    - stick to Java/11 as dependency for Bazel 5.1.1 (which is
        available for x86_64, aarch64, ppc64le)
        ([#15906](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15906))
    - speed up OpenMPI 4.1.4 configure by not running
        `autogen.pl --force`, but only running required Autotools
        commands
        ([#15957](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15957))
    - replace sed commands by upstreamed patches for BLIS built with
        intel-compilers toolchain
        ([#15958](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15958))
    - simplify AlphaFold foss/2021a simpleconfigs by using a fleshed out
        patched OpenMM dependency
        ([#15981](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/15981))
    - update Java/11 to 11.0.16 and Java/17 to 17.0.4
        ([#16001](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16001))
    - remove unnecessary patch in recent JupyterLab
        ([#16030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16030))
    - update CI workflows to use Ubuntu 20.04 (since Ubuntu 18.04 is
        deprecated)
        ([#16070](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16070))
    - make check for toolchain value in dependency spec in simpleconfigs
        test suite aware that dumped simpleconfig uses `SYSTEM` constant
        ([#16126](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/16126))

## SimpleBuild v4.6.0 (July 8th 2022) {: #release_notes_eb460 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - allow searching for sources/patches in alternative location by
        specifying '`alt_location`' in source/patch spec
        ([#3994](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3994))
    - show URLs used for download attempts in trace output
        ([#4026](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4026))
    - add support for setting environment variables via '`pushenv`'
        with `modextravars`
        ([#4030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4030))
    - add support for OneAPI compilers using toolchain option
        '`oneapi`'
        ([#4031](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4031),
        [#4032](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4032),
        [#4039](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4039))
    - make `check_linked_shared_libs` more robust by taking into
        account that '`ldd`' may fail
        ([#4033](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4033))
    - fall back to sequential extension install if parallel install is
        not implemented
        ([#4034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4034))
    - add support for using template values in name/version of
        extensions
        ([#4036](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4036))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make sure that `ARCH` constant has '`aarch64`' (rather than
        '`arm64`') as value on macOS ARM
        ([#4018](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4018))
    - tweak '`eb`' wrapper script to correctly handle errors when
        python command being considered fails to run
        ([#4019](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4019))
    - tweak `is_patch_for` function to make it more robust
        ([#4028](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4028))
- other changes:
    - update Lmod used to run tests to version 8.7.6
        ([#4027](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4027),
        [#4030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4030))
    - tweak `apply_patch` to not create `.orig files` (by default)
        when applying patch files
        ([#4038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4038))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for STAR-CCM+
    ([#1613](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1613))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - update Siesta SimpleBlock to support GCC 10+ by adding
        `-fallow-argument-mismatch` Fortran compiler option
        ([#2690](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2690))
    - enable building of shared library for Libint 2.7+
        ([#2738](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2738))
    - allow some PyTorch tests to fail + print warning if one or more
        tests fail
        ([#2742](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2742))
    - also support OpenSSL 3.0 in OpenSSL wrapper simpleblock
        ([#2746](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2746))
    - add more logging to `install_pc_files` method of OpenSSL wrapper
        simpleblock
        ([#2752](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2752))
    - make WPS simpleblock aware of `(pre)buildopts`
        ([#2754](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2754))
    - add Abseil system dependency for TensorFlow 2.9+
        ([#2757](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2757))
    - disable altivec when building FFTW versions < 3.4 with
        single-precision with GCC on POWER
        ([#2758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2758))
- various bug fixes, including:

        ([#2743](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2743))
    - update Rosetta simpleblock to take into account that

        ([#2744](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2744))
    - only load temporary module file during sanity check for pybind11

        ([#2747](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2747))
    - make sure that `CMakeMakeCp` uses correct build dir
        ([#2748](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2748))
    - enhance Bazel simpleblock to avoid writing to `$HOME` in sanity

**simpleconfigs**

## SimpleBuild v4.5.5 (June 8th 2022) {: #release_notes_eb455 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add toolchain definitions for `nvompi` (NVHPC + OpenMPI)
        ([#3969](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3969)),
        `nvpsmpi` (NVHPC + ParaStationMPI)
        ([#3970](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3970)),
        `gfbf` (GCC, FlexiBLAS, FFTW)
        ([#4006](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4006))
    - add support for `FFTW.MPI` toolchain component (`$FFT*DIR`
        variables)
        ([#4012](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4012))
    - add support for customizing SimpleBuild command used in jobs via
        `--job-eb-cmd`
        ([#4016](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4016))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix copying of simpleconfig file with `--copy-ec` without
        `--rebuild` if module is already installed
        ([#3993](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3993))
    - ignore deprecation warnings regarding cryptography in Python
        3.6 + Blowfish with Python 3.10 in test suite output
        ([#3999](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3999))
    - fix typo in debug log message in `simpleblock.py`
        ([#4000](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4000))
    - fix printing of list of attempted download URLs when url-encoded
        characters are used in URL
        ([#4005](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4005))
    - set `$FFT(W)_LIB_DIR` to imkl-FFTW's lib path in build
        environment if usempi toolchain option is enabled
        ([#4011](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4011))
    - correctly identify Apple Silicon M1 as Arm 64-bit by also
        considering arm64 next to aarch64
        ([#4014](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4014))
    - fix '`eb --show-system-info`' on Apple M1 system
        ([#4015](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/4015))
- other changes:
    - change '`eb`' command to `import simplebuild.framework` to check
        if SimpleBuild framework is available
        ([#3995](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3995),
        [#3998](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3998))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for FFTW.MPI
    ([#2724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2724))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - update NEURON simpleblock to use CMakeMake for recent versions
        ([#2304](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2304))
    - enhance Clang simpleblock to add support for building with AMDGPU
        offload
        ([#2684](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2684),
        [#2729](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2729))
    - update sanity check in OpenMPI simpleblock to support OpenMPI
        v5.0.0
        ([#2709](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2709))
    - don't use `gold` linker by default for GCC >= 11.3
        ([#2711](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2711))
    - update sanity check in R simpleblock for versions >= 4.2.0, since
        S.h is not included anymore
        ([#2713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2713))
    - update ABAQUS simpleblock for ABAQUS 2022
        ([#2716](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2716))
    - update LLVM simpleblock for LLVM v14.0.x
        ([#2718](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2718))
    - update Mesa simpleblock to remove swr driver configopts for
        versions 22+
        ([#2719](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2719))
    - enhance Clang simpleblock to support also installing Python
        bindings
        ([#2721](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2721),
        [#2725](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2725))
    - enhance SuperLU simpleblock to support building on top of
        FlexiBLAS and be compatible with SuperLU v5.3
        ([#2722](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2722))
    - update TensorFlow simpleblock for version 2.8.0
        ([#2723](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2723))
    - modify FFTW's sanity check step to allow checking only for MPI
        parts of FFTW installation
        ([#2724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2724))
    - add support to ConfigureMake for tweaking (first part of) test
        command via '`test_cmd`'
        ([#2726](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2726),
        [#2737](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2737))
    - enhance MrBayes simpleblock with custom sanity check command
        ([#2727](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2727))
    - update cudnnarch string templates used to compose source tarball
        names from cuDNN 8.3.3 onwards
        ([#2728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2728))
    - add sanity check command to OpenSSL wrapper simpleblock to verify
        that system certificates are available to OpenSSL
        ([#2735](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2735))
    - ignore exit code of `pkg-config` command in OpenSSL wrapper
        simpleblock, since with `pkgconf` they exit with a non-zero exit
        code if the OS package is not installed

## SimpleBuild v4.5.4 (March 31st 2022) {: #release_notes_eb454 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - warn about potentially missing patches in `--new-pr`
        ([#3759](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3759),
        [#3966](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3966))
    - add support for '`clone_into`' field in git_config source spec
        to specify different name for top-level directory
        ([#3949](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3949))
    - add bash completion for simpleconfigs from local dir but not robot
        search path
        ([#3953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3953))
    - add a 'sync pr' message when the PR has a mergeable state but
        is showing a failed status for the test suite on the last commit
        ([#3967](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3967))
    - add `gmpit` toolchain definition (GCC + MPItrampoline)
        ([#3971](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3971))
    - use '`zypper search -i`' to check whether specified OS
        dependency is installed on openSUSE + make sure that rpm is
        considered for checking OS dependencies on RHEL8
        ([#3973](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3973))
    - add support for post-install patches
        ([#3974](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3974))
    - add support for '`download_instructions`' simpleconfig parameter
        key to specify some download or installation steps for user in
        case of complicated way of obtaining needed files
        ([#3976](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3976),
        [#3981](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3981))
    - also try collecting AMD GPU info (via `rocm-smi`) for
        `--show-system-info`
        ([#3978](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3978),
        [#3982](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3982))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - ensure `--review-pr` can find dependencies included in PR
        ([#3979](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3979))
    - run '`apt-get update`' in GitHub Actions workflow for
        container tests to update container package list before
        installing anything
        ([#3985](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3985))
- other changes:
    - enable code linting check for all supported Python versions
        ([#3725](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3725))
    - update copyright lines for 2022
        ([#3986](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3986))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - update Clang-AOMP simpleblock to add support for ROCm v5.0
        ([#2681](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2681))
    - enable system SSL certificates in OpenSSL installations
        ([#2683](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2683))
    - enhance MRtrix simpleblock: build in parallel + enable OpenMP
        support for MRtrix >= 3.0
        ([#2685](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2685))
    - avoid dependency on '`which`' command in sanity check for
        Python, use '`command -v`' instead
        ([#2687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2687))
    - enhance Tarball simpleblock to support using it for installing
        extensions
        ([#2688](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2688))
    - update wxPython simpleblock to support wxPython v4.1
        ([#2689](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2689))
    - enhance Gurobi simpleblock to also update `$MATLABPATH`
        ([#2691](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2691))
    - build single-file shared libraries for imkl so it can be used as
        FlexiBLAS backend via `$FLEXIBLAS_LIBRARY_PATH`
        ([#2694](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2694))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - added regex to replace /lib/cpp with cpp in OpenFOAM's wmake
        rules file
        ([#2331](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2331))
    - set `$NINJAFLAGS` to make sure Ninja doesn't use all visible
        cores when building Qt5
        ([#2338](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2338))
    - update Siesta SimpleBlock to use serial FFTW
        ([#2662](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2662))
    - fix support for imkl for numexpr 2.8.0+ in numexpr simpleblock
        ([#2678](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2678))
    - make sure TensorFlow doesn't see the `nvptx-none` dir when
        searching for `gcc` include dir
        ([#2682](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2682))
    - force use of bash for Anaconda install script
        ([#2692](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2692))
    - add guess for path to add to `$MANPATH` for intel-compilers
        ([#2696](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2696))
    - change permissions of the Java build directory to avoid
        permission denied error
        ([#2698](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2698))
    - also consider `$MKLROOT/lib/pkgconfig` for `$PKG_CONFIG_PATH`
        for imkl
        ([#2701](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2701))
    - close log after installing Bundle component
        ([#2702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2702))
        - fixes problem of log leaking across installations
            ([framework issue
            #3533](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/issues/3533))
    - replace hardcoded /tmp to make sure that Bazel build respects
        `$TMPDIR`
        ([#2703](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2703))
- other changes:
    - minor code cleanup in numexpr simpleblock
        ([#2679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2679))
    - update copyright lines for 2022
        ([#2705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2705))

## SimpleBuild v4.5.3 (February 11th 2022) {: #release_notes_eb453 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - also check for git in `--check-eb-deps`
        ([#3954](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3954))
    - add end2end test for `eb --containerize`
        ([#3958](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3958))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - take into account that patch files can also be zipped when
        checking filename extension for patches
        ([#3936](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3936))
    - initialize `BACKUP_PKG_URL` with empty string in
        `install_eb_dep.sh` script
        ([#3939](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3939))
    - fix `get_os_name` and `get_os_version` to avoid reporting
        `UNKNOWN` in output of `eb --show-system-info`
        ([#3942](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3942))
    - consistently use `actions/setup-python@v2` in CI workflows
        ([#3944](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3944))
    - switch to using `pip3` for installing SimpleBuild in container
        recipes generated by SimpleBuild
        ([#3945](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3945))
    - specify `simplebuild.io` as SimpleBuild homepage in `setup.py`
        ([#3947](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3947))
    - avoid crash in `get_os_version` on modern SLES-based OSs
        ([#3955](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3955))
- other changes:
    - indicate compatibility with Python 3.10 in `setup.py`
        ([#3940](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3940))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for reticulate R package

- minor enhancements and updates, including:

        `cuda_cc_semicolon_sep` template value

        ([#2664](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2664))
    - specify `simplebuild.io` as SimpleBuild homepage in `setup.py`
        ([#2667](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2667))
- other changes:
    - remove vulnerable binaries from sanity check of HDF5, no longer
