## SimpleBuild v4.5.2 (January 24th 2022) {: #release_notes_eb452 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - automatically prepend value for `env-for-shebang` configuration
        setting with sysroot
        ([#3919](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3919))
    - enhance `update_build_option` to return original value + add
        support for `update_build_options`
        ([#3923](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3923))
    - fix compatibility with Python 3.10
        ([#3926](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3926),
        [#3933](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3933))
    - also take `/etc/os-release` into account in `get_os_name` and
        `get_os_version`
        ([#3930](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3930))
    - enhance `get_cpu_architecture` and `get_cpu_family` to be aware
        of RISC-V
        ([#3931](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3931))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - relax pattern checks in `test_toy_exts_parallel`
        ([#3921](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3921))
    - use `sources.simplebuild.io` as backup URL for downloading
        Environment Modules sources to run test suite
        ([#3928](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3928))
    - make intelfftw toolchain component aware of GCCcore
        ([#3929](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3929))
- other changes:
    - deprecate use of (actual) patch files that don't have a
        filename ending with `.patch`
        ([#3920](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3920))
    - remove version restriction for keyring in `requirements.txt` to
        test with latest version
        ([#3925](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3925))
    - simplify `requirements.txt` by removing Python 2.6 support
        ([#3927](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3927))
    - only run GitHub tests when testing with Lua module syntax, to
        avoid hitting GitHub rate limit when running tests
        ([#3938](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3938))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - remove necessity for license for oneAPI versions (>= 2021.x) in
        itac simpleblock
        ([#2492](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2492))
    - add CUDA support in SuiteSparse simpleblock
        ([#2627](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2627))
    - use all available cores for running Perl test suite
        ([#2637](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2637))
    - add option to not copy the license file for Gurobi
        ([#2639](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2639),
        [#2641](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2641))
    - update AOCC simpleblock to support version 3.2.0
        ([#2643](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2643))
    - don't grep for specific version in `--version` output of Intel
        compiler commands for versions 2022.x
        ([#2644](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2644))
    - add support for enabling sanity checks for specific components
        in the Bundle simpleblock
        ([#2649](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2649))
    - update Libint simpleblock for LibInt v2.7.0 which requires
        configuring via CMake
        ([#2650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2650))
    - update Mathematica simpleblock for version 13
        ([#2652](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2652))
    - add sanity check command for Bazel
        ([#2653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2653))
    - update NAMD simpleblock to allow non-system csh
        ([#2654](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2654))
    - enhance CUDA simpleblock to create version independent pkgconfig
        files
        ([#2656](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2656))
    - add `util` subdirectory to `$PATH` for WPS

## SimpleBuild v4.5.1 (December 13th 2021) {: #release_notes_eb451 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - also dump environment to reprod directory
        ([#3374](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3374))
    - determine which extensions can be skipped in parallel (if
        `--parallel-extensions-install` is enabled)
        ([#3890](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3890))
    - fall back to sequential installation for extensions with unknown
        dependencies when using `--parallel-extensions-install`
        ([#3906](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3906))
    - allow oversubscription in sanity check for OpenMPI-based
        toolchains
        ([#3909](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3909))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - don't try to ensure absolute path for path part of
        `repositorypath`
        ([#3893](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3893),
        [#3899](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3899))
    - fix typo in EULA agreement error message
        ([#3894](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3894))
    - only remove lock if it was created in the same SimpleBuild session
        (not if it existed already)
        ([#3889](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3889))
    - introduce `SimpleBlock.post_init` method to correctly define
        `builddir` variable when `build-in-installdir` mode is enabled
        in simpleconfig or simpleblock
        ([#3900](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3900))
    - also show download progress bar when using `--inject-checksums`
        ([#3905](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3905))
    - pick up custom `extract_cmd` specified for extension
        ([#3907](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3907))
    - make `test_run_cmd_async` more robust against fluke failures
        ([#3908](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3908))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for Clang-AOMP
    ([#2617](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2617))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - enhance Rpm generic simpleblock to support installing tarball of
        RPMs (by unpacking it first) + take into account
        `(pre)installopts`
        ([#2580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2580))
    - add option to control use of MKL-DNN in jaxlib simpleblock
        ([#2619](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2619))
    - update SAMtools simpleblock to support installation of SAMtools
        1.14
        ([#2620](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2620))
    - add option to ignore PLUMED version check for GROMACS
        ([#2621](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2621))
    - update Inspector simpleblock for recent versions (>= 2021, oneAPI
        versions)
        ([#2624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2624))
    - enhance tbb simpleblock by adding option to build Python bindings
        ([#2626](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2626))
    - fix patching of `CMakeLists.txt` for Eigen v3.4
        ([#2633](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2633))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - update CP2K simpleblock to use `-D__MKL` for CP2K versions newer
        than 2.3
        ([#2586](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2586))
    - set OpenMPI configuration for ORCA sanity check
        ([#2596](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2596))
    - allow oversubscription in OpenMPI sanity check
        ([#2611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2611))
    - set `wm_*` class variables in OpenFOAM simpleblock constructor (to
        fix `--sanity-check-only`)
        ([#2616](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2616))
    - remove newline from simplebuild-simpleblocks package description
        (required to avoid installation error with setuptools>=59.0.0)
        ([#2623](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2623))
    - avoid patching binary files + other enhancements for MUMmer
        simpleblock
        ([#2630](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2630))
    - enable `build-in-installdir` mode in constructor of PETSc and
        SLEPc simpleblocks
        ([#2631](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2631))
    - skip netcdf4-python tests that require network connectivity
        ([#2634](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2634))

## SimpleBuild v4.5.0 (October 29th 2021) {: #release_notes_eb450 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add `--review-pr-max` and `--review-pr-filter` options to limit
        simpleconfigs used by `--review-pr` + retain order of simpleconfigs
        being compared with
        ([#3754](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3754))
    - use Rich (if available) to show progress bars when installing
        simpleconfigs
        ([#3823](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3823),
        [#3826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3826),
        [#3833](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3833),
        [#3835](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3835),
        [#3844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3844),
        [#3864](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3864),
        [#3867](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3867),
        [#3882](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3882))
        - see also
            <https://docs.simplebuild.io/en/latest/Progress_bars.html>
    - add support for checking required/optional SimpleBuild
        dependencies via `eb --check-eb-deps`
        ([#3829](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3829))
    - add support for collecting GPU info (via `nvidia-smi`), and
        include it in `--show-system-info` and test report
        ([#3851](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3851))
    - added support for `--insecure-download` configuration option
        ([#3859](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3859))
    - make intelfftw toolchain component aware of imkl-FFTW module
        ([#3861](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3861))
    - make sure the contrib/hooks tree is included in the source
        tarball for simplebuild-framework
        ([#3862](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3862))
    - add `check_async_cmd` function to facilitate checking on
        asynchronously running commands
        ([#3865](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3865),
        [#3881](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3881))
    - add initial/experimental support for installing extensions in
        parallel
        ([#3667](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3667),
        [#3878](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3878))
        - see also
            <https://docs.simplebuild.io/en/latest/Installing_extensions_in_parallel.html>
    - filter out duplicate paths added to module files, and print
        warning when they occur
        ([#3770](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3770),
        [#3874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3874))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - ensure that path configuration options have absolute path values
        ([#3832](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3832))
    - fix broken test by taking into account changed error raised by
        Python 3.9.7 when copying directory via `shutil.copyfile`
        ([#3840](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3840))
    - ensure newer location of CUDA stubs is taken into account by
        RPATH filter
        ([#3850](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3850))
    - replace `which` by `command -v` in `eb` wrapper script to avoid
        dependency on `which` command
        ([#3852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3852))
    - refactor SimpleBlock to decouple collecting of information on
        extension source/patch files from downloading them
        ([#3860](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3860))
        - in this context, the `SimpleBlock.fetch_extension_sources`
            method was deprecated, and replaced by
            `SimpleBlock.collect_exts_file_info`
    - fix library paths to add to `$LDFLAGS` for intel-compilers
        toolchain component
        ([#3866](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3866))
    - remove `--depth 1` from git clone when `commit` specified
        ([#3871](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3871),
        [#3872](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3872))
    - make sure correct include directory is used for FlexiBLAS
        toolchain component
        ([#3875](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3875))
    - explicitly disable rebase when pulling develop branch to create
        a merge commit, since not specifying how to reconcile divergent
        branches is an error with Git 2.33.1 and newer
        ([#3879](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3879))
    - tweak `test_http_header_fields_urlpat` to download from
        `sources.simplebuild.io` rather than `https://ftp.gnu.org`
        ([#3883](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3883))
- other changes:
    - change `copy_file` function to raise an error when trying to
        copy non-existing file
        ([#3836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3836),
        [#3855](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3855),
        [#3877](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3877))
    - only print the hook messages if SimpleBuild is running in debug
        mode
        ([#3843](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3843))
    - deprecate old toolchain versions (pre-2019a common toolchains)
        ([#3876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3876),
        [#3884](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3884))
        - see also
            <https://docs.simplebuild.io/en/latest/Deprecated-simpleconfigs.html#deprecated-toolchains>

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for imkl-FFTW
    ([#2599](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2599))
- minor enhancements and updates, including:
    - add support for installing R extensions in parallel
        ([#2408](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2408))
    - update MotionCor2 simpleblock to consider to locations for built
        binary
        ([#2541](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2541),
        [#2598](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2598))
    - let GROMACS runtime logs show SimpleBuild was used by setting
        `-DGMX_VERSION_STRING_OF_FORK` configuration option
        ([#2571](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2571))
    - adjust qa list in WIEN2k simpleblock to handle new questions + fix
        sanity check for v21.1
        ([#2572](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2572))
    - enhance GCC simpleblock to add support for AMD GPU offloading
        ([#2578](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2578))
    - add support for specifying subdirectory for target installation
        directory in CMakeMake
        ([#2579](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2579))
    - enhance COMSOL simpleblock to change permission on build directory
        during extract step (to allow using patches)
        ([#2584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2584))
    - enhance FlexiBLAS simpleblock to support building with Intel MKL
        (imkl) as backend
        ([#2588](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2588))
    - update MATLAB simpleblock for 2021b (jre is no longer included)
        ([#2589](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2589))
    - update OpenCV simpleblock to detect GTK3 and GTK2 dependencies
        (next to GTK+)
        ([#2591](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2591))
    - avoid that path to CUDA install directory is added to `$PATH`
        ([#2593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2593))
    - enhance imkl simpleblock to add support for installing with NVHPC
        ([#2595](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2595))
    - enhance PETSc simpleblock to run tests in parallel
        ([#2601](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2601))
    - update ELSI simpleblock to support two new external dependencies
        ([#2602](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2602))
    - add custom custom simpleconfig parameter `backends` in FlexiBLAS
        simpleblock to specify backends
        ([#2605](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2605))
    - detect problem with compiling CPU detection code in configure
        output in GROMACS simpleblock
        ([#2609](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2609))
    - use correct include directory for FlexiBLAS
        ([#2610](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2610))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - unset `$SIMPLEBUILD_*` environment variables when running sanity
        check in SimpleBuildMeta simpleblock + also unset
        `$MODULES_LMCONFLICT` to avoid conflict when loading SimpleBuild
        module
        ([#2568](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2568))
    - ensure that all ABAQUS components get installed for ABAQUS
        2021.x (+ add support for enabling/disabling fe-safe)
        ([#2569](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2569))
    - fix subdir path in VTune simpleblock for 2021.x versions + add
        sanity check command
        ([#2576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2576))
    - make sure custom simpleblock for installing SimpleBuild respects
        requested version of Python (like `$EB_PYTHON`)
        ([#2581](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2581))
    - restore RPATH wrappers for OpenMPI sanity check
        ([#2582](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2582))
    - fix installation of libcp2k for recent CP2K versions
        ([#2585](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2585))
    - make version regex in OpenSSL wrapper simpleblock less strict
        (version string does not always end with a letter)
        ([#2597](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2597))
    - redefine `collect_exts_file_info` instead of now deprecated
        fetch_extension_sources in OCaml simpleblock
        ([#2603](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2603))
- other changes:
    - don't use `--config=mkl` for TensorFlow 2.4+
        ([#2583](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2583))
        - this fixes some performance related issues for TensorFlow,
            see
            <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/issues/2577>
            and
            <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/issues/14120>
    - fix support for recent imkl version in numexpr simpleblock
        ([#2606](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2606))
    - derive custom simpleblock from MotionCor2 from PackedBinary
        instead of SimpleBlock
        ([#2607](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2607))

## SimpleBuild v4.4.2 (September 7th 2021) {: #release_notes_eb442 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add per-extension timing in output produced by `eb` command
        ([#3734](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3734))
    - add definition for new toolchain `nvpsmpic` (NVHPC +
        ParaStationMPI + CUDA)
        ([#3736](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3736))
    - include list of missing libraries in warning about missing FFTW
        libraries in `imkl` toolchain component
        ([#3776](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3776))
    - check for recursive symlinks by default before copying a folder
        ([#3784](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3784))
    - add `--filter-ecs` configuration option to filter out
        simpleconfigs from set of simpleconfigs to install
        ([#3796](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3796))
    - check type of `source_tmpl` value for extensions, ensure it's a
        string value (not a list)
        ([#3799](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3799))
    - also define `$BLAS_SHARED_LIBS` & co in build environment
        (analogous to `$BLAS_STATIC_LIBS`)
        ([#3800](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3800))
    - report use of `--ignore-test-failure` in success message in
        output
        ([#3806](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3806))
    - add `get_cuda_cc_template_value` method to `SimpleConfig` class
        ([#3807](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3807))
    - add support for `fix_bash_shebang_for`
        ([#3808](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3808))
    - pick up `$MODULES_CMD` to facilitate using Environment Modules
        4.x as modules tool
        ([#3816](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3816))
    - use more sensible branch name for creating simpleblocks PR with
        `--new-pr`
        ([#3817](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3817))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - remove Python 2.6 from list of supported Python versions in
        `setup.py`
        ([#3767](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3767))
    - don't add directory that doesn't include any files to `$PATH`
        or `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`
        ([#3769](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3769))
    - make logdir writable also when `--stop`/`--fetch` is used and
        `--read-only-installdir` is enabled
        ([#3771](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3771))
    - fix forgotten renaming of `l` to `char` in `__init__.py` that is
        created for included Python modules
        ([#3773](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3773))
    - fix `verify_imports` by deleting all imported modules before
        re-importing them one by one
        ([#3780](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3780))
    - fix `ignore_test_failure` not set for Extension instances
        ([#3782](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3782))
    - update `iompi` toolchain to `intel-compiler` subtoolchain for
        oneAPI versions (>= `iompi` 2020.12)
        ([#3785](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3785))
    - don't parse patch files as simpleconfigs when searching for where
        patch file is used
        ([#3786](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3786))
    - make sure git clone with a tag argument actually downloads a tag
        ([#3795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3795))
    - fix CI by excluding GC3Pie 2.6.7 (which is broken with Python 2)
        and improve error reporting for option parsing
        ([#3798](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3798))
    - correctly resolve templates for patches in extensions when
        uploading to GitHub
        ([#3805](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3805))
    - add `--simplestack` to ignored options when submitting job
        ([#3813](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3813))
- other changes:
    - speed up tests by caching checked paths in `set_tmpdir` + less
        test cases for `test_compiler_dependent_optarch`
        ([#3802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3802))
    - speed up `set_parallel` method in `SimpleBlock` class
        ([#3812](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3812))

**simpleblocks**

- 4 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - CRISPR-DAV
        ([#2487](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2487)),
        jaxlib
        ([#2545](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2545)),
        ORCA
        ([#2504](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2504)),
        RepeatModeler
        ([#2470](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2470))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update ABAQUS simpleblock to support installation of v2020
        ([#2034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2034))
    - enable make check and sanity check exec for OpenMPI
        ([#2444](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2444))
    - fixed sanity check for later versions of Molpro
        ([#2499](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2499))
    - add Ampere to known GPU architectures for Kokkos in LAMMPS
        simpleblock
        ([#2510](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2510))
    - update sanity check in ESMF simpleblock to take into account new
        binary names from version 8.1.0 onwards
        ([#2512](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2512))
    - use `report_test_failure` in TensorFlow simpleblock
        ([#2519](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2519))
    - add support for imkl 2021.x in simpleblocks for
        - Amber
            ([#2527](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2527)),
            BerkeleyGW
            ([#2528](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2528)),
            CP2K
            ([#2529](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2529)),
            FreeFEM
            ([#2530](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2530)),
            GROMACS
            ([#2531](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2531)),
            numexpr
            ([#2532](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2532))
    - add `install_src` option and enhance `buildcmd` option in
        PythonPackage simpleblock
        ([#2534](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2534))
    - make sure AOCC commands like clang/flang pick up `GCCcore` as
        GCC toolchain
        ([#2538](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2538))
    - create `CMakeConfig` files for tbb >= 2020
        ([#2539](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2539))
    - find source dir for libunwind when building ldd for Clang
        versions >= 12.0.1
        ([#2540](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2540))
    - fix motorBike test in sanity check for OpenFOAM 9
        ([#2544](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2544))
    - generate and install pkg-config files for OpenSSL wrapper
        ([#2549](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2549))
    - don't run `setup.py config` for numpy >= 1.21, since it's no
        longer supported
        ([#2554](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2554))
    - update WIEN2k simpleblock to handle new Intel versions, WIEN2k
        v21, Perl dependency, and tuning of dimension parameters
        ([#2558](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2558))
    - remove PCRE from list of system libraries for TensorFlow 2.6.0
        ([#2559](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2559))
    - add support for also installing Tosca component in ABAQUS
        ([#2560](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2560))
    - update ABAQUS simpleblock to support installing of version 2021
        with hot fixes
        ([#2562](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2562))
    - update sanity check in VTune simpleblock for 2021.x versions
        ([#2563](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2563))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - handle failure of running `nvidia-smi` in TensorFlow tests
        ([#2506](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2506))
    - remove Python 2.6 from list of supported Python versions in
        `setup.py`
        ([#2507](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2507))
    - clean up installation of Tkinter
        ([#2509](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2509))
    - remove redundant `$CPATH` entry of tbb modules + fix
        `--module-only`
        ([#2511](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2511))
    - honor `--ignore-test-failure` in PythonPackage
        ([#2516](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2516))
    - use correct GTK+ version for OpenCV based on dependencies
        ([#2520](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2520))
    - ensure Python prep is done in sanity check + support debug
        builds in TensorFlow simpleblock
        ([#2522](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2522))
    - correct cleanup of single-letter local variable in `__init__` of
        `simplebuild.simpleblocks`
        ([#2524](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2524))
    - reset runtest to `None` in CMakePythonPackage
        ([#2536](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2536))
    - set `$I_MPI_ROOT` correctly for 2021.x in impi simpleblock
        ([#2537](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2537))
    - let Bundle simpleblock pick up custom simpleblock for components
        based on name if no simpleblock is specified explicitly
        ([#2543](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2543),
        [#2547](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2547))
    - explicitly use only OpenBLAS for PyTorch if MKL is not used
        ([#2448](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2448))
    - keep symlinks in cuDNN installations
        ([#2550](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2550))
    - use `${BLAS,LAPACK}_SHARED_LIBS` in GROMACS simpleblock for

        ([#2552](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2552))
    - copy the list to avoid changing the original lists in
        `DEFAULT_TARGETS_MAP` for Clang and LLVM
        ([#2556](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2556))
    - fix `pathsep` `join` bug that breaks installation of CUDA

        ([#2561](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2561))
- other changes:

    - remove deprecated options from PythonPackage
        ([#2535](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2535))

- various bug fixes, including:

    - switch ITK simpleconfigs to CMakePythonPackage simpleblock, also
        enable `-DITK_USE_SYSTEM_HDF5` configuration option, fix
        download URLs
        ([#13619](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13619))
    - use `build_type` instead of `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE` in
        `configopts` in MMseqs2 simpleconfigs
        ([#13620](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13620))
    - avoid using system GTK+3 and remove `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE`
        configure option in OpenCV simpleconfigs
        ([#13621](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13621))
    - remove `-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE` configure option and add
        checksums in LLVM simpleconfigs
        ([#13624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13624))
    - create libtinfo symlinks in simpleconfigs for ncurses with system
        toolchain
        ([#13658](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13658)),
        6.1
        ([#13661](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13661))
        and 6.2
        ([#13660](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13660))
    - increase test timeouts for PyTorch 1.8.1 and 1.9.0
        ([#13700](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13700))
    - rename CUDAcore to CUDA for v11.3.1 and v11.4.1 after merging
        foss/fosscuda, to ensure that `get_software_root('CUDA')` used
        in simpleblocks works
        ([#13874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13874))
    - use CUDA instead of CUDAcore in recent NVHPC comments
        ([#13875](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13875))

## SimpleBuild v4.4.1 (July 6th 2021) {: #release_notes_eb441 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - enhance detection of patch files supplied to `eb` command with
        better error messages
        ([#3709](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3709))
    - add per-step timing information
        ([#3716](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3716))
    - add `module-write hook`
        ([#3728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3728))
    - add `ignore-test-failure` configuration option to ignore failing
        test step
        ([#3732](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3732))
    - add toolchain definition for nvompic (NVHPC + OpenMPI)
        ([#3735](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3735))
    - warn about generic milestone in `--review-pr` and `--merge-pr`
        ([#3751](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3751))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - don't override `COMPILER_MODULE_NAME`, inherited from `Ffmpi`,
        in Fujitsu toolchain definition
        ([#3721](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3721))
    - avoid overwriting `pr_nr` in `post_pr_test_report` for reports
        with `--include-simpleblocks-from-pr`
        ([#3724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3724),
        [#3726](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3726))
    - fix crash in `get_config_dict` when copying modules that were
        imported in simpleconfig file (like `import os`)
        ([#3729](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3729))
    - parse C standard flags in `CFLAGS` for Fujitsu compiler
        ([#3731](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3731))
    - fix error message for `--use-ccache`
        ([#3733](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3733))
    - error out when passing a list to `run_cmd*` to avoid running
        wrong command unintended, unless `shell=True` is used
        ([#3737](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3737))
    - minor fixes to output of test reports when using multiple PRs
        ([#3741](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3741))
    - fix location for modules installed with intel-compilers
        toolchain in HierarchicalMNS by always checking toolchain
        compiler name against template map
        ([#3745](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3745))
    - avoid checking `msg` attribute of `GitCommandError`
        ([#3756](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3756))
    - consider sources provided as dict in
        `SimpleBlock.check_checksums_for`
        ([#3758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3758))
    - don't make changes to software installation directory when
        using `--sanity-check-only`
        ([#3761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3761))
    - honor specified simpleblock for extensions
        ([#3762](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3762))
- other changes:
    - make sure that tests requiring a github token have `github` in
        the test name so that they can be easily filtered
        ([#3730](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3730))
    - deprecate SimpleBuild bootstrap script
        ([#3742](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3742))
    - use temporary download folder in
        `test_http_header_fields_urlpat`
        ([#3755](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3755))

**simpleblocks**

- 5 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - AOMP
        ([#2435](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2435),
        [#2462](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2462),
        [#2464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2464)),
        FreeFEM
        ([#1969](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1969)),
        NCCL (built from source)
        ([#2337](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2337),
        [#2460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2460)),
        torchvision
        ([#2467](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2467)),
        UCX plugins
        ([#2491](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2491))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - enhance Amber simpleblock to support installing Amber via CMake
        ([#2445](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2445))
    - enhance ConfigureMake generic simpleblock to add support for
        building multiple build targets
        ([#2449](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2449),
        [#2479](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2479),
        [#2480](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2480))
    - enhance sanity check for Clang to verify if CUDA offload library
        was produced
        ([#2454](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2454))
    - update custom simpleblock for Boost to always build single and
        multi threaded versions
        ([#2456](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2456))
    - enhance `sitecustomize.py` in Python simpleblock to support
        overriding core Python packages, and allowing overriding in
        virtualenv
        ([#2458](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2458),
        [#2483](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2483))
    - update CMakeMake to handle old and new Boost/Boost.Python builds
        using custom simpleblock for Boost
        ([#2461](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2461))
    - add file prefix option to XALT simpleblock
        ([#2463](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2463))
    - enhance Java simpleblock to define `%(jdkarch)s` template
        ([#2472](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2472))
    - adjust Perl simpleblock to only check for a `man` subdirectory if
        groff is a dependency
        ([#2474](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2474))
    - support arbitrary version strings in OpenSSL wrapper and add
        `minimum_openssl_version` option
        ([#2475](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2475))
    - enhance Python simpleblock to explicitly disable installing
        core-pip when `install_pip` is not `True`
        ([#2476](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2476))
    - enhance intel-compiler simpleblock to include multipath include
        dir in `$CPATH`
        ([#2477](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2477))
    - enhance Hypre simpleblock to enable CUDA support
        ([#2482](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2482))
    - update Xmipp simpleblock for new version (v3.20.07)
        ([#2486](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2486))
    - enhance FFTW simpleblock to skip tests if `--mpi-tests` SimpleBuild
        configuration option is disabled
        ([#2490](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2490))
    - use `PYPI_SOURCE` as the default for `source_urls` of extensions
        of Python simpleconfigs
        ([#2493](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2493))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - only use siterc fix for NVHPC < 21.3
        ([#2453](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2453))
    - fix CPU-only runtime for dpcpp-generated executables in custom
        simpleblock for intel-compilers
        ([#2457](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2457))
    - always add `distinct_host_configuration=false` to build command
        for TensorFlow
        ([#2459](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2459))
    - disable installation of bundled BioPerl and HTSLib if they are
        dependencies of VEP
        ([#2468](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2468))
    - don't use list value for command to detect installed Python
        packages in TensorFlow simpleblock
        ([#2469](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2469))
    - change Bundle simpleblock to also collect `altroot` and
        `altversion` in the module step so they are set when running
        `--module-only`
        ([#2485](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2485))
    - always strip output from `gcc -print-multiarch` in
        intel-compilers simpleblock
        ([#2489](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2489))
    - don't overwrite all of `exts_default_options` in TensorFlow
        simpleblock
        ([#2494](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2494))
    - enhance GCC simpleblock to make sure that system GCC provides LTO
        support, and disable LTO when building MPFR if not
        ([#2498](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2498))
    - rework the dependency handling of OpenMPI to use explicit
        configure options to disable features if required dependency is
        not provided
        ([#2500](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2500),
        [#2501](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2501))

    - disable own avx detection of libfabric v1.12.1
        ([#13215](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13215))
    - add GCCcore-\[1-9\]\[0-9\].x to
        `test_dep_versions_per_toolchain_generation`
        ([#13243](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13243),
        [#13249](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13249),
        [#13251](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13251))
    - add patch to fix installation of TensorFlow 2.0.x
        ([#13248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13248))
    - add patch for recent GCCcore versions to fix compatibility with
        CUDA 11
        ([#13290](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13290))
    - fix install step for glew
        ([#13297](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13297))
    - update Boost 1.74.0 simpleconfigs to use `tagged_layout` rather
        than `boost_multi_thread`
        ([#13300](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13300))
    - avoid using PMIx from system instead of PMIx dependency
        specified via `--with-pmix` for OpenMPI 4.x
        ([#13307](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13307))
    - add patch for GCCcore 10.3.0 to prevent issues when compiling
        with nvcc
        ([#13310](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13310))
    - add patch for OpenMPI 4.0.x to fix building against (system) UCX
        version > 1.7
        ([#13329](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13329))
    - fix build of manta 1.6.0 on top of Boost 1.74.0
        ([#13338](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13338))
    - fix recent taxator-tk simpleconfigs by adding (back)
        `-DBoost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE=ON` configure option
        ([#13342](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13342))
- other changes:
    - disable `debuginfod` for elfutils to minimize required
        dependencies
        ([#13034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13034))
    - add bare Python 3.9.5 simpleconfig and use that as builddep for
        LLVM 11.1.0
        ([#13035](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13035))
    - remove misleading comment from Python >= 3.7 simpleconfigs,
        libffi is now also required for Python itself (no longer
        bundled)
        ([#13041](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13041))
    - use new custom simpleblock in torchvision simpleconfigs
        ([#13102](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13102))
    - remove superfluous TensorFlow patch
        ([#13223](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13223))
    - cleanup of simpleconfigs for (bundles) of Python packages: remove
        default `PYPI_SOURCE` source URLs + use `PythonBundle` rather
        than `Bundle` simpleblock
        ([#13253](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13253),
        [#13295](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13295),
        [#13336](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/13336))
    - update `README` with instructions for MATLAB simpleconfigs
        ([#12597](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12597))

## SimpleBuild v4.4.0 (June 2nd 2021) {: #release_notes_eb440 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - enhance `apply_regex_substitutions` to allow specifying action
        to take in case there are no matches
        ([#3440](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3440))
    - performance improvements for simpleconfig parsing and eb startup
        ([#3555](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3555))
    - add support for downloading simpleconfigs from multiple PRs with
        `--from-pr`
        ([#3605](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3605),
        [#3707](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3707),
        [#3708](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3708))
    - add support for prepending custom library paths in RPATH section
        via `--rpath-override-dirs`
        ([#3650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3650))
    - allow amending simpleconfig parameters which are not the default
        ([#3651](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3651))
    - update HierarchicalMNS for Intel OneAPI compilers
        ([#3653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3653))
    - add support for `--sanity-check-only`
        ([#3655](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3655))
    - add support for running commands asynchronously via `run_cmd` +
        `complete_cmd` functions
        ([#3656](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3656))
    - add support for using oneAPI versions of 'intel' toolchain
        components
        ([#3665](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3665))
    - add toolchain definition for gofbf (foss with FlexiBLAS rather
        than OpenBLAS)
        ([#3666](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3666))
    - add support for using `ARCH` constant in simpleconfig files
        ([#3670](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3670))
    - honor keyboard interrupt in `eb` command
        ([#3674](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3674))
    - add toolchain definition for Fujitsu toolchain
        ([#3677](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3677),
        [#3704](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3704),
        [#3712](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3712),
        [#3713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3713),
        [#3714](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3714),
        [#3717](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3717))
    - extend sanity check step to check whether specific libraries are
        not linked into installed binaries/libraries
        ([#3678](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3678))
        - via `banned-linked-shared-libs` and
            `required-linked-shared-libs` SimpleBuild configuration
            options
        - via `banned_linked_shared_libs` and
            `required_linked_shared_libs` methods in toolchain support
        - via `banned_linked_shared_libs` and
            `required_linked_shared_libs` methods in simpleblock
        - via `banned_linked_shared_libs` and
            `required_linked_shared_libs` simpleconfig parameters
    - add `locate_solib` function to locate Linux shared libraries
        ([#3682](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3682))
    - add system agnostic function to locate shared libraries
        ([#3683](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3683))
    - add `update_build_option` function to update specific build
        options after initializing the SimpleBuild configuration
        ([#3684](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3684))
    - allow opting out of recursively unloaded of modules via
        recursive_module_unload simpleconfig parameter
        ([#3689](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3689))
    - check for correct version values when parsing simplestack file
        ([#3693](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3693))
    - run post-install commands specified for a specific extension
        ([#3696](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3696))
    - add support for `--skip-extensions`
        ([#3702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3702))
    - include PR title in output produced by `--merge-pr`
        ([#3706](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3706))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - avoid metadata greedy behaviour when probing for external module
        metadata (mostly relevant for integration with Cray Programming
        Environment)
        ([#3559](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3559))
    - catch problems early on if `--github-user` is not specified for
        `--new-pr` & co
        ([#3644](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3644))
    - re-enable write permissions when installing with
        `read-only-installdir`
        ([#3649](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3649))
    - also run sanity check for extensions when using `--module-only`
        ([#3655](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3655))
    - improve logging when failing to load class from `exts_classmap`
        ([#3657](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3657))
    - fix use of `--module-only` on existing installations without
        write permissions
        ([#3659](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3659))
    - correct help text for `subdir-user-modules`
        ([#3660](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3660))
    - avoid picking up simpleblocks outside of sandbox in framework
        tests
        ([#3680](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3680))
    - use unload/load in `ModuleGeneratorLua.swap_module`, since
        `swap` is not supported by Lmod
        ([#3685](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3685))
    - update HierarchicalMNS to also return
        'Toolchain/<name\>/<version\>' as `$MODULEPATH` extension
        for cpe* Cray toolchains
        ([#3686](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3686))
    - make `SimpleConfigParser.get_config_dict` return a copy rather
        than a reference
        ([#3692](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3692))
    - make sure that `$TAPE` is unset when using piped tar
        ([#3698](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3698))
    - fix extending message for changed files in `new_pr_from_branch`
        ([#3699](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3699))
    - enhance `sched_getaffinity` function to avoid early crash when
        counting available cores on systems with more than 1024 cores
        ([#3701](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3701))
    - correctly strip extension from filename in `extract_cmd` and
        `back_up_file` functions
        ([#3705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3705))
- other changes:
    - deprecate adding a non-existing path to `$MODULEPATH`
        ([#3637](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3637))
    - bump cryptography requirement from 3.2.1 to 3.3.2
        ([#3643](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3643),
        [#3648](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3648))
    - test bootstrap script in separate workflow, and limit test
        configurations a bit
        ([#3646](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3646))
    - update `setup.py` to indicate compatibility with Python 3.8 and
        3.9
        ([#3647](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3647))
    - replace `log_error` parameter of `which()` by `on_error`
        ([#3661](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3661),
        [#3664](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3664))
    - don't skip sanity check for `--module-only --rebuild`
        ([#3645](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3645))
    - move `disable_templating` function into the SimpleConfig class
        ([#3668](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3668))
    - pin GitPython version for Python<3.6, don't test bootstrap
        script against Python 3.8/3.9
        ([#3675](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3675))
    - tweak foss toolchain definition to switch from OpenBLAS to
        FlexiBLAS in foss/2021a
        ([#3679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3679))
    - suggest missing SSH key when not able to read from remote
        repository in `--check-github`
        ([#3681](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3681))
    - drop support for Python 2.6
        ([#3715](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3715))

**simpleblocks**

- 3 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - FlexiBLAS
        ([#2369](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2369),
        [#2422](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2422),
        [#2424](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2424),
        [#2426](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2426))
    - dm-reverb
        ([#2413](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2413))
    - custom simpleblock to install OpenSSL wrapper for OpenSSL
        installed in OS, with fallback to build and install OpenSSL from
        source if not available in OS
        ([#2429](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2429))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - also add `-pthread` to `prebuildopts` of cryptography
        ([#2270](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2270))
    - don't unpack Python wheel (*.whl) files by default in generic
        PythonPackage simpleblock
        ([#2366](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2366),
        [#2442](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2442))
    - enable installation of samples for CUDA > 10.1
        ([#2374](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2374))
    - add option to disable pip connecting to PyPi (enable use of
        `--no-index`)
        ([#2390](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2390))
    - update MotionCor2 simpleblock to handle new version and be aware
        of CUDAcore
        ([#2394](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2394))
    - make it possible to force disabling kernel features in Qt
        simpleblock
        ([#2403](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2403))
    - update imkl simpleblock to support oneAPI versions (>= 2021.x)
        ([#2407](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2407))
    - add`"gurobi_cl --help` as default sanity check command for
        Gurobi
        ([#2411](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2411))
    - enhance BWA simpleblock to copy includes and libraries
        ([#2417](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2417))
    - allow `default` versions to be defined by ModuleRC simpleblock
        ([#2418](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2418))
    - enhance MesonNinja and CMakeMake simpleblocks to create unused
        build dir when `separate_build_dir` is set
        ([#2419](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2419))
    - enable `sanity_pip_check` by default for Python simpleconfigs if
        pip >= 9.0 will be installed
        ([#2423](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2423))
    - enhance FFTW simpleblock to support SVE CPU feature and building
        with Fujitsu compiler
        ([#2425](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2425))
    - make ScaLAPACK simpleblock aware of FlexiBLAS
        ([#2427](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2427))
    - update imkl simpleblock to unpack example tarballs and set
        `$MKL_EXAMPLES` (+ some code cleanup)
        ([#2430](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2430))
    - update list of system libs for TensorFlow 2.5
        ([#2432](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2432))
    - allow disabling MPI tests when installing Intel MPI (impi) via
        `--disable-mpi-tests`
        ([#2440](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2440))
    - exclude bottleneck tests in PyTorch
        ([#2450](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2450))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - ensure lib subdirectory is found in stage 2 of GCC
        installation + fall back to lib64
        ([#2339](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2339))
    - fix permission on MATLAB installer config file so it can be
        written to
        ([#2385](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2385))
    - fix problem with installing older CUDA versions that uses the
        Perl based installer
        ([#2387](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2387))
    - enhance Python simpleblock: add option to install pip with core
        Python, tweak defaults, create unversioned pip symlink
        ([#2388](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2388))
    - fix `installopts` before installing the extension in GROMACS
        simpleblock
        ([#2391](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2391))
    - updated numpy simpleblock to use `read_file` for patch
        ([#2395](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2395))
    - use explicit build toolset and compiler path in Boost simpleblock
        ([#2402](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2402))
    - replace hardcoded `2021.1.1` with `self.version` in impi
        simpleblock
        ([#2405](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2405))
    - set `$SANDCASTLE` when running PyTorch tests to disable some
        tests as-if we are on Facebook's CI
        ([#2412](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2412))
    - make GROMACS simpleblock work with `--module-only`
        ([#2414](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2414))
    - make sure OpenFOAM sanity checks don't require builddir write
        permissions
        ([#2415](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2415))
    - make Tkinter simpleblock work with `--module-only`
        ([#2416](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2416))
    - also disable altivec with FFTW 3.3.9 on POWER
        ([#2437](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2437))
    - make sure that `self.python_cmd` is set before using it in
        `PythonPackage.sanity_check_step`
        ([#2447](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2447))
- other changes, including:
    - update `setup.py` to indicate compatibility with Python 3.8 and
        3.9
        ([#2384](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2384))
    - use `on_error` rather than deprecated `log_error` named argument
        for `which` function
        ([#2406](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2406))
    - remove `cuda_compute_capabilities` from custom simpleconfig
        parameters for Clang, LAMMPS and TensorFlow (now supported as
        general simpleconfig parameter)
        ([#2433](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2433))

## SimpleBuild v4.3.4 (Apr 9th 2021) {: #release_notes_eb434 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for filtering dependencies by using `False` as
        version
        ([#3506](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3506))
    - add `create_unused_dir` function to create a directory which
        does not yet exist
        ([#3551](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3551))
    - avoid running expensive `module use` and `module unuse` commands
        when using Lmod as modules tool, update `$MODULEPATH` directly
        instead
        ([#3557](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3557),
        [#3633](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3633))
    - create CUDA cache (for JIT compiled PTX code) in build dir
        instead of `$HOME`
        ([#3569](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3569))
    - add "Citing" section to module files
        ([#3596](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3596))
    - add support for using fallback `arch=*` key in dependency
        version specified as arch->version mapping
        ([#3600](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3600))
    - also check for pending change requests and mergeable_state in
        `check_pr_eligible_to_merge`
        ([#3604](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3604))
    - ignore undismissed `changes requested` review if there is an
        `approved` review by the same user
        ([#3607](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3607),
        [#3608](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3608))
    - sort output of `eb --search` in natural order (respecting
        numbers)
        ([#3609](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3609))
    - enhance `eb` command to ensure that `simplebuild.main` can be
        imported before settling on python* command to use
        ([#3610](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3610))
    - add `--env-for-shebang` configuration option to define the `env`
        command to use for shebangs
        ([#3613](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3613))
    - add templates for architecture independent Python wheels
        ([#3618](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3618))
    - mention simpleblocks PR in gist when uploading test report for
        it + fix `clean_gists.py` script
        ([#3622](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3622))
    - also accept regular expression value for `--accept-eula-for`
        ([#3630](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3630))
    - update `validate_github_token` function to accept GitHub token
        in new format
        ([#3632](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3632))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix `$BLAS_LIB_MT` for OpenBLAS, ensure `-lpthread` is included
        ([#3584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3584))
    - use `--opt=val` for passing settings from config file to option
        parser to avoid error for values starting with `-` or `--`
        ([#3594](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3594))
    - avoid raised exception when getting output from interactive
        command in `run_cmd_qa`
        ([#3599](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3599))
    - add option to write file from file-like object and use in
        `download_file`
        ([#3614](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3614))
    - make sure that path to `eb` is always found by tests
        ([#3617](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3617))
- other changes:
    - add `pick_default_branch` function to clean up duplicate code in
        `tools/github.py`
        ([#3592](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3592))
    - refactor the CI configuration to use inclusion instead of
        exclusion
        ([#3616](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3616))
    - use develop branch when testing push access in `--check-github`
        ([#3629](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3629))
    - deprecate `--accept-eula`, rename to `--accept-eula-for`
        ([#3630](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3630))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements, including:
    - make OpenCV simpleblock aware of protobuf, libwebp and OpenEXR
        dependencies provided via SimpleBuild
        ([#2346](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2346))
    - update CP2K simpleblock w.r.t. running regtest for CP2K v8.1
        ([#2350](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2350))
    - update GROMACS simpleblock for GROMACS/2021 with CUDA
        ([#2353](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2353))
    - adjust call to `python-config` for Python >= 3.8 in VMD
        simpleblock
        ([#2355](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2355))
    - enhance cuDNN and CUDA simpleblocks to support `aarch64`
        ([#2356](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2356))
    - pass down compiler flags provided by SimpleBuild in g2clib
        simpleblock
        ([#2357](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2357))
    - update VTune simpleblock for version 2020
        ([#2359](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2359))
    - make WRF and WPS simpleblocks aware of `(pre)configopts`
        ([#2361](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2361))
    - add Clang version 12.0.0 for AOCC 3.0.0 to mapping in custom
        simpleblock for AOCC
        ([#2362](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2362))
    - use `PYPI_SOURCE` as the default for source_urls of
        PythonPackage
        ([#2364](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2364),
        [#2370](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2370))
    - enhance PythonPackage simpleblock to catch faulty version (0.0.0)
        for installed Python packages
        ([#2367](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2367),
        [#2377](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2377))
    - enhance BWA simpleblock: pass compiler flags + use `filetools`
        functions
        ([#2368](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2368))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - set `$R_LIBS_SITE` rather than `$R_LIBS` when installing R
        packages
        ([#2326](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2326))
    - update PETSc simpleblock to take into account that ScaLAPACK
        installation may not have header files + fix building in
        parallel
        ([#2348](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2348))
    - disable CMake user package repository in CMakeMake generic
        simpleblock
        ([#2351](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2351))
    - update LAPACK simpleblock to keep control of compiler options for
        versions >= 3.9.0
        ([#2358](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2358))
    - also set `$TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST` for PyTorch tests
        ([#2363](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2363))
    - enhance Hadoop simpleblock to avoid copying same native library
        twice
        ([#2371](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2371))
    - fix pip extension download pattern for PythonPackage simpleblock
        ([#2372](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2372))
    - make the CUDA stub libs take preference over system libs when
        linking
        ([#2373](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2373))
    - improve Python package version check and add
        `unversioned_packages` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#2377](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2377))

**simpleconfigs**

- added simpleconfig for goblf/2020b toolchain
    ([#12381](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12381),
    [#12535](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12535))
- added example simpleconfig files for 41 new software packages:
    - amplimap
        ([#12205](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12205)),
        BEEF
        ([#12104](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12104)),
        bpp
        ([#12036](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12036)),
        Brotli
