## SimpleBuild v4.3.3 (Feb 23rd 2021) {: #release_notes_eb433 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - advise PR labels in `--review-pr` and add support for
        `--add-pr-labels`
        ([#3177](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3177))
    - add support for using customized HTTP headers in `download_file`
        ([#3472](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3472),
        [#3583](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3583))
    - also take toolchain dependencies into account when defining
        template values
        ([#3541](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3541),
        [#3560](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3560))
    - add support for `--accept-eula` configuration option +
        `accept_eula` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#3535](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3535),
        [#3536](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3536),
        [#3546](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3546))
    - detect `SYSTEM` toolchain as special case in simplestack files
        ([#3543](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3543))
    - enhance `extract_cmd` function to use `cp -a` for shell scripts
        (.sh)
        ([#3545](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3545))
    - allow use of alternate envvar(s) to `$HOME` for user modules
        ([#3558](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3558))
    - use <https://sources.simplebuild.io> as fallback source URL
        ([#3572](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3572),
        [#3576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3576))
    - add toolchain definition for `iibff` toolchain
        ([#3574](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3574))
    - add `%(cuda_cc_space_sep)s` and `%(cuda_cc_semicolon_sep)s`
        templates
        ([#3578](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3578))
    - add support for intel-compiler toolchain (>= 2021.x versions,
        oneAPI)
        ([#3581](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3581),
        [#3582](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3582))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - add `--init` and `--recursive` options to `git submodule update`
        command that is used when creating source tarball for specific
        commit
        ([#3537](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3537))
    - filter out duplicate paths in RPATH wrapper script
        ([#3538](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3538))
    - don't clean up imported modules after verifying imports of
        included Python modules
        ([#3544](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3544))
    - avoid no-op changes to `$LD_*` environment variables in
        ModulesTool
        ([#3553](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3553))
    - fix UTF-8 encoding errors when running SimpleBuild with Python
        3.0.x-3.6.x
        ([#3565](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3565))
    - create `lib64` symlink as a relative symlink
        ([#3566](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3566))
    - don't reuse variable name in the loop to fix adding extra
        compiler flags via toolchainopts
        ([#3571](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3571))
    - symlink `lib` to `lib64` if it doesn't exist
        ([#3580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3580))
    - include `%(mpi_cmd_prefix)s` and `%(cuda_*)s` templates in
        output of `--avail-simpleconfig-templates`
        ([#3586](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3586))
- other changes:
    - rename `SimpleBlock._skip_step` to `SimpleBlock.skip_step`, to make
        it part of the public API
        ([#3561](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3561))
    - make symlinking of `posix_c.so` to `posix.so` in test suite
        configuration conditional
        ([#3570](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3570))

**simpleblocks**

- 2 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - AOCC
        ([#2295](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2295)),
        Intel compilers (v2021.x, oneAPI)
        ([#2305](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2305))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - run motorBike tutorial case as sanity check for recent
        (community) OpenFOAM versions
        ([#2201](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2201))
    - add foamMonitor to sanity checks of OpenFOAM
        ([#2256](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2256))
    - create versioned symlinks for CMake commands + create symlink
        for `cmake3` in PyTorch simpleblock if `cmake3` command is not
        found
        ([#2259](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2259))
    - improve Bazel simpleblock: add support for running tests, enable
        static linking, use build dir rather than `tmpdir`, verbose
        output
        ([#2285](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2285))
    - add support for skipping steps in Python packages installed as
        extension + print progress on individual steps for installing
        Python packages as extensions
        ([#2290](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2290))
    - update BerkeleyGW simpleblock to support GCC 10 and fftlib
        ([#2297](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2297))
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock to support GCC 10
        ([#2298](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2298))
    - update Clang simpleblock to add support for building extra tools +
        leveraging hwloc and Z3 as optional dependencies
        ([#2310](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2310))
    - add support for running TensorFlow CPU and GPU tests
        ([#2263](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2263),
        [#2292](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2292),
        [#2312](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2312))
    - update impi simpleblock for impi 2021.x (oneAPI)
        ([#2313](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2313))
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock to handle v6.7
        ([#2319](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2319))
    - update OpenFOAM simpleblock for changes in v2012
        ([#2321](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2321))
    - add sanity check commands to GCC (including LTO support)
        ([#2322](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2322))
    - update FLUENT sanity check for v2021R1
        ([#2334](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2334))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - filter out user packages in LAMMPS simpleblock if corresponding
        dependency isn't included + only set `-DUSER-INTEL` on x86_64
        systems
        ([#2254](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2254))
    - unify handling of `pylibdirs` and don't add duplicated
        `$PYTHONPATH` in PythonBundle
        ([#2281](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2281))
    - enhance Amber simpleblock to fix running of `update_amber` script
        when `python` command is not available in OS
        ([#2282](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2282))
    - guard `module unload` statements in modules for Cray*
        toolchains
        ([#2286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2286))
    - set `$PYTHONNOUSERSITE` in `PythonBundle.extensions_step` to
        avoid picking up on Python packages installed in $HOME
        ([#2289](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2289))
    - create less temporary directories for TensorFlow by (only) using
        `--output_user_root`
        ([#2293](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2293))
    - fix logic w.r.t. enabling Python support in PETSc
        ([#2299](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2299))
    - make `builddeps` a list of names in SLEPc simpleblock
        ([#2300](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2300))
    - make `builddeps` a list of names in Trilinos simpleblock
        ([#2301](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2301))
    - make sure the installation of `libiberty.a` in the binutils
        simpleblock goes into a populated directory
        ([#2308](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2308))
    - fix for building GCC with `--sysroot` on ppc64le
        ([#2315](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2315))
    - fix OpenFOAM sanity check on POWER
        ([#2320](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2320))
    - use library search paths of compiler for RPATH when building
        binutils with system compiler + enhance sanity check by running
        `--version` for binutils commands
        ([#2323](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2323),
        [#2327](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2327))
    - pass `$CXXFLAGS` to PDT's configure script via `-useropt`
        ([#2324](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2324))
    - pass down compilation flags from build environment for ESMF
        ([#2325](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2325))
    - update URLs for test data for WRF to `https`
        ([#2335](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2335))
    - read MATLAB configuration file in binary mode to avoid UTF-8
        encoding errors when using Python 3.6
        ([#2340](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2340))
    - fix Boost sanity check on POWER
        ([#2291](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2291))
        and aarch64
        ([#2341](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2341))
- other changes, including:
    - rework module-only tests to use unique software name (rather
        than 'foo')
        ([#2287](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2287))
    - prefer default value for extra options in simpleblock tests
        ([#2280](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2280),
        [#2302](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2302))
    - add check for accepted EULA in custom simpleblock for NVHPC
        ([#2311](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2311))
    - update optional feature support of TensorFlow
        ([#2314](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2314))
    - make symlinking of `posix_c.so` to `posix.so` in test suite
        configuration conditional
        ([#2330](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2330))

        ([#11928](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11928),
        [#12088](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12088))
    - update Bison (build) dependency for flex built with system
        compiler to v3.5.3
        ([#12111](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12111))
    - make symlinking of `posix.so` in test suite configuration
        conditional
        ([#12123](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12123))
    - move make 4.3 simpleconfigs to GCCcore toolchain
        ([#12166](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12166))
    - move most recent BLIS and libFLAME simpleconfigs from GCC to
        GCCcore
        ([#12168](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12168))
    - rename SNAP to SNAP-HMM and update simpleconfig
        ([#12218](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/12218))

## SimpleBuild v4.3.2 (December 10th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb432 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- add (experimental) support for specifying simpleconfig files via an
    "simplestack" file
    ([#3479](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3479),
    [#3511](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3511),
    [#3515](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3515),
    [#3517](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3517),
    [#3520](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3520),
    [#3521](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3521))
    - see also
        <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Simplestack-files.html>
- add definition for new `gobff` toolchain using BLIS and LibFLAME
    ([#3505](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3505))
- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for toolchain options like `extra_cxxflags` to
        specify extra compiler options
        ([#2193](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2193))
    - fix combination of `--copy-ec` and `--from-pr`
        ([#3482](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3482))
    - enhance `copy_files` function: support single file target, error
        on empty input list, support verbose mode
        ([#3483](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3483))
    - cache result of `fetch_files_from_pr` function (mainly to speed
        up framework test suite)
        ([#3484](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3484))
    - add `locate_files` function to filetools module
        ([#3485](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3485))
    - add support for `%(module_name)s` template value
        ([#3497](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3497))
    - clarify input format for `--cuda-compute-capabilities` in
        `eb --help` output
        ([#3509](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3509))
    - add support for skipping unit tests (test step) via
        `--skip-test-step`
        ([#3524](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3524))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - also ignore `vsc.*` imports coming from from
        `pkg_resources/__init__.py` (setuptools) in fake vsc namespace
        ([#3491](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3491))
    - don't pass username in `github_api_get_request` when no GitHub
        token is available
        ([#3494](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3494))
    - also inject `-rpath` options for all entries in `$LIBRARY_PATH`
        in `RPATH` wrappers
        ([#3495](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3495))
    - avoid `TypeError` being raised by `list_toolchains`
        ([#3499](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3499))
    - check if PR is already merged in `--merge-pr`
        ([#3502](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3502))
    - graciously handle wrong PR id in `fetch_pr_data`
        ([#3503](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3503))
    - fix regression in `apply_regex_substitutions`: also accept list
        of paths to patch
        ([#3507](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3507))
    - update installation procedure for SimpleBuild in generated
        Singularity container recipes
        ([#3510](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3510))
    - fix GitHub Actions workflow for test suite: run outside of repo
        checkout + also test bootstrap script with Python 3.9
        ([#3518](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3518))
    - bump cryptography from 2.9.2 to 3.2 for Python 2 in
        `requirements.txt`
        ([#3519](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3519))
    - fix `eb --help=rst` when running with Python 3
        ([#3525](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3525))
- other changes:
    - exclude test configurations with Lmod 7 and Python 3, except for
        Python 3.6
        ([#3496](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3496))
    - significantly speed up parsing of simpleconfig files by only
        extracting comments from an simpleconfig file when they're
        actually needed
        ([#3498](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3498))
    - don't include `file`/`ldd`/`readelf` commands run during RPATH
        sanity check in `--trace` output
        ([#3508](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3508))

**simpleblocks**

- 2 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - code-server
        ([#2255](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2255)),
        Metagenome-Atlas
        ([#2219](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2219))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - add `-fallow-argument-mismatch` option when building CP2K 7.1 or
        older with GCC 10.x
        ([#2223](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2223))
    - update TensorFlow simpleblock for upcoming TensorFlow 2.4
        ([#2225](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2225))
    - add support for building Clang with OpenMP offload support
        ([#2229](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2229))
    - enhance OpenMPI simpleblock to catch any `--with-ucx*` configure
        options
        ([#2230](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2230))
    - take into account `preinstallopts` and `installopts` in custom
        simpleblock for NCL
        ([#2234](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2234))
    - add support for `withnvptx` simpleconfig parameter, to enable GPU
        offloading, in GCC simpleblock
        ([#2235](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2235))
    - take into account versions like `4.x` in OpenFOAM simpleblock
        ([#2239](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2239))
    - also add `bin` subdir to `$PATH` when installing a Python
        package
        ([#2244](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2244))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix two bugs in GROMACS simpleblock when using GCC & MKL for FFT
        and BLAS/LAPACK
        ([#2212](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2212))
    - fix version check in Qt5 simpleblock w.r.t. disabling features on
        old Linux kernel versions
        ([#2220](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2220))
    - always define `$FCCPP` in QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock (not just
        when using Intel compilers)
        ([#2221](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2221))
    - allow wxPython to be installed as an extension
        ([#2227](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2227),
        [#2275](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2275))
    - only configure Python with `--enable-optimizations` when
        compiling Python with (recent) GCC compiler
        ([#2228](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2228))
    - fix sanity check for Boost MT libraries
        ([#2231](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2231))
    - fix hardcoded path in NVHPC simpleblock to support multiple
        architectures
        ([#2233](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2233))
    - fix `CPASSERT` test faults on RHEL8 in CP2K simpleblock
        ([#2236](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2236))
    - stop silently ignoring failing numpy tests, but include support
        for ignoring (failing) numpy tests
        ([#2238](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2238),
        [#2271](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2271))
    - append to module guesses in simpleblocks for Chapel, icc, imkl and
        impi (rather than overwriting guesses from parent simpleblock)
        ([#2242](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2242))
    - weed out duplicates when determining paths to `include-fixed`
        subdirectory in GCC simpleblock
        ([#2245](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2245))
    - prepend all hardcoded `/usr/*` paths with sysroot in Python's
        setup.py installation script
        ([#2246](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2246))
    - don't try to patch newer versions of Bazel where the patches
        won't apply
        ([#2249](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2249))
    - fix setting of `$RUNPARALLEL` in HDF5 simpleblock
        ([#2250](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2250))
    - move `--build` and `--host` logic to `run_configure_cmd` in GCC
        simpleblock
        ([#2252](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2252))
    - set `$UCX_TLS` in module for impi installation on top of UCX,
        and allow it to be overwritten in impi simpleconfig file
        ([#2253](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2253),
        [#2258](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2258))
    - enhance PyTorch simpleblock to ensure it finds MKL (via
        `$MKLROOT`)
        ([#2257](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2257))
    - use integer division to determine number MPI ranks to use in WRF
        test step
        ([#2266](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2266))
    - also specify `locincpth` and `glibpth` configure options for
        Perl based on `--sysroot`
        ([#2268](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2268))
- other changes, including:
    - add link to GCC mailing list thread confirming that binutils
        should not be configured with
        `--with-sysroot=$SIMPLEBUILD_SYSROOT` when GCC is being configured
        like that
        ([#2215](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2215))
    - pass paths to patch one by one to `apply_regex_substitutions` in
        GCC simpleblock when `--sysroot` is set
        ([#2217](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2217))
        - workaround for regression in `apply_regex_substitutions`
            introduced in SimpleBuild v4.3.1 (which was fixed for v4.3.2)

## SimpleBuild v4.3.1 (October 29th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb431 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - further GCC toolchain fixes for aarch64
        ([#3433](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3433))
    - take into account `--include-simpleblocks-from-pr` when uploading
        test reports
        ([#3446](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3446))
    - add path to pkg-config files in sysroot to `$PKG_CONFIG_PATH`
        when `--sysroot` is specified
        ([#3451](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3451))
    - add support for NVHPC compiler + toolchain (based on PGI)
        ([#3454](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3454))
    - check for \_VERSION and \_PREFIX Cray environment variables with
        both software and module name
        ([#3460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3460))
    - allow including simpleblocks from multiple PRs
        ([#3480](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3480),
        [#3481](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3481))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - avoid `UnicodeDecodeError` in `apply_regex_substitutions` when
        patching files that include non-UTF-8 characters
        ([#3450](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3450))
    - avoid appending lib stubs pattern to RPATH filter over and over
        again
        ([#3452](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3452))
    - fix missing string template on error for incorrect extension
        `sources` value
        ([#3461](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3461))
    - fix compatibility with Python 3.9 by renaming fancy root logger
        ([#3465](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3465))
    - also remove empty checksums list specified in simpleconfig file
        when using `--inject-checksums`
        ([#3466](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3466))
    - avoid confusing error log message when determining impi version
        while trying to define value for `%(mpi_cmd_prefix)s` template
        ([#3474](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3474))
    - unset `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` when checking for OS dependencies with
        `rpm` & co
        ([#3477](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3477))
    - don't change directory in `download_repo` function in
        `tools.github`
        ([#3486](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3486))
    - take `source_urls`, `checksums`, `patches` into account when
        extension source is specified via `sources`
        ([#3487](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3487))
- other changes:
    - consider `$EB_INSTALLPYTHON` in `eb` command to specify `python`
        command to use for running SimpleBuild
        ([#3428](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3428))
    - use only the sub folder name for `createSubmoduleDeps` script
        ([#3464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3464))

**simpleblocks**

- 2 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - CFDEMcoupling
        ([#1439](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1439)),
        NVHPC
        ([#2190](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2190))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - support having PyQt5 installed as part of Qt5 in QScintilla
        simpleblock
        ([#2040](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2040))
    - update TensorFlow simpleblock to put Bazel build files in build
        directory + avoid unnecessary runtime patching
        ([#2166](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2166))
    - update CBLAS simpleblock for toolchains that include imkl
        ([#2175](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2175))
    - add workaround for duplicate prefix path in Eigen CMake config
        ([#2176](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2176))
    - enable `CTEST_OUTPUT_ON_FAILURE` for CMakeMake test step
        ([#2181](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2181))
    - add XLA build support to TensorFlow simpleblock
        ([#2182](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2182))
    - also consider libfabric dep (`--with-ofi`) when setting default
        OpenMPI configure options
        ([#2184](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2184))
    - make simpleblock for installing CMake aware of `--sysroot`
        ([#2187](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2187))
    - make OpenBLAS respect the parallelism set by simplebuild
        ([#2191](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2191))
    - handle option of building Michigan State University CCT3 &
        CCSD3A methods in GAMESS_US simpleblock
        ([#2194](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2194))
    - add support to RubyGem simpleblock for installing zipped gems
        ([#2203](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2203))
    - update ScaLAPACK simpleblock to support installation with CMake
        for recent versions (>= v2.1.0)
        ([#2205](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2205))
    - update Score-P simpleblock to add support for NVHPC toolchain
        ([#2206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2206))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - add `torch/lib` subdirectory in Python lib dir to
        `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` for PyTorch installations
        ([#2183](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2183))
    - update MUMmer simpleblock to use `apply_regex_substitutions` and
        `copy_file` functions
        ([#2185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2185))
    - configure OpenMPI 4.x with `--without-verbs` when using UCX
        ([#2188](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2188))
    - take into account that zlib may be listed in `--filter-deps` in
        custom simpleblock for XML R package
        ([#2189](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2189))
    - add sanity check commands to Clang simpleblock and print warning
        for missing ncurses
        ([#2193](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2193))
    - enhance OpenFOAM simpleblock to add symlinks for libraries to
        ensure `mpi` versions have preference over `dummy` versions
        ([#2196](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2196))
    - leverage installed OpenSSL/BoringSSL when cURL is used as a
        dependency for TensorFlow
        ([#2197](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2197))
    - add `-ffree-line-length-none` to gfortran flags in Siesta
        simpleblock
        ([#2204](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2204))
    - respect `--disable-mpi-tests` in Siesta simpleblock
        ([#2207](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2207))
- other changes, including:
    - set `$EB_INSTALLPYTHON` in module generated for SimpleBuild rather
        than setting `$EB_PYTHON`, to allow overriding Python command to
        be used for running SimpleBuild with `$EB_PYTHON`
        ([#2109](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2109))
    - remove unused custom simpleblock for DIRAC
        ([#2192](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2192),
        [#2198](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2198))

        ([#11458](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11458))
    - add support for building OpenBLAS on ARM TSV110 with GCC 8.3
        ([#11464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11464))
    - allow Kent_tools to build when MySQL installed at the OS level
        ([#11471](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11471))
    - add missing `moduleclass` to simpleconfigs for:
        - Arlequin 3.5.2.2
            ([#11473](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11473)),
            MEGAHIT 1.2.8
            ([#11474](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11474))
            and 1.2.9
            ([#11475](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11475)),
            PyCUDA 2019.1.2
            ([#11476](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11476))
    - fix source for SQLite 3.31.1
        ([#11483](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11483))
    - fix installation of worker 1.6.11 with intel/2019b on RHEL 8.2
        ([#11498](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11498))
    - fix checksum in NAMD 2.12 simpleconfigs + add source URL
        ([#11515](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11515))
    - add BLAS/LAPACK check to GPAW patch adding SimpleBuild
        configuration files
        ([#11523](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11523))
    - backport fixes for Score-P v6.0
        ([#11540](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11540))
    - add XZ build dep to simpleconfigs for libarchive v3.4.0 and v3.4.2
        ([#11561](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11561))
    - add patch for OpenMPI 3.1.4 adding device parameters for
        ConnectX-6
        ([#11575](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11575))
- other changes:
    - update README on constructing source file for MATLAB
        ([#6341](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6341))
    - remove simpleconfigs for Taiyaki that depend on PyTorch 1.3.1,
        since latest version still requires PyTorch 1.2.0
        ([#11301](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11301))
    - make CI error messages less confusing ("is" -> "should be")
        ([#11314](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11314))
    - remove extensions from R-bundle-Bioconductor 3.11 simpleconfigs
        that are also included in R 4.0.0
        ([#11429](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11429))
    - cache M4 source tarball to avoid test failures because of
        download problems
        ([#11469](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11469))
    - rename jupyterhub to JupyterHub
        ([#11571](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/11571))

## SimpleBuild v4.3.0 (September 13th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb430 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add script to create `sources` entries for git submodules
        ([#3369](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3369),
        [#3436](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3436))
    - add templates for CUDA compute capabilities
        ([#3382](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3382))
        - `%(cuda_compute_capabilities)s`, `%(cuda_sm_comma_sep)s`,
            `%(cuda_sm_space_sep)s`
    - add SimpleBuild configuration option `--generate-devel-module`
        ([#3388](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3388))
        - to allow disabling generating of "devel" modules via
            `--disable-generate-devel-module`
    - set up a minimal build environment when using system compiler
        ([#3399](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3399))
        - by default, `$CC` is set to `gcc` and `$CXX` is set to `g++`
            when using `system` toolchain
        - minimal build environment can be customized via
            `--minimal-build-env` configuration option
    - add `--sysroot` configuration option to specify alternative
        location of system root
        ([#3419](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3419))
        - this is useful when installing software in a Gentoo Prefix
            environment (for example)
- various bug fixes, including:
    - allow including simpleblocks from multiple locations, by combining
        `--include-simpleblocks` and `--include-simpleblocks-from-pr`
        ([#3311](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3311))
    - also escape backslashes in `quote_py_str()`
        ([#3386](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3386))
    - use one argument `module swap` statements in Tcl modulefiles
        (required by Modules 4.2.3+)
        ([#3397](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3397))
    - fix copying of (non-existing) file with `apply_patch`
        ([#3400](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3400))
    - create symlink from `lib64` to `lib` subdir in installation
        directories to avoid that GCC prefers `/lib64` system
        directories
        ([#3401](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3401))
    - fix default value for `lib64_fallback_sanity_check` build option
        ([#3402](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3402))
    - correctly determine commit status in `--merge-pr`
        ([#3406](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3406))
    - stop installing ccache wrapper for Fortran compiler
        ([#3409](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3409))
    - fix issues with applying PR patch in `--from-pr`
        ([#3414](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3414))
    - make `RPATH` wrapper script more robust by using
        `python -E -s -S` to run `rpath_args.py`
        ([#3422](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3422))
    - don't inject `-Wl,-rpath` options when `-x c++-header` compiler
        option is used
        ([#3424](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3424))
    - fix lack of `-mno-recip` on aarch64 by tweaking GCC options used
        when `precise` toolchain option is enabled
        ([#3425](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3425))
    - make sure `self.start_dir` is set in `ExtensionSimpleBlock`
        ([#3426](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3426),
        [#3435](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3435))
    - exclude local variables from typo check in simpleconfig files
        ([#3427](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3427))
- other changes:
    - stick to cryptography 2.9.2 when using Python 2.7 to avoid
        broken test suite in CI
        ([#3392](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3392))
    - automatically enable `--ignore-locks` with `--fetch`
        ([#3404](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3404))
    - switch to status badge based on tests run in GitHub Actions CI
        in README
        ([#3415](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3415))
    - make `flake8` code style checks pass
        ([#3416](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3416),
        [#3417](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3417))
    - limit Travis to only test with Python 2.6 + Lmod 7
        ([#3418](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3418))
    - ignore deprecation warning raised for cryptography when using
        Python 3.5 produced by output of test suite
        ([#3423](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3423))

**simpleblocks**

- 2 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - pybind11
        ([#2115](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2115)),
        PyTorch
        ([#2104](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2104))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update MATLAB simpleblock to use new binary installer for versions
        >= 2020a
        ([#2058](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2058))
    - add `use_pip_requirement` custom simpleconfig parameter to
        PythonPackage simpleblock to allow providing a requirements file
        to the `pip` command, as a source
        ([#2064](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2064))
    - update CP2K simpleblock for recent versions (>= 7.0)
        ([#2069](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2069))
    - add `multi_deps` support into custom simpleblock for QScintilla
        ([#2077](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2077))
    - update Mothur simpleblock for v1.44.0 and higher
        ([#2084](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2084))
    - update MotionCor2 simpleblock to add support for v1.3.2
        ([#2100](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2100))
    - update Tinker simpleblock to handle skipping of tests depending on
        version and link with `fftw_omp`
        ([#2102](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2102))
    - launch test & sanity check commands through `mpirun` for
        netcdf4-python if MPI support is enabled
        ([#2106](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2106))
    - check for installation of pip & setuptools in Python 3.4+
        ([#2108](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2108))
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock to support version 6.6
        ([#2112](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2112))
    - allow NAMD to be built on POWER, and also use the CUDA arch info
        ([#2113](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2113),
        [#2123](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2123))
    - update Libint simpleblock for versions >= 2.6.0 + add custom
        simpleconfig parameter to enable Fortran support
        ([#2116](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2116))
    - update TensorFlow simpleblock to use system/SimpleBuild installed
        libraries
        ([#2117](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2117),
        [#2165](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2165),
        [#2163](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2163),
        [#2172](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2172))
    - add support in NAMD simpleblock to pass additional C++ compiler
        options for building Charm++ component with + wrap them in
        single quotes
        ([#2118](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2118))
    - automatically add required `-G Ninja` option when using
        CMakeNinja simpleblock + add `generator` custom simpleconfig
        parameter for CMakeMake
        ([#2120](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2120))
    - make several simpleblocks aware of `--sysroot` SimpleBuild
        configuration option: binutils
        ([#2147](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2147),
        [#2159](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2159)),
        CMakeMake
        ([#2152](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2152)),
        GCC
        ([#2143](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2143)),
        Perl
        ([#2142](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2142)),
        Python
        ([#2148](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2143),
        [#2149](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2149))
    - make Mesa simpleblock aware of aarch64
        ([#2153](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2153))
    - enhance sanity check in custom Doxygen simpleblock to catch broken
        installation
        ([#2171](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2171))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make TensorFlow simpleblock ignore the `PKG_REVISION` identifier
        if NCCL version if it exists
        ([#2085](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2085))
    - remove version check against the `version.txt` file in CUDA
        simpleblock
        ([#2097](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2097))
    - add `lib` symlink in tbb installation directory when building
        from source
        ([#2103](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2103))
    - handle GNUInstallDirs special cases in CMakeMake simpleblock
        ([#2105](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2105),
        [#2124](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2124))
    - patch ELPA's `manual_cpp` script to fix hardcoded
        `/usr/bin/python`
        ([#2107](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2107))
    - make TensorFlow simpleblock also set `$GCC_HOST_COMPILER_PREFIX`
        to specify binutils location
        ([#2110](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2110))
    - ensure stand-alone Python package being installed is in view
        when running `pip check` by loading fake module first
        ([#2114](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2114))
    - be more patient when running interactive configure script for
        WRF
        ([#2119](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2119))
    - make sure `self.start_dir` is set to a full path before
        constructing installation command in RPackage simpleblock
        ([#2125](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2125))
    - correctly check whether `modinc` simpleconfig parameter is set to
        `True` in CP2K simpleblock
        ([#2138](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2138))
    - update PSI simpleblock to correctly find Python and enable
        PCMSolver/CheMPS2
        ([#2141](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2141))
    - fix running GROMACS tests when using `eb --rpath`
        ([#2144](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2144),
        [#2154](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2154))
    - remove existing Python installation directory if both
        `eb --rpath` and `--enable-optimizations` configuration option
        are used
        ([#2146](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2146))
    - ensure `libQt5Core.so` is compatible with older Linux kernels by
        disabling `renameat2` and `getentropy` features
        ([#2151](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2151))
    - solve issue where pybind11 picks up on the system Python instead
        of one provided by a module
        ([#2158](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2158))
    - fix Qt5 simpleblock to support installation on Arm/aarch64
        (requires platform to be `linux-g++`)
        ([#2160](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2160))
    - fix OpenFOAM simpleblock to support installation on Arm/aarch64
        systems
        ([#2162](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2162))
    - explicitly enable/disable CUDA options in PyTorch simpleblock +
        fix download check in sanity check + fix for disabling of
        *NNPACK on POWER systems
        ([#2164](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2164))
    - fix sanity check in Mathematica simpleblock for 11.x versions
        older than 11.3
        ([#2168](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2168))
    - unset `$COLUMNS` if it is set to `0` before running Perl's
        configure script
        ([#2169](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2169))
- other changes:
    - filter out Python in SLEPc configure
        ([#2101](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2101))
    - switch to status badge based on tests run in GitHub Actions CI
        in README
        ([#2126](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2126))
    - fix code style issues to make `flake8` checks pass
        ([#2128](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2128) -
        [#2137](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2137),
        [#2140](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2140),
        [#2145](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2145),
        [#2155](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2155))
    - limit test configurations in Travis CI to only Python 2.6
        ([#2139](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2139))

## SimpleBuild v4.2.2 (July 8th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb422 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for using `sources` and `git_config` for extensions
        in `exts_list`
        ([#3294](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3294))
    - add support for software minver template (like `%(pyminver)s`,
        etc.)
        ([#3344](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3344),
        [#3345](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3345))
    - add support for updating dictionary or tuple simpleconfig
        parameters with `self.cfg.update`
        ([#3356](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3356))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix crash in `--avail-simpleconfig-constants` when using
        `--output-format=rst` + ensure sorted output
        ([#3341](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3341))
    - always take into account `builddependencies` when generating
        template values, also when we're not iterating over
        `builddependencies`
        ([#3346](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3346))
    - fix running command as `simplebuild` user in generated Singularity
        definition file
        ([#3347](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3347))
    - allow ignoring `versionsuffix` in `--try-update-deps`
        ([#3350](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3350),
        [#3353](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3353))
    - retain order of paths when generating `prepend_path` statements
        for module file (don't sort them alphabetically)
        ([#3367](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3367))
    - also put simpleblocks used by extensions in `reprod` directory
        ([#3375](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3375))
    - also copy template values in `SimpleConfig.copy` method to ensure
        they are defined when installing extensions
        ([#3377](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3377))
    - skip lines that start with `module-version` when determining
        whether a module exists in `ModulesTool.exist`
        ([#3379](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3379))

**simpleblocks**

- 3 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - LLVM
        ([#2065](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2065)),
        Scipion
        ([#1847](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1847)),
        XALT
        ([#1942](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1942))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - use `wclean -platform` instead of `wcleanPlatform` for OpenFOAM
        v2006 & newer
        ([#2088](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2088))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - only build OpenCV with IPP support on x86_64 systems
        ([#2056](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2056))
    - make sure `CFLAGS` and `MYCFLAGS` are used in Lua simpleblock
        ([#2062](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2062))
    - also accept `exist_lic` as valid value for `license_file` in
        IntelBase simpleblock
        ([#2067](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2067))
    - fix minor bug in shared libs handling and correctly setup
        SuiteSparse variables in Trilinos simpleblock
        ([#2071](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2071))
    - make sure `PythonBundle` uses correct `python` command in
        extensions filter + also add `lib64/python*/site-packages` to
        `$PYTHONPATH` (if it exists)
        ([#2075](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2075),
        [#2081](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2081))
    - fix build environment for WRF by patching shebang in compile
        script
        ([#2079](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2079))
    - fix order of `intel64/lib` paths in generated module for impi
        (and drop `intel64/lib/release_mt`)
        ([#2080](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2080))
    - set `$XDG_CACHE_HOME` to avoid abuse of `$HOME/.cache/pip` when
        installing DOLFIN
        ([#2082](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2082))
    - make VMD simpleblock Python 3 compatible
        ([#2083](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2083))
    - rename include-fixed subdirectory in GCC installation to avoid
        problems after OS upgrade
        ([#2087](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2087),
        [#2093](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2093),
        [#2094](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2094))
    - use glob pattern to determine name of Mathematica installation
        script
        ([#2089](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2089))
    - use `mpirun` for sanity check commands in LAMMPS simpleblock
        ([#2096](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2096))

## SimpleBuild v4.2.1 (May 20th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb421 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - also mention CPU architecture (x86_64, POWER) in comment for
        test reports
        ([#3281](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3281))
    - add support for enhancing existing sanity check in simpleconfigs,
        as opposed to overwriting paths/commands
        ([#3288](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3288))
    - clean up locks when SimpleBuild session is cancelled with a signal
        like `SIGTERM`
        ([#3291](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3291),
        [#3321](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3321))
    - add `find_glob_pattern` function to `filetools` module
        ([#3297](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3297))
    - add constants for common OS dependencies (`OS_PKG_IBVERBS_DEV`,
        `OS_PKG_OPENSSL_DEV`, ...)
        ([#3309](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3309),
        [#3334](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3334))
    - flesh out `get_mpi_cmd_template` function from `Mpi.mpi_cmd_for`
        method
        ([#3312](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3312))
    - add variable `moddependpaths` to specify extra `$MODULEPATH`
        entry to consider for loading dependency modules
        ([#3324](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3324))
    - allow copying of tweaked simpleconfigs when using `--try-*` with
        `--copy-ec`
        ([#3332](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3332))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make `ModulesTool.exist` more robust w.r.t. module wrappers,
        aliases, defaults, etc.
        ([#3216](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3216),
        [#3337](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3337))
    - clean up rst output of `--list-toolchains`
        ([#3246](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3246))
    - cast CPU arch name provided by archspec to a regular string
        ([#3286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3286))
    - get `pr_title` and `pr_descr` build_options in
        `new_pr_from_branch` instead of `new_pr` (and commit_msg in
        both)
        ([#3298](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3298))
    - make `pypi_source_urls` more robust by using `HTMLParser` rather
        than `xml.etree.ElementTree`
        ([#3303](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3303),
        [#3329](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3329))
    - fix broken test for `--include-simpleblocks-from-pr`
        ([#3304](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3304))
    - don't use `distutils.dir_util` in `copy_dir`
        ([#3310](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3310))
    - print trace message for sanity check command before running it
        ([#3316](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3316))
    - fix problems with processing of simpleconfigs using a Cray*
        toolchain when there are no actual external modules
        ([#3319](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3319))
    - make `test_find_eb_script` more robust in case `$EB_SCRIPT_PATH`
        is already set
        ([#3320](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3320))
    - fix several small problems with `--try-update-deps`
        (experimental feature)
        ([#3325](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3325),
        [#3326](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3326),
        [#3330](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3330))
    - add `--disable-job` in `eb` command used in jobs, to prevent
        infinite job cycle
        ([#3328](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3328))
    - avoid empty entries in `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` and other path-like
        environment variables
        ([#3333](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3333))
- other changes:
    - fix code style issues in `simplebuild.tools` + add `flake8`
        linting test
        ([#3282](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3282))
    - introduce `contextmanager` for disabling templating and reduce
        resolving errors
        ([#3287](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3287))
    - add `change_into_dir` named argument to `extract_file` + print
        deprecation warning if it's not specified
        ([#3292](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3292))
    - improve `install_eb_dep.sh` script to install SimpleBuild
        dependencies in CI environment
        ([#3314](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3314))

**simpleblocks**

- add generic simpleblock for installing Go packages: `GoPackage`
    ([#2042](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2042))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update `config.guess` for all R packages, required installing
        R + extensions on Linux/POWER systems
        ([#1949](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1949))
    - add support for `preinstallopts` and install in subdirectory to
        `Tarball` generic simpleblock
        ([#1989](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1989),
        [#2049](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2049))
    - rewrite `GROMACS` simpleblock to install all four variations
        (single/double precision, with/without MPI) in the same
        directory
        ([#1991](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1991))
    - add custom `subdir_version` simpleconfig parameter for FLUENT
        ([#2021](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2021))
    - use updated `config.guess` in `GCC` simpleblock
        ([#2033](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2033),
        [#2059](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2059))
    - add extra question pattern to support installing CPLEX 12.10
        ([#2038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2038))
    - add support for building NWChem on top of external
        GlobalArrays + also define `$LAPACK_LIB` (required for NWChem
        7.x)
        ([#2043](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2043))
    - execute minimal test in sanity check commands in `impi`
        simpleblock
        ([#2045](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2045))
    - update for `MotionCor2` simpleblock for v1.3.1
        ([#2046](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2046))
    - fixes + enhancements for `PETSc` simpleblock
        ([#2048](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2048))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - use correct version in `ELPA` preprocessor flag used for
        QuantumESPRESSO v6.x
        ([#2027](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2027))
    - generically find the arch folder and add top-level bin/lib
        symlinks in `PDT` & `TAU` simpleblocks
        ([#2029](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2029))
    - fix typo in `LAMMPS` simpleblock preventing disabling the
        `USER-INTEL` package via `configopts`
        ([#2031](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2031))
    - let `CMakeMake` remove `simplebuild_obj` build directory if it
        already exists
        ([#2032](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2032))
    - include own lib dir in `RPATH` before system lib dirs in
        `binutils` simpleblock
        ([#2044](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2044))
    - clean `$CPATH` before building ROOT to avoid clash between
        external LLVM loaded as a dependency and internal LLVM used by
        ROOT
        ([#2047](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2047))
    - don't let `extract_file` change directory in various simpleblocks
        ([#2051](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2051))
    - make `postinstallcmds` available to Mathematica simpleconfigs +
        add bin/Executables to `$PATH`
        ([#2052](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2052))
    - fix the extra dirs added to PATH in `FreeSurfer` simpleblock
        ([#2053](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2053))
    - correct download url for test data in `WPS` simpleblock
        ([#2055](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2055))
    - fix typo in warning in `TensorFlow` simpleblock
        ([#2057](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2057))
    - fix failing sanity check under `--module-only` in `GCC`
        simpleblock
        ([#2059](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2059))
- other changes:
    - add configure options for CubeLib/CubeWriter dependencies in
        `Score-P` simpleblock
        ([#2030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2030))
    - remove local `find_glob_pattern` in `Blender` & `ROOT`
        simpleblocks, use function provided by `filetools` instead
        ([#2037](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2037))

## SimpleBuild v4.2.0 (April 14th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb420 }

feature release

**framework**

- add support for `--try-update-deps` (experimental feature), to
    upgrade dependencies based on available simpleconfigs
    ([#2599](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2599))
- adding locking to prevent two parallel builds of the same
    installation directory
    ([#3009](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3009))
    - for more information, see
        <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Locks.html>
- significantly speed up `-D/--dry-run` by avoiding useless
    '`module show`'
    ([#3203](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3203))
- add support for creating an index & using it when searching for
    simpleconfigs
    ([#3210](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3210))
    - for more information, see
        <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Simpleconfigs_index.html>
- additional GitHub integration features:
    - add support for targeting simpleblocks and framework repositories
        in `--new-pr`
        ([#1876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1876),
        [#3189](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3189))
    - add support for `--include-simpleblocks-from-pr`
        ([#3206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3206))
    - for more information,
        <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Integration_with_GitHub.html>
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add a contrib/hooks dir with some examples of hooks used
        ([#2777](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2777))
    - also mention working directory + input passed via stdin (if any)
        in trace output of `run_cmd`
        ([#3168](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3168))
    - probe external modules for missing metadata that is not provided
        via external module metadata file
        ([#3174](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3174))
    - also update `$CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH` and `$CMAKE_LIBRARY_PATH` in
        generated module file
        ([#3176](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3176))
    - optionally call `log.warning` in `print_warning`
        ([#3195](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3195))
    - add an option to `git_config` to retain the `.git` directory
        ([#3197](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3197))
    - allow use of `SYSTEM` as `--try-toolchain` option
        ([#3213](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3213))
    - mention CPU arch name in comment for uploaded test report, if
        it's known by `archspec`
        ([#3227](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3227))
    - make `--merge-pr` take into account `--pr-target-branch`
        ([#3236](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3236))
    - make `--check-contrib` print a warning when `None` is used for
        checksums
        ([#3244](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3244))
    - update `install-SimpleBuild-develop.sh` script and create script
        for 2020a merge sprint
        ([#3245](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3245))
    - add template for `mpi_cmd_prefix`
        ([#3264](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3264))
    - update `copy_dir` to include option to merge directories
        ([#3270](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3270))
    - support template name for CUDA version
        ([#3274](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3274))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - use correct module for `errors_found_in_log`
        ([#3119](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3119))
    - fix `SimpleConfig.update` code to handle both strings and lists as
        input
        ([#3170](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3170))
    - fix removing temporary branch on `--check-github`
        ([#3182](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3182))
    - fix shebang even if first line doesn't start with '`#!`'
        ([#3183](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3183))
    - make bootstrap script work with Python 3
        ([#3186](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3186))
    - read patch files as bytestring to avoid `UnicodeDecodeError` for
        patches that include funky characters
        ([#3191](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3191))
    - fix online check in `--check-github`: try repeatedly and with
        different URLs to cater for HTTP issues
        ([#3194](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3194))
    - don't crash when GitPython is not installed when using Python 3
        ([#3198](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3198))
    - fix `os_name_map` for RHEL8
        ([#3201](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3201))
    - don't add shebang to binary files
        ([#3208](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3208))
    - use `checkout@v2` in GitHub Actions to fix broken re-triggered
        tests
        ([#3219](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3219))
    - don't filter out `None` values in to_checksums, leave them in
        place
        ([#3225](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3225))
    - fix defining of `$MPI_INC_*` and `$MPI_LIB_*` environment
        variables for impi version 2019 and later
        ([#3229](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3229))
    - use correct target account/repo when creating test report &
        posting comment in PR
        ([#3234](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3234))
    - reorganize `SimpleBlock.extensions_step` to ensure correct
        filtering of extensions
        ([#3235](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3235))
    - also support `%(installdir)s` and `%(builddir)s` templates for
        extensions
        ([#3237](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3237))
    - unset `$GITHUB_TOKEN` in Travis after installing token, to avoid
        failing `test_from_pr_token_log`
        ([#3252](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3252))
    - fix reporting when skipping extensions
        ([#3254](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3254))
    - avoid API rate limit errors on online check in `--check-github`
        ([#3257](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3257))
    - show simpleconfig filenames for parallel build
        ([#3258](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3258))
    - make `SimpleConfig.dump` aware of toolchain hierarchy, to avoid
        hardcoded subtoolchains in dependencies simpleconfig parameters
        ([#3261](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3261))
    - fix use of `--copy-ec` with a single argument, assume copy to
        current working directory
        ([#3262](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3262))
    - fix posting of comment in PR with `--upload-test-report`
        ([#3272](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3272))
    - take into account dependencies marked as external modules when
        composing template values like `%(pyver)s`
        ([#3273](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3273))
- other changes:
    - increase timeout & use `api.github.com` for connectivity check
        in `check_github`
        ([#3192](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3192))
    - restore `flake8` default ignores
        ([#3193](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3193))
    - enable tracking of test suite coverage using coveralls
        ([#3204](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3204))
    - make tests use `simplebuilders/testrepository` rather than
        `hpcugent/testrepository` after it was moved
        ([#3238](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3238))
    - improve raised error in `remove_dir` and deprecate `rmtree2`
        ([#3228](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3228))

**simpleblocks**

- 7 new software-specific simpleblocks:
    - BerkeleyGW
        ([#1951](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1951)),
        CMake
        ([#1936](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1936)),

        [#1975](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1975),

        Mesa
        ([#1892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1892),

    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock for version 6.5

    - update Siesta simpleblock to support MaX-1.0 release

- various bug fixes, including:

    - fix MPI-CXX dependency of PETSc
