- minor enhancements, including:
    - add simpleconfig for Java 11.0.6 on `ppc64le` and alter the Java
        11 wrapper to support both x86_64 and ppc64le
        ([#9371](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9371))
    - add additional extensions for R: `HiddenMarkov`
        ([#9685](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9685)),
        `lmerTest`
        ([#9853](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9853)),
        `VSURF` + `Rborist`
        ([#10355](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10355))
    - change Mesa 19.1.7 + 19.2.1 simpleconfigs to use custom simpleblock
        for Mesa
        ([#9764](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9764))
    - build shared libs and install header files for Ghostscript
        ([#9785](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9785))
    - add MUMPS as dependency in PETSc 3.12.4 simpleconfigs
        ([#9880](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9880),
        [#9891](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9891))
    - add Perl extensions: `Term::ReadLine::Gnu`
        ([#9901](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9901)),
        `URI::Escape` and `Set::IntervalTree`
        ([#10049](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10049))
    - add dat directory to aNCI
        ([#9929](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9929))
    - add patch to create a symlink from `libsvm.so.$(SHVER)` to
        `libsvm.so` in LIBSVM simpleconfigs
        ([#10045](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10045))
    - build SUNDIALS with '`pic`'
        ([#10278](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10278))
    - add `BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38` + `MEDIPS` extensions to
        R-bundle-Bioconductor v3.10
        ([#10298](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10298))
    - fix checksums for `mkl-dnn` and `tbb` extensions (moved to
        oneAPI repo) in PyTorch simpleconfigs
        ([#10367](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10367))
    - update `Java/1.8` wrapper to `Java/1.8.0_241.eb`
        ([#10305](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10305))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - use CMake for building double-conversion
        ([#9659](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9659))
    - update recent libdrm simpleconfigs to use custom simpleblock & avoid
        hardcoded x86-specific sanity check
        ([#9694](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9694))
    - add alternate checksum for OpenMolcas 18.09
        ([#9701](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9701))
    - use Github to download releases for MariaDB-connector-c
        ([#9702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9702))
    - add `-DOMPI_SKIP_MPICXX` in `configopts` for MathGL, to avoid
        using mpicxx during build
        ([#9703](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9703))
    - make installing independent of build folder in pybind11
        simpleconfig
        ([#9738](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9738))
    - add Lua as a dependency to gnuplot
        ([#9773](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9773))
    - stick to `http://` source URLS for ISL in GCCcore simpleconfigs,
        since `https://` doesn't work
        ([#9784](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9784))
    - add alternative checksums for
        `farver`/`fracdiff`/`pkgmaker`/`rngtools`/`doRNG`/`cobs`
        extensions in R 3.6.2 simpleconfigs
        ([#9789](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9789))
    - add patch for OpenBLAS 0.3.4 w/ GCC/8.2.0-2.31.1 to fix broken
        tests
        ([#9865](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9865))
    - revert removal of AVX512 vmovd with 64-bit operands in binutils
        2.32 simpleconfigs
        ([#9866](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9866))
    - fix inline asm in dscal: mark x, x1 as clobbered, in OpenBLAS
        0.3.8
        ([#9867](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9867))
    - add missing `sanity_check_commands` to cutadapt v1.18 and v2.7
        simpleconfigs
        ([#9869](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9869))
    - don't overwrite `configopts` in BLAST+ simpleconfigs, append to
        it
        ([#9875](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9875))
    - add alternate checksum for `LaplacesDemon` in R 3.6.x
        simpleconfigs
        ([#9879](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9879),
        [#10382](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10382))
    - fix redefining of preconfigopts in OpenCV simpleconfigs
        ([#9895](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9895))
    - use symlinks for terminfo files instead of hard links in ncurses
        6.1 simpleconfigs
        ([#9912](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9912))
    - fix NCIPLOT build flags
        ([#9915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9915))
    - add missing patch to iccifort libxc simpleconfigs
        ([#9918](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9918))
    - use `checkout@v2` in GitHub Actions to fix broken re-triggered
        tests
        ([#9925](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9925))
    - re-enable building utils in Siesta 4.1-MaX-1.0 release
        ([#9936](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9936))
    - fix homepage and source URLs in SLEPc simpleconfigs by using https
        ([#9943](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9943))
    - fix source URLs for rgeos after source tarball was moved to CRAN
        archive
        ([#9954](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9954))
    - add dependencies on Python 3 and SciPy-bundle in Trinity v2.9.1
        simpleconfig
        ([#9957](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9957))
    - patch GCC `lisanitizer` for glibc 2.31
        ([#9966](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9966))
    - add Zip as build dependency for recent Bazel versions
        ([#9972](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9972))
    - fix checksums in Jellyfish v2.3.0 simpleconfigs
        ([#9997](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9997))
    - fix source URLs for ParMGridGen simpleconfigs
        ([#10019](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10019))
    - disable unintended Octave support in all libsndfile simpleconfigs
        ([#10027](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10027))
    - fix sources for LS-PrePost 4.6
        ([#10236](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10236))
    - security update for vsc-mympirun 4.1.9
        ([#10185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10185))
    - configure libwebp to also install `libwebpmux`
        ([#10274](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10274))
    - ensure that CVS simpleconfigs are included in source tarball
        produced by '`python setup.py sdist`'
        ([#10326](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10326))
    - fix undefined reference error due to libxc 4.3.4 built with
        CMake
        ([#10356](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10356))
    - fix source_urls for tbb: use (new) official '`oneapi-src`'
        GitHub repository
        ([#10361](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10361))
    - update checksums and homepage in tbb simpleconfigs
        ([#10285](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/10285))
- other changes:
    - use new custom simpleblock in recent CMake simpleconfigs
        ([#9871](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9871),
        [#9923](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9923))
    - add check for redefined simpleconfig parameters in simpleconfig
        tests
        ([#9876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9876))
    - use M4-1.4.18.eb for test installation in simpleconfigs test suite
        ([#9926](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9926))

## SimpleBuild v4.1.2 (March 16th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb412 }

bugfix release

!!! note
    This release includes a bug fix for the leaking of your GitHub token
    in the SimpleBuild (debug) log file.

    **We strongly encourage that you revoke the GitHub tokens you are
    using currently, via** <https://github.com/settings/tokens>, **and to
    replace them using a new token (using** `eb --install-github-token --force` **).**

    More information in
    <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3248>.

**framework**

- fix gitdb dependency on Python 2.6 in test configuration
    ([#3212](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3212))
- fix broken test for --review-pr by using different PR to test with
    ([#3226](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3226))
- censor authorization part of headers before logging ReST API request
    ([#3248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3248))

**simpleblocks**

*(no changes)*

**simpleconfigs**

*(no changes)*

## SimpleBuild v4.1.1 (January 16th 2020) {: #release_notes_eb411 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add `check_log_for_errors` function (in `simplebuild.tools.run`)
        to detect and handle multiple errors
        ([#3118](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3118))
    - implement support for `eb --show-ec` to show contents of
        specified simpleconfig file
        ([#3132](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3132))
    - also update `$XDG_DATA_DIR` (share/) and `$GI_TYPELIB_PATH`
        environment variables (lib*/girepository-*) in generated
        module files
        ([#3133](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3133))
    - add support for `--copy-ec` to copy simpleconfig file to specified
        location
        ([#3142](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3142))
    - mention `--disable-*` option in `--help` output for boolean
        options enabled by default
        ([#3151](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3151))
    - add `--cuda-compute-capabilities` configuration option
        ([#3161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3161))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - ignore imports from `vsc` namespace made from pkgutil.py
        ([#3120](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3120))
    - only actually change permissions using `os.chmod` in
        `adjust_permissions` if the current permissions are not correct
        already
        ([#3125](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3125))
    - use `shutil.copyfile` to just copy file contents if target path
        exists and is owned by someone else
        ([#3127](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3127))
    - fix or avoid warnings that commonly arise in build log
        ([#3129](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3129))
    - disable buffering in `asyncprocess.Popen` using `bufsize=0`, to
        fix `run_cmd_qa` missing output
        ([#3130](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3130))
    - update pip & install wheel package in generated Singularity
        container recipes
        ([#3136](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3136))
    - avoid crash in `modify_env` & unset `unset_env_vars` when using
        (older versions) of Python 3.5 & 3.6 by using `list(...)`
        ([#3140](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3140))
    - take into account that lib64 could be a symlink to lib (or vice
        versa) in `get_software_libdir` function
        ([#3141](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3141))
    - only parse docstring if it exists in
        `gen_simpleblock_doc_section_rst` function
        ([#3144](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3144))
    - only add useful entries for `$CPATH`, `$(LD_)LIBRARY_PATH` and
        `$PATH` (non-empty directories)
        ([#3145](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3145),
        [#3152](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3152))
    - fix `--list-software=detailed` when using Python 3 by leveraging
        `sort_looseversions` function from `py2vs3` module
        ([#3146](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3146))
    - ensure subdirectories in software install directory have correct
        search (exec) permission
        ([#3147](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3147))
    - take into account that a checksum value may be a tuple of valid
        checksum in `SimpleBlock.check_checksums`
        ([#3153](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3153))
- other changes:
    - bump to Lmod 8.2.9 in GitHub CI config
        ([#3115](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3115))
    - update copyright statements for 2020
        ([#3149](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3149))
    - make Hound CI code style checker ignore "Black would make
        changes" produced by flake8-black
        ([#3162](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3162))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for cryptography (to fix missing
    `-pthread` for all versions)
    ([#1874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1874))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update WPS simpleblock for v3.6 & newer
        ([#1315](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1315))
    - update FSL simpleblock to support FSL v6.0.2 & newer

    - add `setup_cmake_env` function in CMakeMake simpleblock which can
        be leveraged in other simpleblocks, and use it for OpenFOAM
        ([#1869](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1869))
    - remove obsolete configure options for Python + build with
        optimizations/LTO enabled for recent Python versions
        ([#1876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1876))
    - update WPS simpleblock for recent versions: set `$WRF_DIR` to
        point to location of WRF installation
        ([#1886](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1886))
    - make sure `$LIBLAPACK_MT` is set before using it in ESMF

        `--cuda-compute-capabilities`, and issue a warning if no CUDA
        compute capabilities are specified
        ([#1913](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1913))
    - add custom simpleconfig parameter `build_type` to generic
        CMakeMake simpleblock
        ([#1915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1915),
        [#1922](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1922))
- various bug fixes, including:

        Python
        ([#1836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1836))
    - fix path for intel and netCDF lib directories in NCL simpleblock
        ([#1862](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1862))
    - fix CUDA 10.1 installation on POWER
        ([#1871](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1871))
    - change Bazel simpleblock to prefer using Java dependency rather
        than included JDK (fix for POWER9)

    - remove optarch warning in GROMACS for Cray toolchains

    - limit MPI ranks used for running WRF test cases to max. 4 +

    - fix install dir subdir for WPS v4.0+ that is considered for

    - impi: don't rebuild libfabric if the source code is not present

    - also copy component patches to self.cfg in Bundle generic

    - skip patch step in Bundle generic simpleblock (per-component

    - derive simpleblock for iccifort only from icc simpleblock (not

    - add `export LANG=C` to preinstallopts instead of install_script
        path in CUDA simpleblock
        ([#1902](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1902))
    - stop setting updating `$CPATH` and `$LIBRARY_PATH` for GCC and

    - remove `$LIBRARY_PATH` entries in iccifort simpleblock, already

    - use major/minor version of Python command being used if
        `req_py_majver`/`req_py_minver` are not specified
        ([#1907](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1907))
    - define `$EB_PYTHON` in module for SimpleBuild installation, to

    - fix Python simpleblock to allow configuring build of Python v3.8

        ([#9687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9687))
- other changes:
    - disable running of `sudo apt-get update` in GitHub CI config,
        since it's failing (and we don't really need it)
        ([#9492](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9492))
    - require that `sanity_pip_check` is enabled in new/changed
        simpleconfigs
        ([#9516](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9516),
        [#9576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9576))
    - update copyright statements for 2020
        ([#9598](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9598))
    - allow missing '-Python-*' versionsuffix for existing
        simpleconfig files changed in PRs
        ([#9634](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9634))

## SimpleBuild v4.1.0 (December 4th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb410 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - performance improvements:
        - skip validation when copying SimpleConfig object for extension
            ([#3071](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3071))
        - correctly specify that ActiveMNS & co are singleton classes
            when using Python 3
            ([#3073](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3073))
        - don't call out to prohibitively expensive
            `getRootLoggerName` in `getLogger`, just use 'root'
            instead
            ([#3074](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3074))
        - fix inconsistent module path usage that leads to repeated
            reloading in HMNS
            ([#3099](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3099))
    - add support for specifying different dependency version based on
        processor architecture
        ([#3047](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3047))
    - support use of glob patterns for paths to files with external
        modules metadata
        ([#3075](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3075))
    - take into account that external modules may not be visible
        directly (due to module hierarchy)
        ([#3083](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3083))
    - add support for including 'extensions' statement in Lua
        modules with Lmod 8.2.8+
        ([#3085](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3085),
        [#3107](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3107),
        [#3110](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3110))
    - add support for `--sync-pr-with-develop`
        ([#3087](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3087))
    - add support for `--new-branch-github`, `--new-pr-from-branch`,
        `--sync-branch-with-develop`, `--update-branch-github`
        ([#3103](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3103))
    - fix typo in docstring for `new_branch_github`
        ([#3106](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3106))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - correctly handle `iccifortcuda` toolchain with standalone
        `iccifort` in `det_toolchain_compilers`
        ([#3055](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3055))
    - init git repo with `git.repo.clone()` instead of `copy_dir()`
        ([#3062](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3062))
    - fix regular expression so depends-on statements are recognized
        correctly in Tcl module files
        ([#3065](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3065))
    - update GitPython to latest version that supports Python 2.6 in
        requirements.txt to fix broken `test_new_update_pr`
        ([#3066](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3066))
    - imply `--disable-pre-create-installdir` with
        `--inject-checksums`
        ([#3069](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3069))
    - handle patches in extensions more like normal patches
        ([#3067](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3067))
    - take into account that `platform.linux_distribution` and
        `platform.dist` was removed in Python 3.8
        ([#3078](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3078))
    - always include mandatory simpleconfig parameters in dumped
        simpleconfig
        ([#3081](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3081))
    - hide backup module file when using Lmod 6.x (fixes
        [#9302](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/issues/9302))
        ([#3089](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3089))
    - add better error message when mandatory key is missing from a
        dictionary simpleconfig parameter
        ([#3092](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3092))
    - also create symlinks for default modules in class module folders
        ([#3093](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3093))
    - fix semantics of `--set-default-module`: only set default for
        specified simpleconfigs, not for the ones that are installed as
        dependencies via `--robot`
        ([#3094](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3094))
    - fix various issues in extracting comments from original
        simpleconfig file and including them again in dumped simpleconfig
        ([#3095](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3095))
    - don't use `%(version)s` template in `exts_default_options` in
        dumped simpleconfig
        ([#3096](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3096))
    - fix generated module statements in case only a single version is
        listed in `multi_deps`
        ([#3097](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3097))
    - fix broken `test_show_system_info` on macOS due to 'Python'
        binary
        ([#3105](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3105))
    - take into account that dependency version could be a dict rather
        than a string value in template_constant_dict
        ([#3111](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3111))
- other changes:
    - deprecate running SimpleBuild with Python 2.6 via new
        `check_python_version()` function
        ([#3076](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3076))
    - deprecate support for using Lmod 6.x
        ([#3077](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3077))
    - trim set of test configurations in Travis CI
        ([#3086](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3086))
    - flesh out `env_vars_external_module` from
        `Toolchain._simulated_load_dependency_module`
        ([#3088](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3088))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for cuDNN, to allow setting
    `cudnnarch`
    ([#1855](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1855))
- refactored software-specific simpleblock for Xmipp, based on Scons
    ([#1837](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1837))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - add `prebuildopts` to Bazel build command
        ([#1838](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1838))
    - add support to Toolchain generic simpleblock for defining $EB*
        environment variables for toolchain components that use an
        external module
        ([#1849](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1849))
    - add support for running 'pip check' during sanity check in
        generic PythonPackage simpleblock
        ([#1853](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1853))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - clean up `/tmp/cuda-installer.log` in CUDA simpleblock, to avoid
        segfault in cuda-installer
        ([#1835](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1835))
    - minor fix to name of Gctf binary
        ([#1840](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1840))
    - move BLAS toolchain existence check earlier in SuperLU simpleblock
        ([#1842](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1842))
    - fixes for TensorFlow simpleblocks w.r.t. Bazel build options &

        ([#1843](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1843))
    - fix support for sequential version in MUMPS simpleblock
        ([#1845](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1845))
    - change default value of `files_to_copy` to None in MakeCp

        ([#1848](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1848))
    - prepend `-L$EBROOTZLIB/lib` to `LDFLAGS` in SCOTCH simpleblock
        ([#1850](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1850))
    - improve configuration in netCDF and netcdf4_python simpleblocks
        ([#1852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1852))
    - fix CUDA header paths for TensorFlow versions < 1.14
        ([#1854](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1854))
    - handle incorrect regex better in generic CmdCp simpleblock
        ([#1861](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1861))
    - add missing docstrings in cmakeninja simpleblock
        ([#1867](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1867))
- other changes:

## SimpleBuild v4.0.1 (October 15th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb401 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add '`parallel`' to list of config templates
        ([#3036](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3036))
    - add GitHub Actions workflow to run simplebuild-framework test
        suite
        ([#3039](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3039))
    - add '`retest`' as a reason to `--close-pr`, to close/re-open
        PRs to trigger re-test in Travis
        ([#3040](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3040))
    - define `$EB_SCRIPT_PATH` in '`eb`' wrapper script, and
        consider it before location of '`eb`' determined via `$PATH`
        in `get_paths_for` function
        ([#3046](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3046))
    - add support for `--remove-ghost-install-dirs` configuration
        option, and warn about (potential) ghost install dirs by default
        when `--force`/`--rebuild` is used
        ([#3050](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3050))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - update bootstrap script to support installing SimpleBuild v4.0
        ([#3017](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3017))
    - fix broken `test_download_repo` due to archiving of simpleconfigs
        ([#3019](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3019),
        [#3023](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3023))
    - avoid that `--inject-checksums` introduces list of patches for
        extensions as a single long line
        ([#3025](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3025),
        [#3034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3034))
    - enhance regex in `fix_shebang` method to fix more Python/Perl
        shebangs + avoid patching binary files
        ([#3029](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3029))
    - delete test gist that is created by `--check-github`
        ([#3031](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3031))
    - disable templates when defining simpleconfig parameters in
        `SimpleConfig.set_keys()`
        ([#3037](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3037))
    - avoid setting GC3Pie's max_in_flight to `None` if
        `--job-max-jobs` is not specified
        ([#3038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3038))
    - fix use of `obtain_file` method for extensions
        ([#3042](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3042))
    - error out if some GC3Pie job failed
        ([#3044](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3044))

**simpleblocks**

- one new generic simpleblock: `CMakeNinja`
    ([#1829](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1829))
- new software-specific simpleblock for Gctf
    ([#1827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1827)),
    MotionCor2
    ([#1819](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1819))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update OpenFOAM simpleblock for changes in version 1906 w.r.t.
        wamke rules
        ([#1772](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1772))
    - add `%(cudaarch)s` template variable so that it can be used in
        sources
        ([#1797](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1797))
    - update Boost simpleblock for versions >=1.71.0
        ([#1814](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1814))
    - update RepeatMasker simpleblock for version 4.0.9
        ([#1815](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1815))
    - add `--verbose` flag to '`pip install`' when running EB in
        debug mode
        ([#1822](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1822))
    - update TensorFlow simpleblock to support TensorFlow 2.0
        ([#1823](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1823))
    - add support in TensorFlow simpleblock to run a custom test script
        as smoke test
        ([#1824](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1824))
    - add support for installing QScintilla on top of PyQt5
        ([#1825](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1825))
    - update VEP simpleblock to make installation compatible with
        `Bio::EnsEMBL::XS`
        ([#1828](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1828))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - enhance TensorFlow simpleblock to support installing TF 1.14.0
        with CUDA and MPI support
        ([#1811](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1811),
        [#1816](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1816))
    - avoid `UnicodeDecodeError` when reading '`configure`' script
        and checking for '`Generated by GNU Autoconf`' in
        `ConfigureMake`
        ([#1817](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1817),
        [#1821](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1821))
    - don't require '`python`' command to install libxml2 without
        Python bindings
        ([#1818](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1818))
    - make sure "`generic=True`" actually turns on generic build in
        GCC simpleblock
        ([#1826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1826))
    - fix compatibility of Trilinos simpleblock with Python 3
        ([#1831](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1831))

    - fix permissions for TRF
        ([#9034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9034))
    - ICU needs Python 2.7+ to build, so add that as builddependency
        ([#9053](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9053))
    - fix urls for Anaconda and Miniconda
        ([#9087](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9087))
    - use a cuDNN version that has support for the CUDA version in
        `fosscuda/2019a` (CUDA 10.1) in PyTorch, TensorFlow and Theano
        simpleconfigs
        ([#9112](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9112))
- other changes:

        (to use different source on POWER systems)

    - update `Java/1.8` wrapper to `Java/1.8.0_221`
        ([#9038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/9038))
    - allow divergent Java dep version as long as it's indicated by

## SimpleBuild v4.0.0 (September 20th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb400 }

feature release (incl. backwards-incompatible changes)

**framework**

- **fixed compatibility with Python 3.5+**
    ([#2708](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2708),
    [#2713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2713),
    [#2714](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2714),
    [#2719](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2719),
    [#2721](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2721),
    [#2723](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2723),
    [#2729](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2729),
    [#2743](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2743),
    [#2744](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2744),
    [#2751](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2751),
    [#2756](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2756),
    [#2759](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2759),
    [#2761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2761),
    [#2762](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2762),
    [#2765](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2765),
    [#2766](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2766),
    [#2767](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2767),
    [#2768](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2768),
    [#2774](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2774),
    [#2775](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2775),
    [#2778](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2778),
    [#2780](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2780),
    [#2785](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2785),
    [#2787](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2787),
    [#2789](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2789),
    [#2791](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2791),
    [#2792](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2792),
    [#2794](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2794),
    [#2800](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2800),
    [#2801](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2801),
    [#2805](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2805),
    [#2806](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2806),
    [#2895](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2895),
    [#2932](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2932),
    [#2982](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2982),
    [#2992](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2992),
    [#3007](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3007),
    [#3011](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3011))
    - supported Python versions: 2.6, 2.7, 3.5, 3.6, 3.7
    - some functionality from the Python standard library should be
        imported from the new `simplebuild.tools.py2vs3` package
    - see [Compatibility with Python 2 and Python 3][py2_py3_compatibility] &
        [Overview of relocated functions, classes and constants in SimpleBuild v4.0][eb4_relocated_functions_classes_constants]
- **ingested relevant code from** `vsc-base` & `vsc-install`
    ([#2708](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2708),
    [#2713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2713),
    [#2714](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2714),
    [#2763](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2763),
    [#2790](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2790),
    [#2993](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2993))
    - `vsc-base` & `vsc-install` are no longer required as
        dependencies
    - the functionality that was provided by these packages is now
        (mostly) available from the `simplebuild.base` package
    - any import statements from the '`vsc`' namespace will result
        in an error
    - see also [Ingested functionality from `vsc-base` and `vsc-install`][eb4_changes_ingested_vsc_base] and
        [Overview of relocated functions, classes and constants in SimpleBuild v4.0][eb4_relocated_functions_classes_constants]
- `setuptools` **is longer required** (neither for installing or using
    SimpleBuild)
    ([#2836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2836),
    [#2837](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2837),
    [#2984](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2984),
    [#2986](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2986),
    [#2988](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2988))
    - see also [No more required Python packages][eb4_no_required_deps]
    - this required moving some classes and constants, see
        [Overview of relocated functions, classes and constants in SimpleBuild v4.0][eb4_relocated_functions_classes_constants]
- **the** '`dummy`' **toolchain is deprecated and replaced by the**
    '`system`' **toolchain**
    ([#2877](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2877),
    [#3001](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3001))
    - if '`dummy`' is still used as a toolchain in simpleconfig files,
        a warning will be printed
    - use "`toolchain = SYSTEM`" instead
    - for more information, see [System toolchain][system_toolchain]
- **a warning is printed when local variables in simpleconfig file
    don't follow the recommended naming scheme**
    ([#2938](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2938),
    [#2968](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2968))
    - see also [Local variables in simpleconfig files][simpleconfig_files_local_variables]
- **names of software installation directories are independent of
    module naming scheme by enabling**
    `--fixed-installdir-naming-scheme` **by default**
    ([#2999](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2999))
    - see
        [`--fixed-installdir-naming-scheme` enabled by default][eb4_changes_fixed_installdir_naming_scheme] for more information
- various other small enhancements, including:
    - use requests instead of urllib2 for 403 errors
        ([#2695](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2695))
    - use pip requirements file in Travis
        ([#2874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2874))
    - add support for `--fix-deprecated-simpleconfigs`
        ([#2881](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2881),
        2898,
        [#2938](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2938))
    - add `-L$EBROOTIMKL/lib/intel64` to `$LDFLAGS` for MKL
        ([#2930](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2930))
    - handle dict-type checksums in check_checksums_for
        ([#2974](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2974))
    - allow that `icc` & `ifort` are not actual dependencies in
        `iccifort` toolchain module
        ([#2995](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2995))
    - define mapping for `iccifort`->`intel` for `iccifort`
        compiler-only toolchain for HMNS
        ([#2996](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2996))
    - also consider concatenation of compiler module names to
        determine details of toolchain compiler component
        ([#2997](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2997))
    - update metadata for Cray-provided external modules
        ([#3013](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3013))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - update the PyPI trove classifiers in setup.py
        ([#2875](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2875))
    - reverse lists for `$LDFLAGS` and `$CPPFLAGS`
        ([#2931](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2931))
    - enhance/fix to_template_str function to do a better job at using
        template values in dumped simpleconfigs
        ([#2948](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2948))
    - also take into account `--filter-deps` when finalizing parsed
        dependencies to fix problem with dependency filters using
        version ranges
        ([#2983](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2983))
    - fix broken `--from-pr` tests due to archiving of simpleconfigs
        ([#2985](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2985))
    - fixes required to avoid breaking Cray support
        ([#3008](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3008))
    - fixes for `--read-only-installdir`: avoid crash with `ModuleRC`
        simpleblock + also make log file in installdir read-only
        ([#3012](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3012))
- other changes:
    - add check to ensure that `--robot` argument specifies an
        existing directory
        ([#2086](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2086))
    - remove old scripts that are no longer useful (+ minor fixes to
        others)
        ([#2897](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2897))
    - use '`command -v`' to avoid requiring '`which`' in '`eb`'
        command
        ([#2979](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2979))
    - add `modluafooter` & `modtclfooter` at the end of the generated
        module file
        ([#3003](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3003))
    - print warning when '`eb`' command is not found in `$PATH` and
        for empty robot search path
        ([#3006](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/3006))

**simpleblocks**

- fixes due to backwards-incompatible changes in simplebuild-framework
    v4.0.0
    - use `is_system_toolchain()` rather than checking toolchain name
        against DUMMY_TOOLCHAIN_NAME constant
        ([#1690](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1690),
        [#1728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1728))
- fix compatibility of various simpleblocks with Python 3
    ([#1640](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1640),
    [#1644](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1644),
    [#1648](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1648),
    [#1721](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1721),
    [#1794](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1794),
    [#1808](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1808),
    [#1795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1795),
    [#1796](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1796),
    [#1807](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1807),
    [#1809](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1809))
- new software-specific simpleblocks for `OpenMPI`
    ([#1789](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1789),
    [#1801](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1801)),
    `iccifort`
    ([#1799](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1799))
    and `numexpr`
    ([#1803](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1803),
    [#1804](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1804))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - removed checks for Boussinesq and sonic solvers for OpenFOAM 7,
        since those have been deprecated
        ([#1733](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1733))
    - update Paraver simpleblock to support recent versions
        ([#1790](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1790))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - update the PyPI trove classifiers
        ([#1723](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1723))
    - make the plugins build use the correct Tcl library version in
        VMD simpleblock
        ([#1786](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1786))
    - use `*_MT libs` for BLAS/LAPACK only if `openmp` is enabled in
        Trilinos simpleblock
        ([#1791](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1791))
    - filter out empty entries in `$CPATH` or `$C_INCLUDE_PATH` when
        building Perl, since that breaks the build
        ([#1800](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1800))
    - set `$XDG_CACHE_HOME` in TensorFlow simpleblock to avoid that
        `pip` (ab)uses `$HOME/.cache`
        ([#1802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1802))
    - don't load modules for dependencies in
        `CrayToolchain.prepare_step`
        ([#1805](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1805))
- other changes:
    - drop requirement for setuptools as runtime dependency
        ([#1689](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1689))
    - enable '`check_ldshared`' in generic PythonPackage simpleblock
        by default for recent Python versions
        ([#1788](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1788))
    - stop trying to use `setuptools.setup` in `setup.py`, always use
        `distutils.core.setup` instead
        ([#1793](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1793))

## SimpleBuild v3.9.4 (August 23rd 2019) {: #release_notes_eb394 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for specifying checksum via dict providing a
        filename-to-checksum mapping
        ([#2946](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2946))
    - enhance 'completed' message with how much time was needed for
        the installation
        ([#2956](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2956))
    - add support for specifying tuple of alternative checksums
        ([#2958](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2958))
    - support using '`system`' as alias for '`dummy`' toolchain +
        `SYSTEM` constant
        ([#2960](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2960))
    - ensure '`docurls`' simpleconfig parameter value is a list of
        string values, not a single string value
        ([#2963](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2963))
    - automatically enable `--ignore-osdeps` when using
        `--check-contrib` or `--check-style`
        ([#2965](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2965))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - escape '`+`' in search queries + handle invalid search queries
        better
        ([#2967](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2967))
    - also consider extension patches when determining for which
        simpleconfig a given patch file is intended in
        `--new-pr`/`--update-pr`
        ([#2969](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2969))
    - unset `$CDPATH` early on if it is defined
        ([#2970](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2970))
    - create specified temporary log directory if it doesn't exist
        yet in `init_logging`
        ([#2972](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2972))
    - don't indicate first multi_deps version as default in module
        help text when `multi_deps_load_default=False`
        ([#2973](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2973))
- other changes:
    - deprecate toolchains older than `gompi/2016a` and `foss/2016a`
        ([#2951](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2951))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for MSM
    ([#1770](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1770),
    [#1775](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1775),
    [#1776](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1776))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - allow specifying the license file directly in MATLAB simpleblock
        ([#1712](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1712))
    - enhance CPLEX simpleblock to also build Python bindings
        ([#1738](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1738))
    - workaround for XCrySDen for Tcl 8.6
        ([#1749](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1749))
    - update WIEN2k simpleblock to support version 19.1
        ([#1758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1758))
    - resolve custom `%(cudaarch)s` template value for CUDA sources
        ([#1766](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1766))
    - enhance sanity check for Blender to make sure that Cycles render
        engine is available
        ([#1779](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1779))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - only check for qtwebengine in custom simpleblock for Qt(5) if
        glibc is sufficiently recent
        ([#1771](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1771))
    - correctly define `comp.src` in Bundle simpleblock, to fix
        compatibility with simpleblocks that leverage `self.src`
        ([#1777](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1777))
    - fix `Bundle.check_checksums` to checksums for extensions are
        also checked
        ([#1778](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1778))

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for 36 new software packages:
    - ArrayFire
        ([#8461](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8461)),
        BRAKER
        ([#8437](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8437)),
        bwidget
        ([#8477](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8477)),
        Catch2
        ([#8703](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8703)),
        core-counter
        ([#8749](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8749)),
        CubeGUI
        ([#6328](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6328)),
        CubeLib
        ([#6328](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6328)),
        CubeWriter
        ([#6328](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6328)),
        dagitty
        ([#8606](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8606)),
        enaBrowserTool
        ([#8795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8795)),
        GEMMA
        ([#8270](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8270)),
        GeneMark-ET
        ([#8437](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8437)),

## SimpleBuild v3.9.3 (July 8th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb393 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add a URL whatis line to generated module files
        ([#2933](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2933))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - stick to Ubuntu Trusty when testing with Python 2.6 in Travis
        ([#2928](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2928))
    - honor `--tmp-logdir` when determining location of temporary log
        file
        ([#2937](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2937))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements, including:
    - also install docs and demos in Rosetta simpleblock
        ([#1745](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1745))
    - update HEALPix simpleblock to work with latest version of
        HEALPix' `configure.sh`
        ([#1752](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1752))
    - make HPCG log pattern more generic, it changed in 3.1
        ([#1753](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1753))
    - allow bootstrapping GCC with profile-guided optimizations
        ([#1756](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1756))
    - only require vsc-base for SimpleBuild 2.x and 3.x in SimpleBuildMeta
        simpleblock
        ([#1757](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1757))
    - extend question patterns with '`https`' URL entry in Modeller
        simpleblock for recent versions
        ([#1762](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1762))
    - `modextrapaths` implemented on simpleblock level,
        `sanity_check_step`, `gcc_target` added in HEALPix simpleblock
        ([#1763](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1763))
    - update OpenBLAS simpleblock to be aware of POWER9 support in
        OpenBLAS 0.3.6

- various bug fixes, including:

    - be more patient when running interactive `Allwmake.firstInstall`

        ([#1761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1761))
    - also add `--without-go` configure option for SWIG as we
        "disable everything by default"
        ([#1754](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1754))
    - don't assume cmake arguments when configure_cmd is set in

## SimpleBuild v3.9.2 (June 9th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb392 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - enhance (experimental) support for generating Singularity
        container recipes/images
        ([#2884](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2884),
        [#2900](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2900),
        [#2902](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2902),
        [#2903](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2903),
        [#2907](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2907),
        [#2909](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2909),
        [#2910](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2910),
        [#2913](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2913),
        [#2915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2915))
        - add support for specifying container configuration via
            `--container-config` (`--container-base` option has been
            removed)
        - add support for providing custom template for container
            recipe via `--container-template-recipe`
        - add support for '`sif`' Singularity 3.x container image
            format
        - add support for specifying non-image based Singularity
            bootstrap agents
        - install default set of OS packages in container recipes
            starting from scratch
        - configure Lmod and update Lmod spider cache in generated
            Singularity container recipes
        - configure SimpleBuild via environment variables (to allow
            overriding configuration settings via options to '`eb`'
            command)
        - also consider `/tmp/simplebuild/sources` in source path (to
            allow seeding in sources in container build environment)
        - updated documentation is available at
            <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Containers.html>
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make sure that simpleconfig file for SimpleBuild version being
        bootstrapped is found in robot search path
        ([#2899](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2899))
    - remove interpreter options when fixing script shebang
        ([#2905](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2905),
        [#2906](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2906))
    - fix crash on iterated installation when using Cray toolchains
        ([#2914](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2914))
    - disable checking of read/exec permissions when checking for
        availability of '`sudo`' command
        ([#2918](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2918))
- other changes:
    - stick to vsc-base < 2.9.0 in bootstrap script to avoid
        requiring '`future`' dependency
        ([#2892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2892))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for ELPA
    ([#1621](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1621))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - allow Boost to build both Python 2 and Python 3 libraries

    - add missing build dependency on gettext to ATK/2.28.1 for
        fosscuda/2018b
        ([#8402](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8402))
    - add patch to fix OpenBLAS v0.3.1 matrices multiplication issue
        ([#8396](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8396))
    - make Eigen a build dependency for nanopolish
        ([#8448](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8448))
- other changes:
    - clean up ELPA 2018.11.001 simpleconfig to use custom simpleblock for
        ELPA
        ([#8360](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8360))
    - remove unused checksum for `ballgown` extension in Bioconductor
        3.7 simpleconfigs
        ([#8363](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8363))

## SimpleBuild v3.9.1 (May 20th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb391 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add function to determine whether specified simpleblock is generic
        or not
        ([#2838](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2838))
    - add support to `apply_regex_substitutions` function to skip
        creation of backup
        ([#2844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2844))
    - add support for `%(pymajver)s` (& co)
        ([#2850](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2850))
    - add support for '`fix_python_shebang_for`' and
        '`fix_perl_shebang_for`' simpleconfig parameters
        ([#2878](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2878))
    - add `multi_deps` information to generated module, help and
        whatis sections
        ([#2882](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2882))
    - add support for '`eb --missing`' ('`eb -M`')
        ([#2883](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2883))
        - see also
            <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Using_the_SimpleBuild_command_line.html#getting-an-overview-of-missing-installations-missing-m>
- various bug fixes, including:
    - only call '`scontrol release`' when there's at least one job
        submitted
        ([#2834](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2834))
    - fix small bug in `find_eb_script` + various minor issues with
        tests (related to environment in which tests are run)
        ([#2835](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2835))
    - list build dependencies *before* runtime dependencies, so
        dependencies listed via `multi_deps` are loaded first in
        toolchain environment
        ([#2839](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2839))
    - allow setting parallel to `0` or `False` to disable adding the
        `-j` argument
        ([#2842](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2842))
    - be more careful when using single quotes for Tcl syntax
        ([#2847](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2847))
    - append to existing `.modulerc` file rather than overwriting it
        (if `--force` is used)
        ([#2848](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2848))
    - correctly resolve template values used for extensions
        ([#2852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2852))
    - update template values after updating iterative simpleconfig
        parameters
        ([#2854](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2854))
    - add top-level directories of hierarchical module naming scheme
        to `$MODULEPATH` before loading dependencies
        ([#2857](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2857))
    - inject dependencies specified via `multi_deps` before normal
        build dependencies
        ([#2861](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2861))
    - include Python version(s) in PR titles auto-generated by
        `--new-pr`
        ([#2863](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2863),
        [#2880](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2880))
    - update `HierarchicalMNS` for GCCcore toolchain
        ([#2870](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2870))
    - bump iteration index counter at the correct time
        ([#2886](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2886))
    - don't specify `--ntasks-per-node` when submitting Slurm jobs
        ([#2887](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2887))
    - fix order of simpleconfig parameters in output generated by
        '`eb --avail-simpleconfig-params --output-format rst`'
        ([#2888](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2888))
- other changes:
    - lower required version in Slurm job backend to 16.05
        ([#2833](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2833))
    - add Lmod 8 to test suite
        ([#2849](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2849))
    - deprecate useless 'skip_lower' named argument in
        template_constant_dict, always define `*lower` templates
        ([#2856](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2856))
    - fix Python classifiers in `setup.py`, should be (only) Python
        2.6 & 2.7
        ([#2876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2876))

**simpleblocks**

- one new generic simpleblock: `CMakeMakeCp`
    ([#1725](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1725))
- new software-specific simpleblock for Blender
    ([#1595](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1595)),
    Lua
    ([#1396](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1396)),
    OpenBLAS
    ([#1693](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1693),
    [#1697](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1697))
    - OpenBLAS simpleblock also supports installation on POWER systems
- minor enhancements, including:
    - enhance VMD simpleblock to also build Surf & Stride + pick up
        netCDF for VMD >= 1.9.3
        ([#1314](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1314))
    - update CGAL simpleblock to support CGAL 4.12 & newer
        ([#1679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1679))
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock for v6.4.1
        ([#1692](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1692))
    - enhance Advisor & VTune simpleblocks, since no license is required
        starting with version 2019 update 3
        ([#1694](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1694),
        [#1695](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1695))
    - handle new multi-deps Python setup with `$EBPYTHONPREFIXES` for
        Tensorflow
        ([#1702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1702))
    - make CHARMM simpleblock pick up on `prebuildopts` and `runtest`
        ([#1707](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1707))
    - change default value for `'use_pip`' to None, so we can
        discriminate from '`use_pip`' being set to False explicitly
        ([#1709](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1709))
    - make PythonPackage aware of `(pre)testopts`
        ([#1715](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1715))
    - enable GPU offloading in Clang if CUDA is included as a dep
        ([#1716](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1716))
    - add support to Clang simpleblock for also building libc++ and RTTI
        ([#1717](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1717))
    - rebuild internal libfabric for impi 2019.x & more recent
        ([#1730](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1730))
    - update Q&A patterns in SAS simpleblock for version 9.4 + add
        support for custom license file path
        ([#1731](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1731))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - only install mkl-dnn by default with TensorFlow on x86-64
        systems
        ([#1666](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1666))
    - make sure `ldconfig` can be found before using it in CUDA
        simpleblock
        ([#1684](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1684))
    - use temporary directory for pip cache (rather than
        `$HOME/.cache/pip`) in `PythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#1687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1687))
    - allow oversubscription when testing FFTW on top of OpenMPI >=
        3.0
        ([#1688](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1688))
    - make sure `$HOME/.cache/pip` isn't used while installing
        Tkinter
        ([#1691](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1691))
    - set default `exts_filter` in `PythonBundle`, so already
        installed extensions in a bundle can be skipped
        ([#1701](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1701))
    - instruct Bazel to not use `$HOME/.cache/bazel` in TensorFlow
        simpleblock
        ([#1704](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1704))
    - also set `$XDG_CACHE_HOME` during installation of Python, to
        ensure that '`pip`' that comes along with it doesn't touch
        `$HOME/.cache/pip`
        ([#1705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1705))
    - use `-fp-model precise` if FMA instructions are missing in
        GROMACS simpleblock
        ([#1706](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1706))
    - make sure Perl install dir follows a standard format
        ([#1708](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1708))
    - attach `source_urls` directly to sources for components in
        generic `Bundle` simpleblock
        ([#1711](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1711))
    - avoid that `--no-build-isolation` option is specified multiple
        times in `PythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#1713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1713))
    - fix prefix in impi compiler wrappers
        ([#1727](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1727))
    - only embed zlib in binutils if it is listed a build dependency
        ([#1732](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1732))
- other changes:
    - fix Python classifiers in `setup.py`, should be (only) Python
        2.6 & 2.7
        ([#1724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1724))
