    - require custom `sanity_check_paths` in simpleconfigs touched in
        PRs when generic simpleblock is used
        ([#8101](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8101),
        [#8123](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8123))
    - use CMake built with GCCcore toolchain when installing Eigen
        3.3.4+
        ([#8261](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8261))
    - fix Python classifiers in `setup.py`, should be (only) Python
        2.6 & 2.7
        ([#8299](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8299))
    - use custom simpleblock for OpenBLAS in OpenBLAS 0.3.x simpleconfigs
        ([#8345](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8345),
        [#8339](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8339))

## SimpleBuild v3.9.0 (April 12th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb390 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add `(pre)testopts` simpleconfig parameters
        ([#2793](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2793))
    - add support for `multi_deps` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#2741](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2741),
        [#2810](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2810),
        [#2811](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2811),
        [#2812](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2812),
        [#2813](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2813),
        [#2825](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2825),
        [#2826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2826),
        [#2827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2827),
        [#2828](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2828))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix argument name in `close_pr`
        ([#2752](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2752))
    - fix undefined variable '`prefix`' in
        `Compiler._set_compiler_vars`
        ([#2757](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2757))
    - fix test account for GitHub-related tests
        ([#2760](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2760))
    - make sure read permissions are always set in `permissions_step`
        ([#2770](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2770))
    - make test for `dep_graph` function robust against changing order
        of lines in resulting dot file
        ([#2772](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2772))
    - fix problem with `import_available_modules` when running from
        simplebuild-framework directory
        ([#2786](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2786))
    - prepend location of test simpleblocks to `$PYTHONPATH` to
        `test_generate_software_list`, rather than append
        ([#2788](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2788))
    - use pid in backup name candidate to reduce risk of two processes
        colliding
        ([#2796](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2796))
    - automatically enable `--ignore-osdeps` when using `--preview-pr`
        ([#2799](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2799))
    - use temporary checkout of repository as robot path for
        `--new-pr` and `--update-pr` to determine locations for patch
        files
        ([#2803](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2803))
    - avoid relying on order in which keys are processed in
        `to_dependency`
        ([#2804](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2804))
    - fix yeb format to work with PyYAML 5
        ([#2809](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2809))
    - fix typo in error message for use of unknown simpleconfig
        parameter
        ([#2817](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2817))
    - enhance `log_file_format` to fix problem when `%(name)s`
        template value is used for log directory
        ([#2818](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2818))
    - iterate over subdirectories in order in `find_egg_dir_for` of
        bootstrap script, to ensure oldest vsc-install is picked
        ([#2819](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2819))
    - replace `-Wl,--enable-new-dtags` compiler option with
        `-Wl,--disable-new-dtags` in RPATH wrapper script
        ([#2821](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2821))
    - updated `COMPILER_F77` for PGI >= 19.1
        ([#2823](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2823))
    - added `FFTW_STATIC_LIBS_MT` to `FFTW_MAP_CLASS`, otherwise
        `FFTW_STATIC_LIBS_MT` are incorrectly defined
        ([#2822](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2822))
    - sort available version list when selecting/generating simpleconfig
        ([#2732](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2732))
- other changes:
    - use `assertEqual` rather than `assertEquals` (which is
        deprecated)
        ([#2746](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2746))
    - test with Tmod 4.1.4 (packaged in RHEL8) in Travis CI
        ([#2747](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2747))
    - replace deps by hidden deps instead of removing them from the
        lists
        ([#2748](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2748))
    - ensure non-zero exit code for all test subsuites (+ fix trivial
        style issues)
        ([#2773](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2773))
    - silence printed deprecation warnings for simpleconfigs/toolchains
        while running (simpleconfigs) test suite
        ([#2781](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2781))
    - avoid printing of messages/warnings in framework test suite
        ([#2782](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2782))
    - enable silent mode for `--new-pr` and `--update-pr`
        ([#2802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2802))
    - update Travis config to reflect that PyYAML 5.x is no longer
        compatible with Python 2.6
        ([#2807](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2807))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for TensorRT
    ([#1627](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1627))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - make sure CMake doesn't pick up on system Boost in CMakeMake
        generic simpleblock
        ([#1618](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1618))
    - modified `ConfigureMake` and `CMakeMake` generic simpleblocks to
        allow changing `configure_cmd`, `build_cmd` and `install_cmd` to
        fit various needs
        ([#1628](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1628),
        [#1658](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1658))
    - update ANSYS simpleblock to deal with changed versioning scheme
        ([#1631](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1631))
    - add extra path to builddir for SNPhylo >= 20160204
        ([#1632](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1632))
    - add better support for TensorRT to TensorFlow
        ([#1634](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1634))
    - add support for newer versions of wxPython to wxPython simpleblock
        ([#1635](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1635))
    - update OCaml simpleblock to support OPAM 2.x
        ([#1638](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1638))
    - update sanity check in TensorFlow simpleblock for TensorFlow
        1.13.x
        ([#1642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1642))
    - make `ConfigureMake`, `MesonNinja` and `SCons` generic
        simpleblocks aware of pretestopts
        ([#1645](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1645))
    - add support for installing Python packages with '`pip`'
        without using `--ignore-installed`
        ([#1647](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1647))
    - add support to `CMakeMake` simpleblock to specify compilers using
        absolute file path
        ([#1652](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1652),
        [#1655](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1655))
    - stop checking for deprecated `pgf77` in sanity check of PGI
        simpleblock
        ([#1653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1653))
    - accommodate version 10.1 in CUDA simpleblock
        ([#1654](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1654))
    - install `sitecustomize.py` with Python to support Python package
        installations for multiple Python versions in a single directory
        ([#1657](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1657))
    - enhance SAMtools simpleblock to also install `libhts.a` and
        include/htslib (when applicable)
        ([#1661](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1661))
    - tweak `PythonPackage` & `PythonBundle` to update
        `$EBPYTHONPREFIXES` rather than `$PYTHONPATH` for multi-Python
        installations + make `sanity_check_step` aware of multi_deps
        ([#1664](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1664),
        [#1678](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1678))
    - replace `-openmp` with `-fopenmp` when building TINKER with
        Intel compilers (+ modernize simpleblock)
        ([#1668](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1668))
    - make sure Meson is configured with `-Dlibdir=lib` so it doesn't
        install libraries in `lib/x86_64-linux-gnu` on Debian/Ubuntu
        multiarch systems
        ([#1673](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1673))
    - allow for external libfabric via `ofi_libfabric` parameter in
        impi simpleblock
        ([#1676](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1676))
    - pass down compiler names and options to Qt5 5.8 & more recent
        via corresponding `QMAKE_*` configuration options
        ([#1677](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1677))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - create symlinks to `.modulerc` in symlinked module directories
        ([#1636](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1636))
    - add missing import in FFTW simpleblock
        ([#1641](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1641))
    - fix finding of Python 3 include subdir + `libpython*.so` in
        OpenBabel simpleblock
        ([#1633](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1633))
    - add `no_qa` pattern for interactive installation command for
        ABAQUS
        ([#1637](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1637))
    - make serial, smpar and dm+sm builds of WRF work and pass tests
        ([#1646](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1646))
    - configure CP2K with correct `DATA_DIR` value rather than relying
        on `$CP2K_DATA_DIR` environment variable
        ([#1650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1650))
    - CP2K fixes: only call configure_LAPACK/ScaLAPACK when imkl is
        not used, prefer using 2^2 MPI processes for tests
        ([#1651](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1651))
    - also take into account custom simpleconfig parameters from
        `CMakeMake` in BamTools simpleblock
        ([#1656](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1656))
    - make sure Perl scripts are installed in the right location
        ([#1660](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1660))
    - make sure setenv is used for CUDA_PATH etc.
        ([#1663](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1663))
    - cleanup `sanity_check_paths` in numpy & scipy simpleblocks
        ([#1665](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1665),
        [#1667](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1667))
    - always set `self.pylibdir` in `PythonPackage.set_pylibdirs()`,
        which is important when installing Python packages for multiple
        Python versions via `multi_deps`
        ([#1671](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1671))
    - fix custom definition of `load_module` method in LAPACK module
        ([#1675](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1675))
- other changes:
    - replace '`except OSError, err:`' pattern with
        '`except OSError as err:`' (for compatibility with Python 3.x)
        ([#1639](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1639))
    - clean up Java simpleblock to use `filetools` functionality
        ([#1649](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1649))

        ([#7790](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7790),
        [#7793](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7793))
    - extra patch for TensorFlow 1.12.0 to remove `-B/usr/bin` from
        `linker_bin_path_flag` in `cuda_configure.bzl`
        ([#7800](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7800))
    - fix simpleconfig for STAR-Fusion 1.5.0
        ([#7802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7802))
    - fix checksums for boot/nlme extensions in R simpleconfigs
        ([#7814](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7814),
        [#8054](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8054))
    - add patch for OpenMPI 3.x to fix UCX memory leak
        ([#7535](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7535),
        [#7824](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7824))
    - replace `ncurses-devel` OS dependency in CMake simpleconfigs using
        `dummy` toolchain with proper ncurses dependency
        ([#7834](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7834))
    - use `PythonBundle` for
        `snakemake-5.2.4-foss-2018b-Python-3.6.6.eb` (+ fix moduleclass)
        ([#7842](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7842))
    - use correct `buildopts` + add missing zlib dependency in
        StringTie 1.3.5 simpleconfig
        ([#7845](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7845))
    - update GStreamer to not enable dw and fix some missing
        dependencies
        ([#7889](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7889))
    - add missing XZ dependency to most recent Pysam simpleconfigs
        ([#7897](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7897))
    - expat: add configure option `--without-docbook` to avoid
        docbook2X dependency
        ([#7930](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7930))
    - fix source URLs for mawk
        ([#7960](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7960))
    - fix LWM2, OTF2, OPARI2, and Score-P download URLs
        ([#7994](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7994))
    - use `https://` in homepage & source_urls for OpenMPI and hwloc
        simpleconfigs
        ([#8013](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8013),
        [#8014](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8014),
        [#8015](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8015)
        and
        [#8016](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8016))
    - add missing bokeh dependency for dask 1.0.0 (+ add
        dask-jobqueue)
        ([#8029](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8029))
    - fix checking of binutils build dep in simpleconfig tests
        ([#8038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8038))
- other changes:
    - avoid use of `.items()` in R (bundle) simpleconfigs, to fix
        compatibility with SimpleBuild running on top of Python 3
        ([#7791](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7791))
    - trim down test configuration: only test with Lmod 6.x with
        Tcl/Lua on Python 2.6/2.7
        ([#7795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7795),
        [#7798](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7798))
    - use `%(pyshortver)s` template in (old) SIP simpleconfigs
        ([#7797](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7797))
    - add PyTorch to whitelist for not having '`use_pip`' enabled
        ([#7844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7844))
    - don't use local variable '`pylibdir`' in list comprehension
        in PyQt simpleconfig, since that doesn't work in Python 3
        ([#7848](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7848))
    - use pip instead of setup.py with h5py/2.7.1 and 2017b toolchains
        ([#7864](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7864))
    - prefer `https://` over `ftp://` for source_urls in recent
        GROMACS simpleconfigs
        ([#7948](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7948))
    - rename arrow to Arrow for old simpleconfig
        ([#8007](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/8007))

## SimpleBuild v3.8.1 (January 29th 2019) {: #release_notes_eb381 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various minor enhancements, including:
    - speed up checking of OS dependencies
        ([#2703](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2703))
    - add support for '`eb --show-system-info`'
        ([#2722](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2722))
    - add support for '`%(arch)s`' template value in simpleconfig
        files (x86-64, aarch64, ppc64le, ...)
        ([#2728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2728))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - add timestamp to reprod dir while in tmp space
        ([#2705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2705))
    - avoid '`+`' in directory name for `g++` rpath wrapper
        ([#2710](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2710))
    - pre-install vsc-install < 0.11.4 in bootstrap script to avoid
        requiring '`mock`' Python package
        ([#2717](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2717))
    - fix check in `--merge-pr` whether PR is eligible for merging in
        to only consider the status of the last test report
        ([#2720](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2720))
    - don't recreate build directory when '`buildininstalldir`' is
        enabled for iterative installations
        ([#2724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2724))
    - filter (CUDA) `lib*/stubs` paths in RPATH wrapper script
        ([#2725](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2725))
- other changes:
    - replace '`except IOError, err:`' pattern with
        '`except IOError as err:`' for compatibility with Python 3.x
        ([#2711](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2711))
    - make all `print` statements compatible with Python 3
        ([#2715](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2715))
    - avoid use of `sys.maxint` in dependencies_for
        ([#2716](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2716))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements, including:
    - update Ferret simpleblock to handle Ferret 7.3
        ([#1349](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1349))
    - add support for defining `$LDSHARED` when installing Python
        packages if Python's value doesn't use toolchain compiler
        ($CC)
        ([#1455](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1455))
    - update CP2K simpleblock to add support for CP2K 6.1, and fix
        incorrect LibInt references
        ([#1545](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1545))
    - make OpenFOAM simpleblock handle debug build
        ([#1609](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1609))
    - handle multiple installation keys for MATLAB
        ([#1610](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1610))
    - run '`make check`' in parallel for GROMACS since it involves
        more compilation
        ([#1611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1611))
    - update OpenCV simpleblock for recent versions (3.4.x >= 3.4.4 +
        4.0.x)
        ([#1616](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1616))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - check current `start_dir` value before appending '`src`'
        subdirectory in MrBayes simpleblock
        ([#1582](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1582))
    - avoid that (system) Intel compilers are always considered when
        building SuiteSparse
        ([#1612](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1612))
    - fix missing import statement in ROOT simpleblock
        ([#1614](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1614))
    - answer SELinux question with '`no`' in Mathematica simpleblock
        ([#1617](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1617))
    - disable "build isolation" feature in pip > 10.x in
        PythonPackage generic simpleblock
        ([#1623](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1623))
- other changes
    - cleanup in Perl and PerlModule simpleblocks
        ([#1603](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1603))

**simpleconfigs**

## SimpleBuild v3.8.0 (December 18th 2018) {: #release_notes_eb380 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - support use of version ranges in `--filter-deps`
        ([#2357](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2357))
    - add support for `--list-prs`
        ([#2400](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2400),
        [#2668](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2668))
    - add support for `--close-pr`
        ([#2401](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2401))
    - allow setting `optarch` compiler flags in the simpleconfig via
        `toolchainopts` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#2595](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2595))
    - add option to skip pre-creation of install directory:
        `--disable-pre-create-installdir`
        ([#2629](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2629),
        [#2637](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2637))
    - flesh out setting up of configuration into dedicated
        '`set_up_configuration`' function
        ([#2638](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2638))
    - clean error when '`eb`' is cancelled by user
        ([#2641](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2641))
    - add support for using Slurm as backend for `--job`, via
        `--job-backend=Slurm`
        ([#2642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2642),
        [#2666](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2666))
    - save simpleblocks along with simpleconfig in '`reprod`'
        subdirectory of install directory
        ([#2653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2653))
    - add support for deprecating simpleconfig files & toolchains
        ([#2656](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2656))
    - changed `SimpleConfig.update` to be able to specify not to allow
        duplicate values
        ([#2657](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2657))
    - move adding of dependencies to prepare step instead of check
        readiness step
        ([#2674](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2674))
    - add support for disabling mapping of (sub)toolchains when
        `--try-toolchain` is used, via `--disable-map-toolchains`
        ([#2682](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2682))
    - add '`astro`' and '`quantum`' module classes
        ([#2693](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2693))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make `--from-pr` always try to apply PR patch on top of PR
        target branch
        ([#2631](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2631))
    - fix bug that could cause to silently overwrite an existing
        simpleconfig when using `--try-*`
        ([#2635](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2635))
    - don't pass down specific environment variables into submitted
        jobs
        ([#2643](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2643))
    - update template constants for source URLs to use https
        ([#2648](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2648))
    - fix lib64 fallback for '`lib`'/'`lib64`' dirs entry in
        `sanity_check_paths`
        ([#2649](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2649))
    - change PGI F90 Fortran compiler to pgf90
        ([#2650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2650))
    - use `--set-upstream-to` in `install-SimpleBuild-develop.sh` script
        to deal with deprecated/no longer supported `--set-upstream`
        ([#2651](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2651))
    - fix order of keys in '`toolchain`' value for dumped simpleconfig
        file (name, version) + run style check on dumped simpleconfigs in
        dump tests
        ([#2660](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2660))
    - ensure checksums beside sources in dumped simpleconfigs
        ([#2661](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2661))
    - fix problems with simpleconfig file saved in '`reprod`'
        directory by copying it before running any installation steps
        ([#2664](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2664))
    - make print functions more robust w.r.t. arguments being passed
        to format the message to be printed
        ([#2670](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2670))
    - use '`git am`' to apply patch for PRs in
        `fetch_simpleconfigs_from_pr`
        ([#2680](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2680))
    - correctly define `$LIBFFT_MT` for Intel MKL
        ([#2688](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2688))
    - don't always require simpleconfig files to resolve dependencies
        ([#2690](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2690),
        [#2692](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2692),
        [#2697](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2697),
        [#2698](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2698),
        [#2699](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2699))
- fixes for Travis CI config:
    - stop testing with Lmod 6.6.3, testing with Lmod 6.5.1 is
        sufficient
        ([#2627](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2627))
    - Python 2.6 requires python-daemon 1.x as dep for GC3Pie
        ([#2673](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2673))
    - stick to idna<2.8 with Python 2.6 in Travis + distable broken
        test for HgRepository
        ([#2678](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2678))
- other changes:
    - always skip symlinks in `adjust_permissions`
        ([#2644](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2644))
    - flesh out '`avail_simpleblocks`' function from support for
        `--list-simpleblocks`
        ([#2663](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2663))
    - deprecate the `ictce` toolchain
        ([#2667](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2667))
    - deprecate `goolf` and `goolfc` toolchains
        ([#2676](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2676))
    - deprecate `intel` toolchains older than `intel/2016a` (+
        `iccifort` & `iimpi` subtoolchains)
        ([#2677](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2677))
    - deprecate ancient `gompi` toolchain versions
        ([#2684](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2684))
    - use '`tar xzf`' (gzip) rather than '`tar xZf`' (ancient
        `compress`) to unpack `*.tar.Z` source files
        ([#2686](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2686))
    - flesh out '`set_parallel`' method to it can be called
        separately
        ([#2687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2687))

**simpleblocks**

- new generic simpleblocks:
    - `PythonBundle` for installing a bundle of Python packages
        ([#1553](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1553))
    - `MesonNinja` for installing using Meson & Ninja
        ([#1561](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1561))
- new software specific simpleblock for `RepeatMasker`
    ([#1600](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1600))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - add `-fno-delete-null-pointer-checks` compiler flag for OpenFOAM
        versions older than v3.0
        ([#1311](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1311))
    - add support for building Tau with OTF included as dependency
        ([#1313](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1313))
    - add support for Intel MPI version 2019

    - also populate the include dir for CP2K
        ([#1554](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1554))
    - add custom simpleconfig parameter in GCC simpleblock to control use
        of gold linker: `use_gold_linker`
        ([#1555](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1555))
    - replace '`-`' with '`_`' in default '`import`' check for
        Python packages
        ([#1560](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1560))
    - update WRF and WPS to support version 4
        ([#1563](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1563))
    - adapt PSI simpleblock for PSI4 > 1.2
        ([#1568](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1568))
    - update Siesta simpleblock to 4.1-b4 and add custom test_step
        ([#1573](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1573))
    - enhance Mothur simpleblock to support use of Boost and HDF5 as
        dependencies
        ([#1576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1576))
    - enhance sanity check for icc & ifort: also check for
        `compilers_and_libraries_*/linux` subdirectory
        ([#1577](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1577))
    - update Trinity simpleblock for latest version 2.8
        ([#1579](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1579))
    - add version check in sanity check step of SCOTCH simpleblock (+
        code cleanup)
        ([#1580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1580))
    - add support in Clang simpleblock to skip running of all tests
        ([#1584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1584))
    - update WRF simpleblock to allow serial HDF5 + pick up on parallel
        netCDF

    - avoid hardcoding '`PREFIX=<installdir>`' in build/install
        options when using `SCons` simpleblock
        ([#1594](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1594))
    - enable TensorFlow to detect any MPI runtime
        ([#1597](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1597))
    - enhance `Bundle` simpleblock to allow installation of bundle
        components with additional simpleblocks + build components in
        parallel
        ([#1598](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1598))
    - enhance Trilinos simpleblock to support building against MKL
        ([#1601](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1601))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make FDTD_Solutions simpleblock do the install by copying files
        instead of '`rpm rebuild`'
        ([#1307](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1307))
    - re-add missing `VT_(S)LIB_DIR` env variable to itac module
        ([#1309](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1309))
    - fix in QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock: ifort compiler needs
        `-assume byterecl`
        ([#1556](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1556))
    - extract targets from buildopts in Quantumespresso simpleblock
        ([#1558](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1558))
    - fixes for TensorFlow simpleblock

    - added a test to disable compiling FFTW with MPI if the toolchain

    - fix permissions problem with CUDA nvvp tar files + correctly

    - fix TensorFlow test tempdir problem

    - tweak VMD simpleblock so that `configopts` don't contain
        duplicate values (otherwise it fails to rebuild)

    - fix running netcdf4-python tests to also support installation as
        extension
        ([#1578](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1578))
    - added the openmp flags in the linker flags in MUMPS simpleblock
        ([#1585](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1585))
    - avoid hardcoding `--with-rdma` configure option in MVAPICH2

        ([#1586](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1586))
    - fix location of path-to-source argument in configure command of

        ([#1591](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1591))
    - fix GROMACS use of MKL for non-Intel compilers (e.g. gomkl
        toolchain)
        ([#1596](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1596))
- other changes
    - inform Hound CI about Python 2 builtins
        ([#1604](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1604))

## SimpleBuild v3.7.1 (October 18th 2018) {: #release_notes_eb371 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - generate `.modulerc.lua` when Lua syntax and Lmod >= 7.8 is
        used
        ([#2597](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2597))
    - allow `--force` to use regex if `--try-toolchain` can not map
        intelligently
        ([#2605](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2605))
    - add support for disabling modules tool version check
        ([#2610](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2610))
    - add support to `ModuleGenerator.modulerc` method to also write
        `.modulerc` file
        ([#2611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2611))
    - check whether module file being wrapped exists in same directory
        as module wrapper when using Lmod 6.x
        ([#2611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2611))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - stop relying on '`simple_install`' in bootstrap script, use
        '`python -m simple_install`' instead
        ([#2590](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2590))
    - fix templating of values in `list_software` function
        ([#2591](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2591))
    - fix composing of `lib64` fallback paths in sanity check
        ([#2602](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2602))
    - determine `file_info` for all simpleconfigs before any actual
        copying in `copy_simpleconfigs` function
        ([#2604](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2604))
    - also check for module wrappers in `ModulesTool.exist` method
        ([#2606](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2606))
    - add trailing newline to module load message if it's not there
        yet
        ([#2613](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2613))
    - retain all dependencies when determining dependency tree of a
        toolchain
        ([#2617](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2617))
    - protect `exts_lists` from templating in `dump` method
        ([#2619](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2619))
    - making CUDA capability detection more robust
        ([#2621](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2621))
- other changes:
    - lower required Lmod version to 6.5.1
        ([#2593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2593))

**simpleblocks**

- new software specific simpleblocks for fastStructure
    ([#1529](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1529))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - support bypassing use of system type obtained with recent
        `config.guess` in `ConfigureMake`
        ([#1531](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1531))
    - enhance generated module file for FreeSurfer
        ([#1543](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1543))
    - add option in Qt simpleblock to check for QtWebEngine component in
        sanity check
        ([#1544](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1544))
    - also install CP2K as a library + code cleanup in CP2K simpleblock
        ([#1547](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1547))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix checking for downloaded dependencies for stand-alone
        installations in `PythonPackage` generic simpleblock
        ([#1530](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1530))
    - also specify `--host` option to configure script based on
        config.guess result in `ConfigureMake` simpleblock
        ([#1532](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1532))
    - use short module name when creating module wrapper in `ModuleRC`
        generic simpleblock
        ([#1535](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1535))
    - use `DOT_MODULERC` constant in `ModuleRC` simpleblock rather than
        hardcoding '`.modulerc`'
        ([#1533](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1533))
    - use `--no-deps` when installing .whl in TensorFlow simpleblock if
        extension are being installed, move test run to sanity check
        ([#1537](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1537))
    - use `os.getcwd()` rather than `self.startdir` in TensorFlow
        simpleblock to fix installation of TensorFlow as extension in a
        bundle
        ([#1540](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1540))
    - add symlink to wrapped module file when creating `.modulerc` in
        temporary location
        ([#1539](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1539))
    - properly handle Python dependency in Qscintilla simpleblock
        ([#1499](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1499))
- other changes:
    - cleanup Tarball simpleblock by using `copy_dir` function
        ([#1541](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1541))

        ([#6950](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6950)),

- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software

        OpenMPI 3.1.2, Pillow 5.3.0, PyCUDA 2018.1
- minor enhancements, including:
    - add clustree + plotly extensions (+ deps) for R 3.5.1
        ([#6901](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6901))
    - add tclsh symlink to recent Tcl simpleconfigs
        ([#6915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6915))
    - update GROMACS 2016.3 with NVML patches
        ([#6936](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6936))
    - use `make=make` in build options for ParMGridGen simpleconfigs
        ([#6952](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6952))
    - add `Data::Dump` as extension to Perl (dependency for GIMIC)
        ([#7004](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7004))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - inhibit `-Werror` in binutils 2.26 as new system GCC has case
        fallthrough warnings
        ([#5793](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5793))
    - change fastStructure simpleconfig to use custom simpleblock
        ([#6893](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6893))
    - fix toolchain for tbb dependency in
        `Bowtie2-2.3.4.2-foss-2018b.eb`
        ([#6927](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6927))
    - fix uroot installation in R-3.5.1-foss-2018b
        ([#6934](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6934))
    - add missing Python packages in TensorFlow 1.10.x simpleconfigs
        ([#6940](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6940))
    - add missing dep for Szip in 2017b builds of netCDF
        ([#6942](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6942))
    - fix missing comment from
        `OpenBabel-2.4.1-fix-link-path-tests.patch`
        ([#6943](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6943))
    - add patch to Python 3.6.1 - 3.6.3 that removes comment in
        comment
        ([#6946](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6946))
    - add missing `ulimit_unlimited=True` (see issue
        [#6484](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6484))
        in the newest Python builds
        ([#6959](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6959))
    - solve '`version UUID_1.0 not found`' problem in LibUUID
        simpleconfigs
        ([#6962](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6962))
    - eliminate dependency on ancient problematic LibUUID library,
        replace with util-linux
        ([#6963](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6963))
    - force building of `ccmake` for CMake 3.12.1 + fix deps
        ([#6967](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6967))
    - fix broken installation for Python 3.6.2 & 3.6.3 with PyNaCl as
        dep for paramiko extension by explicitly including previous
        PyNaCl version as extension
        ([#6971](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6971))
    - fix source URL for ADMIXTURE (no https) + add SHA256 checksum
        ([#6982](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6982))
    - add missing NSS/DBus dependencies to Qt 5.10.1 simpleconfigs built
        with foss toolchain to ensure that QtWebEngine component gets
        installed
        ([#7005](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7005))
    - add '`openssl`' OS deps in Perl 5.28.0 simpleconfig for
        `Net::ssleay`
        ([#7008](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7008))
    - add missing checksum for ipaddress extension in Python
        simpleconfigs
        ([#7021](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7021)
        and
        [#7033](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7033))
    - add missing extensions to Python 2.7.14
        ([#7022](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7022)
        and
        [#7023](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7023)),
        3.6.2
        ([#7025](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7025)),
        3.6.3
        ([#7027](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7027))
        and 3.6.4
        ([#7029](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7029)
        and
        [#7030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7030))
    - add missing OS dependencies for git
        ([#7028](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7028))
    - create default configuration for RTG-Tools
        ([#7032](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7032))
    - also run checks on changed files when target branch for PR is
        something different than 'develop'
        ([#7034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/7034))
- other changes:
    - removed dead 'bzip.org' source URL for bzip2 source tarball
        ([#6983](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6983))

## SimpleBuild v3.7.0 (September 25th 2018) {: #release_notes_eb370 }

feature release

**framework**

- minimal Lmod version requirement bumped to 6.6.3
    ([#2575](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2575))
- various enhancements, including:
    - add support to bootstrap script to force install specific
        SimpleBuild version
        ([#2382](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2382),
        [#2580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2580))
    - consider potential of multiple subtoolchains when resolving
        dependencies
        ([#2464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2464),
        [#2465](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2465),
        [#2466](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2466),
        [#2585](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2585))
    - fall back to downloading using the `requests` Python package (if
        installed) when `urllib2` fails due to SSL error
        ([#2538](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2538))
    - make `--try-toolchain` more aware of subtoolchains
        ([#2539](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2539))
        - subtoolchain of original toolchains are now mapped to
            subtoolchains of target toolchain
    - add support for BLIS and goblf toolchain that uses BLIS for BLAS
        ([#2540](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2540))
    - allow skipping of sanity check step via '`skipsteps`'
        simpleconfig parameter
        ([#2549](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2549))
    - add support for `--check-contrib`
        ([#2551](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2551))
        - equivalent with `--check-style`, but also verifies presence
            of SHA256 checksums (+ more checks in the future)
    - added support to 'download' sources from git
        ([#2555](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2555))
        - see
            <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Writing_simpleconfig_files.html#downloading-from-a-git-repository>
    - add '`parse`' hook to add support for applying site-specific
        customisations to the 'raw' simpleconfig
        ([#2562](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2562),
        [#2566](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2566))
        - see <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/develop/Hooks.html>
    - lift invalidating of module caches into helper method that can
        be used by simpleblocks
        ([#2571](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2571))
    - always dump a fully parsed simpleconfig to the '`reprod`' subdir
        of the installation directory
        ([#2574](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2574))
    - add '`modulerc`' method to `ModuleGenerator` class
        ([#2575](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2575))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make GC3Pie stop build process if a dependency failed
        ([#2474](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2474))
    - filter out patched files in test/ in `fetch_simpleconfigs_from_pr`
        ([#2547](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2547))
    - check GC3pie version using the `pkg_resources` API rather than
        using `__version__` (which was removed in GC3Pie 2.5.0)
        ([#2554](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2554))
    - fix enforcing of checksums for extensions
        ([#2561](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2561),
        [#2570](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2570),
        [#2579](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2579))
    - skip running of configuration checks while only a single
        configuration level is taken into account during `--show-config`
        ([#2567](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2567))
    - fix error statements in modules tool version checks
        ([#2576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2576))
    - fix finding of software subdirectory for specified patch file in
        `--new-pr`/`--update-pr`
        ([#2577](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2577))
    - take into account dependency 'wrappers' in check_conflicts
        ([#2583](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2583))
    - stick to pycparser < 2.19 with Python 2.6 in Travis config
        ([#2584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2584))
- other changes:
    - use `namelower` as default for '`github_account`' simpleconfig
        parameter
        ([#2528](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2528))
    - use `.counts()` rather than deprecated `.stats()` for GC3Pie
        ([#2573](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2573))

**simpleblocks**

- new generic simpleblock: `ModuleRC`
    ([#1503](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1503),
    [#1518](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1518))
- new software specific simpleblocks for BWISE
    ([#1497](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1497))
    and VEP
    ([#1512](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1512))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock: stop building in installation
        dir, do not use external FoX dependency, support for recent
        versions
        ([#1312](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1312))
    - updates to TensorFlow simpleblock:
        - require cuDNN if CUDA support is enabled, enable mkl-dnn by
            default, fix problem with internal protobuf problem, add
            awareness for TensorRT & NCCL
            ([#1453](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1453))
        - add support for IntelMPI
            ([#1507](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1507))
    - update WIEN2k simpleblock for version 18.1
        ([#1460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1460))
    - add CUDA '`stubs`' subdirectory to $LIBRARY_PATH
        ([#1464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1464))
    - add support for building ScaLAPACK on top of BLIS
        ([#1467](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1467))
    - handle X11 better and make '`static`' a build flag in Amber
        simpleblock
        ([#1468](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1468))
    - update Boost simpleblock for Boost 1.67.0 (name change in Python
        3.x library files)
        ([#1472](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1472))
    - add CEI/bin to $PATH for ANSYS 19 & newer
        ([#1476](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1476))
    - enhance SCons simpleblock to enable building in parallel
        ([#1477](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1477))
    - add awareness for CCOLAMD and CAMD in Trilinos simpleblock
        ([#1480](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1480))
    - add support to apply (binary) patches after main CUDA install
        ([#1481](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1481),
        [#1483](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1483))
    - add support for only building Python bindings (+ code cleanup)
        in Boost simpleblock
        ([#1484](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1484),
        [#1495](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1495))
    - provide control over subdirectory in which R packages are
        installed
        ([#1485](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1485))
    - added regex to fix `$WM_PROJECT_VERSION` correctly in OpenFOAM
        simpleblock
        ([#1489](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1489))
    - improve PGI siterc so it allows `-pthread` switch
        ([#1494](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1494))
    - customise `check_checksums method` in Bundle simpleblock to fix
        checking of checksums for components
        ([#1496](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1496))
    - include a pkgconfig file '`hdf5.pc`' to HDF5 installations
        ([#1504](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1504))
    - (download &) use an updated `config.guess` script in generic
        ConfigureMake simpleblock
        ([#1506](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1506),
        [#1522](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1522),
        [#1523](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1523),
        [#1524](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1524))
    - make `IntelBase` generic simpleblock aware of `(pre)installopts`
        ([#1509](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1509))
    - update Siesta simpleblock for v3.2 to 4.1-b3
        ([#1510](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1510))
    - take `(pre)installopts` into account in RPackage generic
        simpleblock
        ([#1513](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1513))
    - update DOLFIN simpleblock for latest version
        ([#2018](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/2018).1)
        ([#1521](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1521))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - drop useless definition of `$NLSPATH` in `IntelBase` + fix ipp
        library paths
        ([#1442](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1442))
    - fix order of arguments in log message in `PythonPackage`
        simpleblock
        ([#1459](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1459))
    - run `ldconfig` in post-install step of CUDA simpleblock to create
        missing symlinks in 'stubs' subdirectory
        ([#1473](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1473))
    - take into account that only name/version may be specified for
        some components in `Bundle` simpleblock
        ([#1474](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1474))
    - make SuperLU simpleblock consider both `lib` and `lib64`
        subdirectories
        ([#1479](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1479))
    - use short build dir for Trilinos to dance around
        "`Argument list too long`" problem + link with `libmetis.a`
        ([#1486](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1486))
    - correct check for Red Hat 6 based OS in TensorFlow simpleblock
        ([#1487](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1487))
    - improve configuration choice in FSL simpleblock
        ([#1498](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1498))
    - don't check for `mcc` in MATLAB sanity check as it requires a
        specific toolbox license
        ([#1514](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1514))
    - make sure Bazel doesn't write files in $HOME/.cache when
        building TensorFlow
        ([#1519](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1519))
    - enable VSX on POWER for FFTW >= 3.3.7
        ([#1520](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1520))
    - add `librt` as dependency when linking Trilinos with SuiteSparse
        ([#1525](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1525))
- other changes:
    - switch to using CMake install procedure for Eigen 3.3.4 & newer
        ([#1482](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1482))
    - bump Lmod version used in Travis config to 6.6.3 (now required
        by framework)
        ([#1505](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1505))

        3.6.6, R 3.5.1, TensorFlow 1.10.1, Trilinos 12.12.1, WIEN2k 18.1
- minor enhancements, including:
    - add test to enforce SHA256 checksums in touched files in pull
        requests to develop
        ([#5005](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5005))
    - add various extensions to recent R simpleconfigs
        ([#6590](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6590),
        [#6686](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6686),
        [#6858](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6858))
    - add `mpmath` extension to Python 3.6.4 + 3.7.0 simpleconfigs
        ([#6607](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6607),
        [#6713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6713))
    - add Java 1.8 simpleconfig that can be updated in-place to more
        recent JDK 1.8.x
        ([#6712](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6712))
        - see also
            <https://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Wrapping_dependencies.html>
    - add `iso_c_binding` support to arpack-ng 3.6.2
        ([#6718](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6718))
    - add `XML::Parser`, `XML::RegExp` & `XML::DOM` extensions to
        Perl([#6744](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6744))
    - add `tabulate` extension to all Python > 3.6 simpleconfigs
        ([#6809](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6809))
    - enable MPI version of arpack-ng 3.5.0
        ([#6840](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6840))
    - add `wish` symlink to `wish8.6` in recent Tk simpleconfigs
        ([#6870](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6870))
    - add `libXp` and `printproto` to X11 bundle
        ([#6873](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6873))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - define '`_GNU_SOURCE`' to ensure that '`reallocarray`' is
        defined in flex 2.6.4 simpleconfigs, fixes bootstrap crash
        ([#5792](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5792),
        [#6766](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6766))
    - added tabix dependency in VCFtools
        ([#6584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6584))
    - added zlib dependency to BWA
        ([#6591](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6591)),
        BEDTools
        ([#6592](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6592)),
        VCFtools
        ([#6653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6653))
    - add checksums to googletest simpleconfigs
        ([#6611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6611))
    - fix source URL + add checksum to
        wkhtmltopdf-0.12.3-Linux-x86_64.eb
        ([#6628](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6628),
        [#6641](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6641))
    - don't use external FoX dependency in QuantumESPRESSO 6.2
        ([#6638](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6638))
    - update hwloc simpleconfigs with libxml2 and libpciaccess
        dependencies
        ([#6639](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6639))
    - fix gettext build dep for Mono-5.10.0.160
        ([#6640](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6640))
    - remove no longer existing config option
        `--enable-mpi-thread-multiple` in OpenMPI 3.x simpleconfigs
        ([#6645](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6645))
    - fix homepage in recent HDF5 simpleconfigs
        ([#6687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6687))
    - add expat dependency to Mesa v18.1.1
        ([#6706](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6706))
    - add missing `--with-trio-flavor=netcdf` flag to ABINIT 8.x
        simpleconfigs
        ([#6711](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6711))
    - remove useless definition of $TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST in PyTorch
        simpleconfig that doesn't use CUDA
        ([#6719](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6719))
    - fix building GCCcore 6.3.0 on recent OSs by backporting patches
        from 6.4.0
        ([#6727](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6727))
    - fix `source_urls` in bzip2 simpleconfigs
        ([#6728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6728))
    - specify location of dependencies in configure options for libgd
        (to avoid system libraries being used instead)
        ([#6731](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6731))
    - also install docs/man pages in recent git simpleconfigs (versions
        2.1x.y)
        ([#6751](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6751))
    - add CMake build dep for Eigen 3.3.4
        ([#6756](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6756),
        [#6784](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6784))
    - add expat dependency to Perl 5.26.0
        ([#6758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6758))
    - add ncurses OS dependency to CMake for Debian distros
        ([#6783](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6783))
    - fix checksums for pkgmaker, rngtools & RcppProgress extensions
        in R 3.4.3 simpleconfigs
        ([#6815](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6815))
    - add pkg-config build dependency to GTS
        ([#6819](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6819))
    - do not check if hwloc-dump-hwdata utility was installed, since
        it's only built on x86 systems
        ([#6836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6836))
    - patch libxc 3.x and 4.0.x to compile on POWER
        ([#6868](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6868))
    - consistently add patch for paycheck extension in Python 3.6/3.7
        to fix UTF8 issue with README
        ([#6892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6892))
- other changes:
    - bump Lmod version used in Travis config to 6.6.3 (now required
        by framework)
        ([#6834](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6834))

## SimpleBuild v3.6.2 (July 11th 2018) {: #release_notes_eb362 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for including environment variable that is resolved
        at "module load time" in user module path
        ([#2395](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2395))
        - `{RUNTIME_ENV::EXAMPLE}` is replaced by value of `$EXAMPLE`
            when module is loaded
    - also support generating Docker container recipes & image via
        `--containerize` (still experimental)
        ([#2479](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2479))
    - add support for specifying source URLs directly in '`sources`'
        ([#2520](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2520))
    - perform early 'raw' parse of provided simpleconfig file to check
        for syntax error or faulty inputs
        ([#2523](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2523))
    - add '`bitbucket_account`' simpleconfig parameter and template,
        and let `BITBUCKET*` templates use it
        ([#2525](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2525))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - take into account `--filter-deps` when re-loading build
        dependencies in `extensions_step`
        ([#2516](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2516))
    - fix for offline use of bootstrap script: ignore errors when
        determining source URLs if source tarballs are provided
        ([#2517](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2517))
    - fix error message that is raised for incorrect type of value in
        `sanity_check_paths`
        ([#2524](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2524))
- other changes:
    - move flake8 config into `setup.cfg` + fix style issues in
        `simplebuild/tools/options.py`
        ([#2511](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2511))
    - make test that verifies that `BuildOptions` does not support
        updating a bit more flexible
        ([#2518](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2518))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for OpenCV
    ([#1444](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1444))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - use `$CPATH`/`$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` for CMake's
        `find_path`/`find_library` functions in `CMakeMake` simpleblock
        ([#1165](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1165))
    - make cdft lib compilation optional for Intel MKL, by detecting
        MPI availability
        ([#1393](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1393))
    - add `use_glibcxx11_abi` simpleconfig parameter in Boost simpleblock
        ([#1434](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1434))
    - enable filtering of paths in `$CPATH` and `$LIBRARY_PATH` in
        TensorFlow simpleblock
        ([#1436](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1436))
    - add support for building GROMACS with `--optarch=GENERIC`
        ([#1440](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1440))
    - check current stack limit and set it to '`unlimited`' if
        possible in Python simpleblock
        ([#1441](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1441))
    - trivial update for Q&A in SAS simpleblock
        ([#1448](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1448))
    - allow skipping tests when installing Perl extensions, by setting
        '`runtest`' to `False`
        ([#1451](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1451))
    - add support for installing Intel products using serial numbers
        ([#1452](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1452))
    - update version check to FFTW 3.3.8 for tests to pass on POWER
        (ppc64le)
        ([#1454](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1454))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - build MPFR in GCC stage 1 without LTO if (system) GCC used is
        too old
        ([#1435](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1435))
    - make sure xmlpatterns always gets built with Qt
        ([#1437](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1437))
    - fix symlink check in NWChem simpleblock + use
        `change_dir`/`remove_file`/`symlink` functions
        ([#1438](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1438))
- other changes:
    - move flake8 configuration to `setup.cfg` and make HoundCI aware
        of it
        ([#1430](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1430))

**simpleconfigs**

- added simpleconfigs for new toolchains: `foss/2018b`
    ([#6424](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6424)),
    `fosscuda/2018b`
    ([#6555](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6555))
    and `intel/2018b`

        heaptrack
        ([#6450](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6450)),
        libgpuarray
        ([#5429](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5429)),

        ([#6449](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6449)),
        MAJIQ

        nanopolish
        ([#6464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6464)),
        opencv_contrib
        ([#6441](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6441)),
        PRC
        ([#6477](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6477)),
        Pillow-SIMD
        ([#6152](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6152)),
        Pytorch
        ([#6152](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6152)),

        ([#6467](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6467)),

        [#6452](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6452))
- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software
    packages, including:
    - GROMACS 2018.2, HDF5 1.10.2, IPython 6.3.1, Kraken 1.0, Mesa
        18.1.1, netCDF 4.6.1, NWChem 6.8, OpenBLAS 0.3.1, OpenMPI 3.1.1,
        Perl 5.28.0, Python 2.7.15, R 3.5.0, X11 20180604
- minor enhancements, including:
    - add hint on file name differences between downloaded and
        expected in cuDNN simpleconfig
        ([#6042](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6042))
    - add '`gee`' extension to R 3.4.4 simpleconfigs
        ([#6376](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6376))
    - enable building of MPI libraries in VTK 8.1.0 simpleconfigs
        ([#6460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6460),

- minor changes, including:

## SimpleBuild v3.6.1 (May 26th 2018) {: #release_notes_eb361 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for enabling fallback in sanity check to consider
        `lib64` equivalent for seemingly missing libraries
        ([#2477](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2477))
    - add `GITHUB_LOWER_SOURCE` constant
        ([#2491](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2491))
    - add '`exts_download_dep_fail`' as known simpleconfig parameter
        ([#2493](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2493))
    - add support for passing custom messages on failing sanity check
        for extensions
        ([#2494](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2494))
    - add definition for `fosscuda` toolchain
        ([#2507](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2507))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make `--inject-checksums` always re-order
        `source_urls`/`sources`/`patches`/`checksums`
        ([#2487](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2487))
    - fix git remote url in `CONTRIBUTING.md`
        ([#2490](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2490))
    - make `flake8` happy in `simpleblock.py`
        ([#2492](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2492))
    - handle missing permissions for adding labels in `--new-pr`
        ([#2497](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2497))
    - restore tweaked `$TMPDIR` value after loading module (for sanity
        check)
        ([#2498](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2498))
    - enhance `get_module_path` function to auto-detect generic vs
        software-specific simpleblock class names
        ([#2502](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2502))
    - don't blindly overwrite an existing simpleconfig in `tweak_one`
        ([#2504](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2504))
    - take account that `PlaintextKeyring` may be provided via
        `keyrings.alt`
        ([#2505](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2505))
    - prepend location for temporary module file to `$MODULEPATH` with
        high priority + mark it as default in `load_fake_module` method
        ([#2506](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2506))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements, including:
    - add support for detecting auto-downloaded dependencies in
        `PythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#1377](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1377))
        - disabled by default, can be enabled using
            "`download_dep_fail = True`" in simpleconfig file
    - add support to enable integration of pscom in psmpi simpleblock
        ([#1397](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1397))
    - set `$CMAKE_*_PATH` when `CMake` is loaded in `PythonPackage`
        simpleblock
        ([#1398](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1398))
    - update WIEN2k simpleblock for v17
        ([#1405](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1405))
    - disable jemalloc support in TensorFlow on CentOS 6 & co (+ minor
        cleanups)
        ([#1412](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1412))
    - update Maple simpleblock to support recent versions
        ([#1414](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1414))
    - enable `nc-config` usage for netCDF in ESMF >=7.1
        ([#1419](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1419))
    - enhance PETSc simpleblock for version 3.9
        ([#1421](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1421))
    - check output of MATLAB installation command for invalid
        installation key error
        ([#1423](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1423))
    - fix suffix for Boost Python library in Boost 1.67.0 & newer
        ([#1424](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1424))
    - support adding specific paths to `$PATH` for generic Binary
        simpleblock via '`prepend_to_path`' custom simpleconfig parameter
        ([#1426](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1426))
- minor changes, including:
    - assume PGI Community edition is used when no license file is
        specified
        ([#1427](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1427))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix imkl sanity check overwriting base libs with interface libs
        ([#1392](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1392))
    - install Chimera in a subdirectory to avoid its dependencies
        being added to the environment
        ([#1413](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1413))
    - add conditional so "`--with-x`" is only added to configopts if
        left unspecified in R simpleblock
        ([#1415](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1415))
    - make `configure` and `make` look for FoX in `$EBROOTFOX` in
        QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock
        ([#1420](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1420))
    - fix path for `$ICEM_ACN` in ANSYS simpleblock
