## SimpleBuild v3.6.0 (April 26th 2018) {: #release_notes_eb360 }

feature release

**framework**

- (experimental) support for generating Singularity container recipes
    & (optionally) images via '`sudo singularity`'
    ([#2332](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2332),
    [#2480](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2480),
    [#2481](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2481),
    [#2482](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2482),
    [#2483](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2483))
    - see documentation at
        <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Containers.html>
- include `-ftree-vectorize` and `-fno-math-errno` in default compiler
    optimisation flags for GCC
    ([#2388](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2388))
    - this significantly improves performance of generated binaries
        when building with a GCC-based toolchain
    - can be disabled if needed via the `vectorize` toolchain option
- several enhancements/fixes to GitHub integration support:
    - loosen commit message requirements for `--new-pr` w.r.t. to
        patches as long as all simpleconfigs are new
        ([#2438](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2438))
    - automatically add '`new`' and/or '`update`' labels in
        `--new-pr`
        ([#2384](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2384))
    - add `force_in_dry_run=True` to `copy_file` in `copy_patch_files`
        ([#2442](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2442))
    - test for custom commit message when deleting a file instead of
        when adding a patch
        ([#2443](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2443))
    - make `diff_stat` pattern also match output of older git versions
        in tests for `--new`/`update-pr`
        ([#2444](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2444))
    - remove duplicates from `--new-pr` title
        ([#2478](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2478))
- add support for "`eb --fetch`" to only download sources (even
    without having a modules tool installed)
    ([#2457](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2457))
- add definitions for a bunch of new toolchains:
    - `golf`
        ([#2458](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2458)),
        `gmkl`
        ([#2460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2460)),
        `gomkl`
        ([#2455](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2455)),
        `pmkl`
        ([#2460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2460))
    - toolchains including CUDA: `gmklc`, `gomklc`, `iimklc`,
        `iompic`, `iomklc`
        ([#2461](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2461))
- various minor enhancements, including:
    - avoid that '`--inject-checksums`' adds lines longer than 120
        characters
        ([#2434](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2434))
    - enable caching of `$HOME/.cache/pip` in Travis config
        ([#2435](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2435))
    - replace raw strings with bytes literal as iterator sentinels in
        checksum calculation
        ([#2446](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2446))
    - new command-line option '`--job-max-jobs`' to cap nr of
        submitted build jobs with GC3Pie
        ([#2378](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2378))
    - add configuration for houndci + flake8
        ([#2451](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2451))
    - add `Accept` header when downloading file
        ([#2437](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2437))
    - include running of '`eb --check-github`' in Travis config
        ([#2449](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2449),
        [#2454](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2454))
    - flesh out common code blocks in `test/framework/options.py`
        ([#2452](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2452))
    - support '`depends_on`' load statements in generated modules
        via `--module-depends-on` and `module_depends_on` simpleconfig
        parameter
        ([#2391](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2391))
    - fix compatibility with Modules v4.1.x
        ([#2470](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2470))
    - add support to `run_cmd` to enable streaming output
        ([#2476](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2476))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - determine whether included simpleblocks are generic or not based
        on class they define
        ([#2432](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2432))
    - make sure GitHub token is used in test for `--preview-pr`
        ([#2436](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2436))
    - take into account that toolchain components may be hidden when
        determining toolchain composition
        ([#2440](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2440))
    - stick to autopep8 1.3.4 when testing with Python 2.6
        ([#2462](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2462))
    - strip off `.lua` extension when backing up modules to ensure
        Lmod 6.x doesn't pick up on them
        ([#2463](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2463))
    - check for `modulecmd.tcl` before modulecmd in bootstrap script
        to discriminate between Modules 4.1.x vs 3.2.10
        ([#2468](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2468))
    - fix `derive_alt_pypi_url` after PyPI switching to sha256 in
        package URLs + fix broken test for `pypi_source_urls` + fix
        bootstrap script
        ([#2471](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2471))
    - make sure that both '`get_git_revision`' and
        '`this_is_simplebuild`' return regular strings rather than
        Unicode strings
        ([#2472](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2472))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for Nim
    ([#1402](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1402))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - enhance `RPackage` simpleblock to support installing from unpacked
        sources
        ([#1383](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1383))
    - add support to `PythonPackage` simpleblock to install with
        '`pip install --editable`'
        ([#1384](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1384))
    - add `$EBROOTIFORT/include` in `$CPATH` for ifort
        ([#1385](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1385))
    - add houndci + flake8 configuration
        ([#1388](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1388))
    - add additional location to `$PATH` for FLUENT installations
        ([#1389](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1389))
    - make `PythonPackage` generic simpleblock aware of
        '`unpack_options`' simpleconfig parameter
        ([#1391](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1391))
    - minor updates to ABAQUS simpleblock to support latest version
        ([#1394](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1394))
    - add support for extracting sources in `Binary` simpleblock
        ([#1401](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1401))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix linking to FFTW for Doris: should be `-lfftw3f`
        ([#1387](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1387))
    - fix for installing TensorFlow 1.6.0: use the absolute path for
        the C compiler when compiling with GPU support
        ([#1386](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1386))
    - also take `lib64` into account for binutils libraries
        ([#1399](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1399))
    - make sanity check in MPICH simpleblock aware of libraries in
        `lib64` subdir
        ([#1403](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1403))
    - take into account that `self.debuggerpath` may not be set in icc
        simpleblock
        ([#1408](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1408))
    - extend noqa in configure step of Qt simpleblock
        ([#1409](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1409))

    - bump hwloc dep for OpenMPI 2.1.2 that is part of `iomkl/2018a`
        to v1.11.8

    - drop use of `--disable-dlopen` in (recent) OpenMPI simpleconfigs

    - fix checksums for R extensions that were updated in place in
        simpleconfigs for R versions 3.4.3 & 3.4.4

    - include pkg-config as build dep in recent R simpleconfigs
        (required for at least nloptr)
        ([#6122](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6122))
    - remove Intel-specific workaround for
        '`undefined symbol: __stack_chk_guard`' issue from Python
        3.6.4 foss/2018a simpleconfig
        ([#6130](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6130))
    - add configopt `--without-matlab`/`octave` to all NLopt
        simpleconfigs
        ([#6132](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6132))
    - also consider `lib64` in `sanity_check_paths` for Bison 3.0.4
        ([#6170](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6170))
    - don't use libyaml built with dummy as dep for PyYAML
        ([#6208](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6208))
    - add missing pkg-config build dep in recent
        GObject-Introspection, GLib & cairo simpleconfigs
        ([#6216](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6216))
    - don't include (ancient version of) `Time::HiRes` as Perl
        extension, since it's a core Perl module
        ([#6225](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6225))
        - this fixes problems with the installation of BioPerl and
            proovread
    - add missing XML-LibXML dependency in recent BioPerl simpleconfigs
        ([#6226](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6226))
    - add `--without-ada` configure option in recent ncurses
        simpleconfigs
        ([#6228](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6228))
    - add patch for snaphu to fix segmentation fault due to use of
        short integer
        ([#6230](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/6230))

## SimpleBuild v3.5.2 (March 2nd 2018) {: #release_notes_eb352 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

    - add missing libpng dependency in ROOT 6.10.08 simpleconfigs

    - fix option passed to configure in M4

    - rename SIBELia to Sibelia
        ([#5603](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5603))
    - add patch for binutils 2.26 to fix compatibility with GCC 6.x
        ([#5611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5611))
    - fix for dependencies was set twice in OpenMPI 3.0.0 simpleconfig
        ([#5619](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5619))
    - fix download URL in comment of Kent tools simpleconfigs
        ([#5633](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5633))
    - add SHA256 checksums to various simpleconfigs
        ([#5635](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5635),

## SimpleBuild v3.5.0 (December 15th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb350 }

feature release

**framework**

- add support for implementing pre- and post-step hooks
    ([#2343](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2343))
    - documentation available at
        <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Hooks.html>
- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for foss-like toolchain with Spectrum MPI: `gsolf`
        ([#2329](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2329))
    - add support for `--preview-pr`
        ([#2331](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2331),
        [#2337](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2337),
        [#2348](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2348))
        - see also
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Integration_with_GitHub.html#previewing-simpleconfig-pull-requests-preview-pr>
    - flesh out `find_extension` function, hoist dict with extract
        commands into a constant
        ([#2336](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2336))
    - add support for using `self.start_dir` rather than using
        `self.cfg['start_dir']`
        ([#2339](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2339))
    - add support for '`exts_default_options`' simpleconfig parameter
        ([#2345](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2345),
        [#2346](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2346))
    - allow use of '`start_dir`' simpleconfig parameter in extensions
        ([#2353](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2353))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix typo in '`giolf`' toolchain definition
        ([#2327](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2327))
    - fix minor issues with `--inject-checksums`
        ([#2333](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2333))
    - fix error message when '`gv`' Python package is not available
        ([#2340](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2340))
    - install paramiko version < 2.4.0 for Python 2.6 in Travis
        config
        ([#2344](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2344))
    - disable broken log rotation, avoid duplicate logging of output
        of executed commands under '`--debug`'
        ([#2347](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2347))
    - also include $ORIGIN and absolute paths to '`lib`' and
        '`lib64`' subdirectories in RPATH locations
        ([#2358](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2358))
    - fix repo references in `install-SimpleBuild-develop.sh` script
        ([#2360](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2360))

**simpleblocks**

- new software-specific simpleblock for Bazel
    ([#1286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1286))
    and Octave
    ([#1304](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1304))
- new generic simpleblock for installing Octave packages as extensions
    ([#1304](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1304),
    [#1318](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1318))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - remove `foamExec` & `wdot` from sanity checks, add `blockMesh` &
        `checkMesh` + enable logging for recent OpenFOAM versions
        ([#1205](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1205),
        [#1272](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1272))
    - add exceptions for FFTW/3.3.6 on POWER with GCC 5/6/7
        ([#1274](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1274))
    - add support for Spectrum MPI to the `SystemMPI` simpleblock
        ([#1275](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1275))
    - allow skipping of steps for `Bundle` components + fix issues
        with templates & formatting of error message
        ([#1278](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1278))
    - update HPCG simpleblock for v3.0 by changing configure syntax
        ([#1284](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1284))
    - correctly configure for BLAS/LAPACK in R simpleblock & check
        configure output
        ([#1292](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1292),
        [#1300](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1300))

        ([#1297](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1297),
        [#1303](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1303))
    - allow tuning of build command in `PythonPackage` via custom
        '`buildcmd`' simpleconfig parameter
        ([#1299](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1299))
    - set default Java encoding to `UTF8` when installing Trinity
        ([#1302](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1302))

        ([#1234](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1234))
    - make the ScaLAPACK simpleblock capable of building in parallel

    - fix check for Intel MKL in PSI simpleblock

    - fix missing space in fftw simpleblock
        ([#1277](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1277))
    - fix use of FFTW on top of Intel MKL in CP2K simpleblock
        ([#1281](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1281))
    - fix wrong sanity check for Boost when using Python 3.x
        ([#1283](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1283))
    - pick up per-component checksums in `Bundle` generic simpleblock
        ([#1285](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1285))
    - correctly pass down optimization flags in CP2K simpleblock
        ([#1293](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1293))

## SimpleBuild v3.4.1 (October 17th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb341 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - improve trace output for executed commands + drop requirement
        for `--experimental` for `--trace`
        ([#2306](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2306))
    - add `giolf` toolchain definition: GCC, IntelMPI, OpenBLAS,
        (Sca)LAPACK and FFTW
        ([#2310](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2310))
    - add support for `--force-download` and `--ignore-checksums`
        ([#2313](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2313),
        [#2314](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2314))
    - flesh out `pypi_source_urls` from `derive_alt_pypi_url`
        ([#2319](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2319))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - also check for use of `--rebuild` next to `--force` to skip
        sanity check with `--module-only`
        ([#2307](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2307))
    - ensure `$TMPDIR` is set to a short path for OpenMPI v2.x
        ([#2311](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2311))
    - guard '`module load`' commands in generated modules under
        `--recursive-unload` to avoid load storms
        ([#2316](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2316))
    - correctly deal with use of special characters in description &
        co
        ([#2320](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2320))
    - fix incorrect `FFT_INC_DIR` for Intel MKL
        ([#2323](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2323))

**simpleblocks**

- add generic '`SystemMPI`' simpleblock
    ([#1106](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1106),
    [#1261](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1261),
    [#1262](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1262))
- add software-specific simpleblock for SAS
    ([#1263](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1263))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - run '`wcleanAll`' or '`wcleanPlatform -all`' before building
        OpenFOAM
        ([#780](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/780),
        [#1258](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1258))
    - enhance generic '`SystemCompiler`' simpleblock
        ([#1106](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1106))
    - clean up `--trace` output for Python & Python packages
        ([#1248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1248))
    - update Intel MPI simpleblock to support 2018.* versions
        ([#1253](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1253))
    - add support for Intel MPI and Intel MKL to ScaLAPACK simpleblock
        ([#1255](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1255))
    - enhance GCC simpleblock to also put symlinks in place for
        `cc`/`c++`/`f77`/`f95` commands
        ([#1256](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1256))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - allow that '`gcc -print-multiarch`' fails in icc simpleblock
        ([#1249](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1249))
    - fix prefix subdirectory for older versions of icc (in particular
        2011.3.174)
        ([#1250](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1250))
    - use `remove_file` rather than `os.remove` in generic `IntelBase`
        simpleblock to correctly deal with broken symlinks
        ([#1251](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1251))
    - fix sanity check for MXNet simpleblock + correctly detect unpacked
        source directory
        ([#1257](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1257))
    - avoid building CP2K twice due to incorrect attempt at running
        '`make clean`' first
        ([#1266](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1266))

**simpleconfigs**

- added simpleconfigs for new toolchain `giolf/2017b`
    ([#5140](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5140))

        OMA
        ([#5211](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5211)),
        , oxford_asl

    - remove PyCUDA simpleconfig for `intel/2017a`, doesn't work due to

    - add missing Perl extensions in simpleconfig for Worker 1.6.7
        ([#5157](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5157))
    - fix checksums for packages that download from

        intel-2017a

        ([#5206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/5206))

    - update `$R_LIBS` in plotly simpleconfig

## SimpleBuild v3.4.0 (September 10th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb340 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for backing up modules via `--backup-modules`
        ([#2134](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2134))
        - enabled automatically with `--module-only` and `--skip`
        - see also
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Backup_modules.html>
    - add support for `--search-paths` to extend list of locations
        considered by `--search`/`-S`
        ([#2255](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2255))
    - include `userInGroup` check in Lua modules when installation is
        group-restricted
        ([#2274](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2274))
    - add experimental support for '`eb --trace`'
        ([#2285](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2285))
        - see also
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Tracing_progress.html>
    - add support for '`eb --inject-checksums`'
        ([#2286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2286),
        [#2292](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2292),
        [#2293](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2293))
        - see also
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Writing_simpleconfig_files.html#adding-or-replacing-checksums-using-inject-checksums>
    - add support for `append_paths` in module generator
        ([#2294](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2294))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - strip provided GitHub token of spaces in
        `--install-github-token`
        ([#2270](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2270))
    - remove '`provides`' line from `setup.py`
        ([#2275](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2275))
    - pass down stdin in '`import`' check for extensions during
        sanity check
        ([#2276](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2276))
    - make sure location to 'eb' installed during stage 1 is
        included in `$PATH` during stage 2 of bootstrap procedure
        ([#2281](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2281))
    - make resolve_path robust against `None` path being provided
        ([#2282](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2282))
    - ensure clean error message on simpleconfig file parse failure
        ([#2290](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2290))
    - fix regex to avoid sucking up additional lines prior to module
        file path in `modulefile_path`
        ([#2291](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2291))
    - fix error message when `--use-ccache` is used but `ccache` is
        not available in `$PATH`
        ([#2295](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2295))

**simpleblocks**

## SimpleBuild v3.3.1 (July 12th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb331 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for '`allow_prepend_abs_path`' simpleconfig
        parameter
        ([#2254](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2254))
    - support for `--merge-pr`
        ([#2266](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2266))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - resolve symlinks to location of '`eb`' in `get_paths_for`
        ([#2248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2248))
    - fall back to checking location relative to '`eb`' location in
        `find_eb_script`
        ([#2249](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2249))
    - respect `--suffix-modules-path` value for user-specific module
        path extensions
        ([#2250](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2250))
    - update SimpleBuild bootstrap script to download `distribute`
        tarball from <http://simplebuilders.github.io/simplebuild/files>
        ([#2256](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2256))
    - fix default target GitHub account/organisation for `--new-pr` &
        co + fix tests that got broken by migration to
        github.com/simplebuilders
        ([#2258](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2258))
    - fix checking for new simpleconfigs in `copy_simpleconfigs`, pick up
        specified commit message as PR title if none was provided
        ([#2259](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2259))
    - get rid of references to `hpcugent` after move to
        github.com/simplebuilders
        ([#2261](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2261))
    - automatically enable `--ignore-osdeps` under `--new-pr` and
        `--update-pr`
        ([#2262](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2262))

**simpleblocks**

- minor enhancements, including:
    - enhance HDF5 simpleblock: define `$HDF5_DIR` & include
        `-DMPICH_IGNORE_CXX_SEEK` in `$CXXFLAGS`
        ([#1200](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1200))
    - consistently pass down (named) arguments in `prepare_step`, and
        check for it in the tests
        ([#1202](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1202))
    - remove no longer supported `VersionIndependentPythonPackage`
        generic simpleblock
        ([#1202](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1202))
    - update ABAQUS simpleblock for recent versions, incl. support for
        installing hotfixes
        ([#1203](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1203))
    - get rid of references to '`hpcugent`' organisation after move
        to github.com/simplebuilders
        ([#1206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1206))
    - make Boost simpleblock fully aware of `(pre)configopts`,
        `(pre)buildopts` and `(pre)installopts`
        ([#1207](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1207))
    - drop check for '`ipython`' in sanity check of Anaconda
        simpleblock, to also support Miniconda
        ([#1210](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1210))

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for 6 new software packages:
    - FastME
        ([#4811](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/4811)),
        geopy
        ([#4821](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/4821)),
        Miniconda2
        ([#4841](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/4841)),

    - remove `buildopts` from HDF5 simpleconfigs, taken care of by

## SimpleBuild v3.3.0 (June 26th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb330 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - clean up simpleconfigs that are copied for inclusion in pull
        request
        ([#2197](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2197),
        [#2227](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2227))
    - use devel logging where relevant in `simplebuild.tools.toolchain`
        ([#2198](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2198))
    - check exit code for executed `module` commands
        ([#2200](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2200))
    - also copy patches to installation directory & simpleconfigs
        archive along with simpleconfig file
        ([#2202](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2202),
        [#2241](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2241))
    - add support for SHA256 checksums
        ([#2215](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2215))
        - also auto-detect whether provided checksum is MD5 or SHA256
            based on length (if not checksum type is specified)
        - add support for `--enforce-checksums`, to require
            availability of checksums for sources/patches
        - see
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Writing_simpleconfig_files.html#source-files-patches-and-checksums>
    - add support for renaming sources on download
        ([#2223](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2223))
        - also involves deprecating use of 2-tuple elements in list of
            sources, see
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Deprecated-functionality.html#depr-sources-2-element-tuple>
    - add support for `--detect-loaded-modules`

    - consider `$EB_*_LICENSE_SERVER(_PORT)` in MATLAB and ANSYS

## SimpleBuild v3.2.0 (May 5th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb320 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for marking installed module file as new default
        version using `--set-default-module`
        ([#2110](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2110))
    - additional simpleconfig parameters for documentation: `docpaths`,
        `examples`, `site_contacts`, `upstream_contacts`, `usage`
        ([#2113](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2113))
    - add support for `--allow-use-as-root-and-accept-consequences`
        ([#2123](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2123))
    - enable extraction of patches from compressed files before
        applying them
        ([#2128](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2128))
    - alphabetically sort functions and methods in `module_generator`
        module
        ([#2132](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2132))
    - introduce function `ensure_iterable_license_specs`
        ([#2157](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2157))
    - bump Travis config to use Lmod 7.4
        ([#2176](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2176))
    - implement `copy_dir` function in `filetools`
        ([#2177](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2177))
    - clarify error message when no software-specific simpleblock was
        found
        ([#2178](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2178))
    - make `log.deprecated` more verbose by also printing deprecation
        warnings to stderr
        ([#2179](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2179))
    - add `copy` function to `filetools` for simple copying of lists of
        files/directories
        ([#2180](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2180))
    - add support for `--verify-simpleconfig-filenames`
        ([#2185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2185))
    - add support for `--package-tool-options`
        ([#2187](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2187))
    - take into account inline trailing comments in
        `fetch_parameters_from_simpleconfig`
        ([#2192](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2192))
    - add support for customising simpleconfig parameters on a
        per-extension basis
        ([#2194](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2194))
    - perform sanity check after stage 2 of SimpleBuild bootstrap
        script, module file should be in place
        ([#2199](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2199))
    - change order in which module commands are checked, consider Lmod
        first
        ([#2201](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2201))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix use of compiler-specific `--optarch` value in combination
        with `--job`
        ([#2183](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2183))
    - call `run_all_steps` in regtest mode rather than running steps
        individually
        ([#2203](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2203))

**simpleblocks**

- added simpleblocks for Doris
    ([#1154](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1154),
    [#1161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1161)),

    - update Bowtie2 simpleblock to set correct build options, copy more

## SimpleBuild v3.1.2 (March 20th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb312 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

## SimpleBuild v3.1.1 (March 7th 2017) {: #release_notes_eb311 }

bugfix/update release

**framework**

- minor enhancements, including:
    - print more useful error message when no compiler-specific
        `optarch` flag is defined
        ([#1950](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1950))
    - add `ec` parameter to `expand_toolchain_load()`
        ([#2103](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2103))
    - clarify unstable/closed PR warning message
        ([#2129](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2129))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - ensure that `$EBEXTSLIST*` is also included in generated module
        under `--module-only`
        ([#2112](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2112))
    - fix formatting issues in generated documentation for
        `--list-software` and `--avail-simpleconfig-licenses`
        ([#2121](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2121))
    - fix problem with backticks in description breaking '`fpm`'
        packaging command
        ([#2124](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2124))
    - replace `--enable-new-dtags` with `--disable-new-dtags` instead
        of removing it in RPATH wrapper script

        `det_short_module_name` if `modaltsoftname` is available
        ([#2138](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2138))

    - skip `test_check_style` if `pep8` is not available
        ([#2142](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2142))

## SimpleBuild v3.1.0 (February 3rd 2017) {: #release_notes_eb310 }

feature release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - ARM: GCC optimal/generic architecture compiler flags
        ([#1974](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1974))
    - add support for `--check-style` to check style in simpleconfig
        files
        ([#1618](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1618),
        [#2038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2038))
    - add `HOME` and `USER` from env to available cfg file constants
        ([#2063](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2063))
    - `--optarch` can now be specified on a toolchain basis
        ([#2071](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2071))
    - implement `get_cpu_features` function in systemtools
        ([#2074](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2074),
        [#2078](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2078))
    - support use of `linalg` without MPI, add `iimkl` toolchain
        definition
        ([#2082](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2082))
    - spoof HTTP request header with empty agent
        ([#2083](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2083))
    - exclude dependencies of dependencies that extend $MODULEPATH in
        make_module_dep
        ([#2091](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2091))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make `fetch_github_token` more robust against `RuntimeError`
        from `keyring`
        ([#2070](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2070))
    - POWER: Fix `--optarch=GENERIC` for GCC
        ([#2073](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2073))
    - fix docstring in toolchain class
        ([#2075](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2075))
    - skip test cases involving `.yeb` if `PyYAML` is not installed,
        silence test in options subsuite
        ([#2081](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2081))
    - fix traceback with '`eb --check-github`' if `GitPython` is not
        installed
        ([#2085](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2085))
    - fix regex for determining list of patched files in GitHub diff
        ([#2088](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2088))
    - modify robot so that it only appends dependencies of tweaked
        simpleconfigs
        ([#2090](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2090))
    - escape metacharacters in paths passed to `re.compile` in
        `dry_run_set_dirs`
        ([#2098](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2098))
    - fix broken error message in `get_toolchain_hierarchy` +
        dedicated test case
        ([#2099](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2099))

**simpleblocks**

- new simpleblock for FFTW
    ([#1083](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1083))
- various enhancements, including:
    - update sanity check for flex 2.6.3, no more `libfl_pic.a`
        library
        ([#1077](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1077))
    - cleanup build before proceeding with full Boost
        ([#1080](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1080))

## SimpleBuild v3.0.2 (December 22nd 2016) {: #release_notes_eb302 }

bugfix release

        in get_toolchain_hierarchy

        wrappers

        in systemtools module

## SimpleBuild v3.0.1 (November 30th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb301 }

bugfix release

**framework**

- important changes
    - always use Intel-specific MPI compiler wrappers (`mpiicc`,
        `mpiicpc`, `mpiifort`) for toolchains using both Intel compilers
        and Intel MPI
        ([#2005](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2005))
- various small enhancements, including:
    - use `setvar` in `modules.py` to define environment variables
        ([#2011](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2011))
    - include output of `sanity_check_commands` in the build log
        ([#2020](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2020))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix testing of bootstrap script in Travis config
        ([#2003](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2003))
    - use correct module syntax in bootstrap script if Lmod is not
        used (i.e. Tcl)
        ([#2007](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2007))
    - fix packaging issue with non-Python scripts in simplebuild/scripts
        ([#2015](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2015))
        - fixes issue where RPATH wrapper template script
            (`rpath_wrapper_template.sh.in`) was not included in the
            v3.0.0 release
    - make tests more robust against running headless
        ([#2016](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2016))
    - avoid rewrapping already wrapped compiler/linker command with
        RPATH wrapper script
        ([#2022](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2022))
    - fix `log.error` traceback due to '`raise SimpleBuildError`'
        involving a '`%s`' in error message
        ([#2024](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2024))
    - make sure '`modules_tool`' attribute is also defined for
        extensions
        ([#2026](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2026))
    - only dump simpleconfig with modified deps due to
        `--minimal-toolchains` to 'reprod' subdir of install dir
        ([#2028](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2028))
    - avoid appending '`-h'` to sanity check commands specified as a
        string
        ([#2030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2030))
    - fix bug in `list_software_rst`: always include version suffix
        regardless of value
        ([#2032](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/2032))

**simpleblocks**

- various enhancements, including:
    - update SAMtools simpleblock for recent versions
        ([#1048](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1048))
- various bugfixes, including:
    - fix QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock to handle gipaw correctly
        ([#1041](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1041))
    - always specify name of serial Fortran compiler to ALADIN, it
        already knows to use MPI wrapper commands
        ([#1050](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1050))

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for 7 new software packages:
    - Cookiecutter
        ([#3827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3827)),
        ETE
        ([#3857](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3857)),
        findhap
        ([#3860](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3860)),
        graphviz (Python bindings,
        [#3826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3826)),
        LoFreq
        ([#3856](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3856)),
        PhyloBayes-MPI
        ([#3859](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3859)),
        XGBoost
        ([#3849](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3849))
- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software packages
- various enhancements, including:
    - add `ipywidgets` and `widgetsnbextension` extensions to IPython
        5.1.0 simpleconfigs
        ([#3818](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3818),
        [#3823](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3823))
    - run dadi test suite as a sanity check command
        ([#3858](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3858))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix incorrect descriptions for ifort
        ([#3817](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3817))
    - fix `modulename` for Jinja2 and Pygments
        ([#3823](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3823))
    - fix download URL in BLAST 2.2.26 simpleconfig

## SimpleBuild v3.0.0 (November 16th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb300 }

feature release

**framework**

- backward-incompatible changes:
    - make robot always consider subtoolchains, even without
        `--minimal-toolchains` (but in reverse order)
        ([#1973](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1973))
    - clean up behaviour that was deprecated for SimpleBuild v3.0
        ([#1978](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1978))
    - change *default* config to use `Lmod`/`Lua` for modules
        tool/syntax, `GC3Pie` as job backend
        ([#1985](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1985))
    - the minimal required version of Lmod was bumped to 5.8
        ([#1985](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1985))
- major new features:
    - (experimental) support for RPATH linking via `--rpath`
        ([#1942](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1942))
        - see
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/RPATH-support.html>
    - add support for `--consider-archived-simpleconfigs`
        ([#1972](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1972))
        - see
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Archived-simpleconfigs.html>
    - stabilize `--new-pr` and `--update-pr`
        ([#1979](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1979))
        - see
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Integration_with_GitHub.html>
- various other small enhancements, including:
    - add support for '`devel`' log level
        ([#1815](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1815))
    - make `remove_file` aware of `--extended-dry-run` + add dedicated
        unit test
        ([#1932](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1932))
    - add support for filtering out setting/updating particular
        environment variables from generated modules
        ([#1943](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1943))
        - see `--filter-env-vars`
    - clean up output of SimpleBuild bootstrap script & add version
        ([#1944](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1944))
    - improved ARM platform/CPU detection
        ([#1953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1953))
    - use '`0`' as letter dir for funky software names that don't
        start with a letter, e.g., `3to2`
        ([#1954](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1954))
    - make bootstrap script aware of `vsc-install` for offline
        installation
        ([#1955](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1955))
    - add support for `blas_family()` and `lapack_family()` methods in
        `Toolchain` instances
        ([#1961](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1961))
    - make `copy_file` dry-run aware
        ([#1963](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1963))
    - reorganise test simpleconfigs to match structure in simpleconfigs
        repo
        ([#1970](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1970))
    - add a toolchain compiler option for enforcing IEEE-754
        conformance
        ([#1975](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1975))
    - support for `intelcuda` compiler toolchain
        ([#1976](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1976))
    - check that each glob pattern matches at least one file
        `expand_glob_paths` (important for `--include-*`)
        ([#1980](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1980))
    - enhance bootstrap to auto-skip stage 0 in case a suitable
        setuptools is already available
        ([#1946](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1946),
        [#1984](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1984))
    - simplify `GC3Pie` version check
        ([#1987](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1987))
    - include suggestion on how to change configuration w.r.t. modules
        tool/syntax
        ([#1989](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1989))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix test for `find_simplebuild_simpleconfig`
        ([#1931](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1931))
    - remove existing module file under `--force`/`--rebuild`
        ([#1933](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1933))
    - fix combining `--search` and `--try-*`
        ([#1937](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1937))
    - fix appending to existing `buildstats` in
        `FileRepository.add_simpleconfig`
        ([#1948](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1948))
    - fix handling of iterate simpleconfig parameters, restore them
        during cleanup
        ([#1949](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1949))
    - fix filtering loads for (hidden) build deps from generated
        module
        ([#1959](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1959))
    - handle multi-flag compiler options on all types of options
        ([#1966](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1966))
    - fix `--list-software` by making `letter_dir_for` function aware
        of '`*`' wildcard name
        ([#1969](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1969))
    - skip dependencies of toolchain marked as external modules when
        determining module hierarchy
        ([#1977](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1977))
    - bump page limit in `fetch_latest_commit_sha`, spit out more
        meaningful error if too many branches were encountered
        ([#1981](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1981))
    - fix CUDA-related issues in `HierarchicalMNS`
        ([#1986](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1986))

**simpleblocks**

- backwards incompatible changes:
    - remove deprecated GenomeAnalysisTK/GATK simpleblock
        ([#1001](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1001))
    - remove deprecated '`get_netcdf_module_set_cmds`' function from
        netCDF simpleblock
        ([#1015](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1015))
    - remove deprecated '`get_blas_lib`' function from LAPACK
        simpleblock
        ([#1016](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1016))
    - remove `QLogicMPI` simpleblock
        ([#1023](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1023))
- new simpleblock for installing Anaconda
    ([#950](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/950))
- add generic simpleblock for Conda installations
    ([#950](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/950))
- various enhancements, including:
    - enable use of `GCCcore` as toolchain for Clang, fail if no GCC
        prefix is found
        ([#1002](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1002))
    - also build Boost MPI library in parallel
        ([#1005](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1005),
        [#1038](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1038))
    - enhance g2clib simpleblock to allow to install 1.6.0 or higher
        ([#1006](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1006))
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock to support packaging changes in
        6.0
        ([#1007](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1007))
    - add support to `Scons` generic simpleblock to provide argument to
        specify installation prefix
        ([#1008](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1008))
    - update `IntelBase` and imkl simpleblocks to handle the 2017
        versions of compilers/imkl
        ([#1012](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1012))
    - leverage `toolchain.linalg` functionality in ScaLAPACK
        simpleblock, use `copy_file`
        ([#1014](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1014))
    - allow netCDF-C++4 to be used with ESMF
        ([#1019](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1019))
    - update Advisor simpleblock to support latest versions
        ([#1021](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1021))
    - update CBLAS simpleblock to build with `foss` toolchain
        ([#1024](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1024))
    - update Gurobi simpleblock to use `copy_file`
        ([#1028](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1028))
    - add support for giving `/lib` preference over `/lib64` & co in
        GCC installation
        ([#1030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1030),
        [#1035](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1035))
    - enable installation of `libiberty` by default for binutils
        ([#1030](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1030))
    - avoid CMake fiddling with the RPATHs injected by SimpleBuild via
        `--rpath` in CMakeMake and METIS simpleblocks
        ([#1031](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1031),
        [#1034](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1034))
    - simplify scipy sanity check to make it more robust w.r.t.
        version updates
        ([#1037](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1037))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make sure '`None`' doesn't appear in modules generated with
        `--module-only`
        ([#998](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/998))
    - fix ATLAS simpleblock for non-x86 systems
        ([#1003](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1003))
    - fix '`usempi`' and '`with_mpi`' usage to allow for a serial
        build of Amber 16
        ([#1013](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1013))
    - add both `lib/python2.7/site-packages/{,wx-3.0-gtk2}` to
        `$PYTHONPATH` for wxPython
        ([#1018](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1018))
    - only hard inject RPATH for `/usr/lib*` directories when building
        binutils with `dummy` toolchain
        ([#1026](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1026))
    - make HDF5 simpleblock handle `--filter-deps` correctly
        ([#1027](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1027))
    - update Travis config w.r.t. changes framework config defaults
        and required Lmod version
        ([#1029](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1029))
    - be more patient when running Mathematica Q&A installer
        ([#1036](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/1036))

## SimpleBuild v2.9.0 (September 23rd 2016) {: #release_notes_eb290 }

feature release

**framework**

- note: vsc-base 2.5.4 or more recent is now required
- various small enhancements, including:
    - change option `--color` choices to auto/always/never
        ([#1701](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1701),
        [#1898](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1898),
        [#1911](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1911))
    - add support for '`hidden`' simpleconfig parameter
        ([#1837](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1837))
    - add support for using `ccache` and `f90cache` compiler caching
        tools
        ([#1844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1844),
        [#1912](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1912))
        - see `--use-ccache` and `--use-f90cache`
    - update Cray metadata for 16.06 CrayPE release
        ([#1851](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1851))
    - also include patch files in `--new-pr` and `--update-pr`
        ([#1852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1852))
    - handle deleted files in `--new-pr`
        ([#1853](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1853))
    - add support for `--install-latest-eb-release`
        ([#1861](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1861))
    - add support for hiding toolchains, see `--hide-toolchains` and
        '`hidden`' key in '`toolchain`' spec
        ([#1871](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1871))
    - add template for GitHub source URL
        ([#1872](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1872))
    - add support for combining `--new-pr`/`--update-pr` and `--robot`
        ([#1881](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1881))
    - add support for `--list-software` and
        `--list-installed-software`
        ([#1883](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1883),
        [#1910](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1910),
        [#1917](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1917))
    - print message on which extension is being installed, incl.
        progress counter
        ([#1886](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1886),
        [#1914](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1914))
    - add support for `--github-org` to specify GitHub organisation
        rather than GitHub user
        ([#1894](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1894))
    - add support for running Lmod in debug mode
        ([#1895](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1895))
    - avoid needless use of deepcopy, speed up support for templating
        in simpleconfigs
        ([#1897](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1897))
    - convert `all_dependencies` to a property in `SimpleConfig` class
        ([#1909](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1909))
    - add support for `--mpi-cmd-template`
        ([#1918](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1918))
    - add support for `--disable-mpi-tests`
        ([#1920](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1920))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - merge with develop when using `--from-pr`
        ([#1838](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1838),
        [#1867](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1867))
    - ensure `--new-pr` doesn't open empty pull requests
        ([#1846](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1846))
    - better error handling for outdated `GitPython` module in
        `--check-github`
        ([#1847](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1847))
    - fix formatting for generated simpleblocks documentation
        ([#1860](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1860))
    - make sure the robot ignores filtered dependencies when creating
        toolchain cache
        ([#1862](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1862))
    - honor `--filter-deps` under `--minimal-toolchains`
        ([#1863](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1863))
    - correct format for '`param`' and '`author`' tags in
        docstrings
        ([#1866](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1866))
    - ignore failing bootstrap test in Travis config file
        ([#1870](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1870))
    - make sure all output of executed command is included in
        generated temporary log file
        ([#1873](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1873),
        [#1874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1874))
    - ensure `--show_hidden` is used in the correct location for
        '`avail`' with Lmod
        ([#1875](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1875))
    - make sure `self.path` is passed down in copy method of
        `SimpleConfig` object
        ([#1884](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1884))
    - take into account possible multi-line modloadmsg in
        `ModuleGeneratorLua`
        ([#1885](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1885))
    - fix extracting `.bz2` source files
        ([#1889](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1889))
    - don't resolve path to Lmod command
        ([#1892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1892))
    - fix skipping of stage 0 in bootstrap script
        ([#1893](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1893))
    - fix function signature of `log.deprecated` compared to
        `fancylogger.deprecated`
        ([#1896](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1896),
        [#1899](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1899))
    - apply patch to Tcl/C environment modules tool for Tcl 8.6
        support in Travis config
        ([#1901](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1901))
    - fix combining `--extended-dry-run` with `--from-pr`
        ([#1902](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1902))
    - also template dict keys
        ([#1904](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1904))
    - don't pass '`--try-*`' command-line options to EB instance
        running within job script
        ([#1908](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1908))
    - add workaround for incorrectly passing command line arguments
        with `--job`
        ([#1915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1915))
    - fix issues with `--module-only`
        ([#1919](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1919),
        [#1924](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1924),
        [#1925](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1925))
        - correctly deal with specified start_dir
        - do not remove installation directory when
            build-in-installdir is enabled
    - make sure '`which`' function returns path to a file
        ([#1921](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1921))
    - fix `:param:`, `:return:` tags in docstrings & add test for it
        ([#1923](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1923))

**simpleblocks**

- new simpleblocks for 6 software packages that require customized
    support:

        HEALPix

        ([#321](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/321))
- various enhancements, including:
    - extend OpenFoam-Extend sanity check for decomp libraries

    - enhance Java simpleblock to support installing Java 6.x
        ([#940](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/940))
    - make QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock aware of multithreaded FFT
        ([#954](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/954))
    - extend PSI simpleblock to use PCMSolver and CheMPS2
        ([#967](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/967))
    - make Boost simpleblock add definition for `$BOOST_ROOT` to
        generated module file
        ([#976](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/976))
    - add support to Bundle simpleblock to install list of components
        ([#980](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/980))
    - enhance & clean up libxml2 simpleblock to also enable installing
        without Python bindings
        ([#984](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/984))
    - update Libint simpleblock for Libint 2.1.x
        ([#985](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/985))
    - update sanity check for OpenFOAM to support OpenFOAM 4.x
        ([#986](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/986))
    - make simpleblocks that run MPI tests aware of '`mpi_tests`'
        build option
        ([#993](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/993))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix compatibility of OpenFOAM simpleblock with `--module-only`
        ([#784](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/784))
    - fix testing of `--module-only` compatibility for OpenFOAM and
        IMOD simpleblocks
        ([#784](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/784))
    - add '`include/libxml2`' to `$CPATH` in libxml2 simpleblock
        ([#981](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/981))
    - fix compatibility of IntelBase generic simpleblock with
        `--module-only`
        ([#994](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/994))
    - make sure correct config script is used for Tcl/Tk deps of R
        ([#995](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/995))

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for 88 new software packages:
    - ADMIXTURE
        ([#3359](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3359)),

        ([#3593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3593)),

        [#3509](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3509))

        ([#3528](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3528))

        ([#3584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/3584))

## SimpleBuild v2.8.2 (July 13th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb282 }

bugfix release

**framework**

- various small enhancements, including:
    - add support for rst output for `--list-*` and `--avail-*`
        ([#1339](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1339))
    - add support for '`eb --check-conflicts`'
        ([#1747](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1747),
        [#1807](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1807),
        [#1833](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1833))
    - ensure nice error message when non-existing path is passed to
        `apply_regex_substitutions`
        ([#1788](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1788))
    - add check for module output, empty stdout is a sign of trouble
        with Lmod
        ([#1793](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1793))
    - add multi-threaded FFT to toolchain
        ([#1802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1802))
    - avoid special characters like '[', ']' in path to
        temporary directory
        ([#1808](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1808))
    - add support for `--zip-logs`
        ([#1820](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1820))
    - add support for `--extra-modules`
        ([#1821](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1821))
    - add type conversion for 'checksums' and 'patches' parameter
        in .yeb simpleconfigs
        ([#1826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1826),
        [#1840](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1840))
    - add support for filtering tests by name
        ([#1828](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1828))
    - add support for `--avail-toolchain-opts`
        ([#1830](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1830),
        [#1839](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1839))
    - use absolute path for robot and simpleconfig files
        ([#1834](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1834))
    - add backup URL for tarballs hosted on SourceForge in
        `install_eb_dep.sh` script
        ([#1843](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1843))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix installation of Lua in `install_eb_dep.sh` script
        ([#1789](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1789))
    - fix OpenMP flag for Cray compiler wrappers
        ([#1794](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1794))
    - only reset `$MODULEPATH` before loading a module if environment
        was reset
        ([#1795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1795))
    - include vsc-install as dependency in `setup.py`
        ([#1805](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1805))
    - cache `$PATH` & `$PYTHONPATH` in test setUp, restore them in
        tests where '`eb`' is used
        ([#1806](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1806))
    - don't reset `$MODULEPATH` in stage 2 of bootstrap script,
        support forced installation during stage 2
        ([#1810](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1810))
    - fix issue with templates defined by deps being required while
        still parsing deps
        ([#1812](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1812))
    - skip unneeded unuse/use commands on tail of `$MODULEPATH` in
        `check_module_path`
        ([#1813](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1813))
    - fix auto-convert for all `*dependencies` params in `.yeb`
        simpleconfigs, ensure version is a string
        ([#1818](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1818))
    - fix `keyring` version in Travis config
        ([#1819](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1819))
    - fix dumping of `.yeb` simpleconfig files in simpleconfigs archive
        ([#1822](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1822))
    - fix format of supported simpleconfig templates in help output
        ([#1825](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1825))
    - stick to `pydot` 1.1.0 for Python 2.6 in Travis config
        ([#1827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1827))

**simpleblocks**

- new simpleblocks for 5 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - Amber
        ([#958](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/958)),
        Extrae
        ([#955](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/955)),
        Gurobi
        ([#962](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/962)),
        Paraver
        ([#956](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/956)),
        Tau
        ([#887](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/887))
- various enhancements, including:
    - add support for building & installing old GROMACS versions
        ([#569](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/569),
        [#960](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/960))
    - add support for building Boost with Cray toolchain
        ([#849](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/849))
    - libxsmm support for CP2K
        ([#942](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/942))
    - pick up specified components for imkl
        ([#943](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/943))
    - add support for building GROMACS with double precision
        ([#946](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/946),
        [#960](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/960))
    - add support for building GROMACS with CUDA support and using
        dynamic libraries using `Cray` toolchains
        ([#951](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/951),
        [#960](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/960))
    - also install vsc-install in `SimpleBuildMeta` simpleblock, if
        tarball is provided
        ([#957](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/957))
    - enhance PSI simpleblock to support PSI4 1.0
        ([#965](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/965))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - also install scripts with MRtrix 0.3.14
        ([#941](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/941))
    - enhance Qt simpleblock to support Qt3
        ([#944](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/944))
    - create '`release`' symlink in MRtrix install dir
        ([#947](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/947))
    - fix `make_installdir` in Inspector & VTune simpleblocks
        ([#952](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/952))
    - make `Binary` and `MakeCp` simpleblocks aware of
        '`keepsymlinks`'
        ([#959](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/959))
    - correctly define `$G4*` environment variables in Geant4
        simpleblock
        ([#961](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/961),
        [#970](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/970))
    - prepend tmp install path to `$PYTHONPATH` in numpy test step,
        move to build dir when removing '`numpy`' subdir
        ([#963](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/963))
    - correct full path to ALADIN config file & patch it to use right
        Fortran compiler flags
        ([#964](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/964))
    - ensure correct compiler command/flags are used for SAMtools
        ([#966](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/966))

## SimpleBuild v2.8.1 (May 30th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb281 }

bugfix release

        ([#1772](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1772))

        ([#1774](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1774))
