## SimpleBuild v2.8.0 (May 18th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb280 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- significant speedup improvements of SimpleBuild itself, thanks to:
    - stop creating `ModulesTool` instances over and over again
        ([#1735](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1735))
    - cache result of '`module avail`' calls
        ([#1742](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1742))
- add support for using PGI as toolchain compiler
    ([#1342](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1342),
    [#1664](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1664),
    [#1759](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1759),
    [#1761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1761),
    [#1764](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1764))
    - incl. new toolchain definitions `pompi` and `pomkl`
        ([#1724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1724))
- add test configuration for Travis
    ([#1733](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1733),
    [#1737](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1737),
    [#1743](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1743),
    [#1767](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1767))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add `get_total_memory()` function in `systemtools` module
        ([#1623](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1623))
    - ignore `__init__.py` files in `--include-*`
        ([#1704](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1704))
    - use `-fopenmp` rather than `-openmp` for Intel compilers, since
        `-openmp` is deprecated
        ([#1718](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1718))
    - add modules to metadata for Cray modules
        ([#1721](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1721))
    - make sure user write permissions are set after failed removal
        attempt of installation directory
        ([#1722](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1722))
    - escape special characters in software name in
        `find_related_simpleconfigs`
        ([#1726](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1726))
    - add support for `CrayPGI` compiler toolchain
        ([#1729](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1729))
    - ensure read permission to all installed files for everybody
        (unless other options specify otherwise)
        ([#1731](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1731))
    - also consider `$LMOD_CMD` in bootstrap script
        ([#1736](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1736))
    - translate PyPI download URL to alternate URL with a hash
        ([#1749](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1749))
    - make `get_software_libdir` compatible with `-x`
        ([#1750](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1750))
    - set `$LMOD_REDIRECT` to '`no`' when initialising Lmod
        ([#1755](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1755))
    - add test for broken modules tool setup affecting
        '`module use`'
        ([#1758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1758))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - isolate '`options`' tests from simpleblocks other than the ones
        included in the tests
        ([#1699](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1699))
    - don't run '`module purge`' in tests, since SimpleBuild may be
        made available through a module
        ([#1702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1702))
    - avoid rehandling `--include-*` options over and over again
        during `--show-config`
        ([#1705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1705))
    - remove useless `test_cwd`
        ([#1706](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1706))
    - fix bootstrap script: make sure setuptools installed in stage0
        is still available at end of stage1
        ([#1727](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1727))
    - forcibly create target branch in `--update-pr`
        ([#1728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1728))
    - remove check whether '`simplebuild`' is being imported from dir
        that contains `simplebuild/__init__.py`
        ([#1730](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1730))
    - (re)install vsc-base during stage1 using `--always-copy` in
        bootstrap script, if needed
        ([#1732](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1732))
    - use `os.path.realpath` in `test_wrong_modulepath` to avoid
        symlinked path breaking the test
        ([#1740](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1740))
    - unset `$PYTHONPATH` in before tested bootstrapped SimpleBuild
        module
        ([#1743](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1743))
    - take into account that paths in modulepath may be symlinks in
        `test_module_caches`
        ([#1745](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1745))
    - change to install dir rather than buildpath in sanity check of
        extension, latter may not exist
        ([#1746](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1746),
        [#1748](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1748))
    - only load modules using short module names
        ([#1754](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1754))
    - (re)load modules for build deps in extensions_step
        ([#1762](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1762))
    - fix `modpath_extensions_for method`: take into account modules
        in Lua syntax
        ([#1766](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1766))
    - fix broken link to VSC website in license headers
        ([#1768](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1768))

**simpleblocks**

- add test configuration for Travis
    ([#895](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/895),
    [#897](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/897),
    [#900](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/900),

    - enhance imkl simpleblock to install on top of PGI
        ([#866](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/866),
        [#916](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/916))
    - enable runtime logging of install cmd in `IntelBase`
        ([#874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/874))
    - enhance Qt simpleblock to support installing with `dummy`
        toolchain
        ([#881](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/881))
    - delete libnuma symbolic links in PGI installation directory
        ([#888](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/888))
    - enhance PDT simpleblock to support installing with `dummy`
        toolchain
        ([#894](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/894))
    - add support for building Clang with OpenMP support
        ([#898](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/898))
    - update Score-P simpleblock for additional compilers, MPI libraries
        & dependencies
        ([#889](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/889))
    - drop deprecated '`testrb`' from sanity check in Ruby simpleblock
        ([#901](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/901))
    - enhance WRF simpleblock to support versions >= 3.7
        ([#902](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/902))
    - update QuantumESPRESSO simpleblock for version 5.3.0

    - add support in PythonPackage simpleblock to use

    - update Qt simpleblock for Qt 5.6.0

    - make threading an explicit option rather than relying on MPI

    - update PGI simpleblock to install siterc file so PGI picks up

    - enhance sanity check paths for compiler commands in PGI

    - also filter out `-ldl` from $LIBBLAS & co for Intel MKL in

        ([#920](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/920))
    - define `$MIC_LD_LIBRARY_PATH` for impi
        ([#925](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/925))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - don't hardcode Python version in
        `test_make_module_pythonpackage`
        ([#876](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/876))
    - make PythonPackage simpleblock compatible with `--module-only`
        ([#884](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/884),
        [#906](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/906))
    - remove check whether '`simplebuild`' is being imported from dir

    - fix passing compiler configure option in PDT simpleblock

    - fix bug in Score-P simpleblock w.r.t. `--with-libbfd`

    - fix extension filter for Ruby

    - fix `ACTIVATION_TYPES` list in IntelBase + minor style change

    - correctly define `$MIC_LD_LIBRARY_PATH` in imkl 11.3.x and newer

## SimpleBuild v2.7.0 (March 20th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb270 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- stabilize Cray support
    - enable '`dynamic`' toolchain option by default for `Cray*`
        toolchains
        ([#1581](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1581))
    - remove FFTW from the Cray toolchains definition
        ([#1585](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1585))
    - add external modules metadata for Cray systems
        ([#1638](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1638))
    - fix independency of Cray toolchains w.r.t. toolchain build
        environment
        ([#1641](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1641),
        [#1647](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1647))
    - remove requirement to use `--experimental` for Cray toolchains
        ([#1663](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1663))
- enable Python optimization mode in '`eb`'
    ([#1357](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1357))
- improved GitHub integration
    - improve error handling on git commands + better logging for
        `--new-pr`/`--update-pr`
        ([#1590](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1590))
    - use `git` rather than `https` in `--new-pr`/`--update-pr`
        ([#1602](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1602))
    - add `-u` as shorthand for `--upload-test-report`
        ([#1605](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1605))
    - fix `--from-pr` for PRs that include renamed/deleted files
        ([#1615](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1615))
    - add support for `--install-github-token` and `--check-github`
        ([#1616](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1616))
    - fix `fetch_simpleconfigs_from_pr` w.r.t. duplicate files in PRs
        ([#1628](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1628))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add support for `--search-filename` and `--terse`
        ([#1577](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1577))
    - support complete bash completion
        ([#1580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1580))
    - add support for `%(*ver)s` and `%(*shortver)s` templates
        ([#1595](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1595),
        [#1604](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1604))
        - incl. `%(javaver)s`, `%(javashortver)s`, `%(perlver)s`,
            `%(perlshortver)s`, `%(pyver)s`, `%(pyshortver)s`,
            `%(rver)s`, `%(rshortver)s`
    - define `HOME` constant that can be used in simpleconfig files
        ([#1607](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1607))
    - implement support for generating '`swap`' statements in module
        files
        ([#1609](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1609))
    - add support for `--show-config`
        ([#1611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1611),
        [#1620](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1620))
    - simplified support for `--minimal-toolchains`
        ([#1614](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1614),
        [#1619](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1619),
        [#1622](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1622),
        [#1625](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1625),
        [#1646](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1646))
    - add support for `--dump-env-script`
        ([#1624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1624))
    - enhance ModulesTool.exist to also recognize partial module names
        ([#1630](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1630))
    - improve error message for toolchain definition errors
        ([#1631](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1631))
    - make default is_short_modname_for check less strict to support
        versionless external modules as deps
        ([#1632](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1632))
    - mention hostname in comment made by `--upload-test-report`
        ([#1635](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1635))
    - support providing additional relative path for prefix in
        external module metadata
        ([#1637](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1637))
    - add `ThematicModuleNamingScheme`
        ([#1645](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1645))
    - enhance logging format: remove logger name, mention location
        instead
        ([#1649](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1649),
        [#1654](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1654))
    - update kernel versions for SLES12
        ([#1659](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1659))
    - raise `SimpleBuildError` rather than `ImportError` in
        `only_if_module_is_available` decorator
        ([#1662](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1662))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix Lmod spider output in generated modules
        ([#1583](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1583))
    - correctly define '`simplebuild`' namespaces
        ([#1593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1593),
        [#1666](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1666),
        [#1680](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1680))
        - this change requires that the `setuptools` Python package is
            available (at runtime)
        - using custom simpleblocks by adding them in the Python search
            path (`$PYTHONPATH`) may require adjustments, i.e. also
            using `pkg_resources.declare_namespace` in the `__init__.py`
            files; *we highly recommend to use* `--include-simpleblocks`
            *instead*, see
            <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Including_additional_Python_modules.html>
        - note: this has the side-effect of not being able anymore to
            reliably use '`eb`' in the parent directory of the
            simplebuild-framework repository
            ([#1667](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1667))
    - fix template for `savannah.gnu.org` source URL
        ([#1601](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1601))
    - stop running '`module purge`', only restore environment
        ([#1608](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1608))
    - fix license headers: Hercules foundation is now FWO
        ([#1629](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1629))
    - avoid that `fancylogger` tries to import `mpi4py` to determine
        MPI rank
        ([#1648](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1648))
    - fix error in tests when '`file`' backend is not available in
        Python keyring
        ([#1650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1650))
    - update develop install script
        ([#1651](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1651))
    - handle allowed system deps during `prepare_step` rather than
        during parsing of simpleconfig
        ([#1652](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1652))
    - add function to find FlexLM licenses: `find_flexlm_license`
        ([#1633](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1633),
        [#1653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1653))
    - fix availability check for external modules with partial module
        name
        ([#1634](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1634),
        [#1643](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1643))
    - fix bootstrap script to ensure `setuptools` is also installed
        ([#1655](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1655))
    - fix issue in bootstrap script with `vsc-base` being picked up
        from the OS
        ([#1656](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1656))
    - fix bootstrap script for environment where '`python`' is
        Python 3.x
        ([#1660](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1660))
    - remove `--experimental` for tests related to `--package`
        ([#1665](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1665))
    - ensure path to setuptools is included in `$PYTHONPATH` being
        used to test scripts
        ([#1671](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1671))
    - sanitize environment before initializing simpleblocks
        ([#1676](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1676))
    - remove `reload` statements in `include.py`, since they are not
        required and break `--include-toolchains`
        ([#1679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1679))

**simpleblocks**

- new simpleblocks for 6 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - ADF
        ([#826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/826)),
        MPICH
        ([#844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/844),
        [#852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/852),
        [#868](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/868)),
        mutil
        ([#859](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/859)),
        pplacer
        ([#835](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/835)),
        psmpi
        ([#852](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/852)),
        SNPhylo
        ([#865](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/865))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - implement support for '`use_pip`' in PythonPackage simpleblock
        ([#719](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/719),
        [#831](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/831))
    - add support in CUDA simpleblock to install wrappers for host
        compilers
        ([#758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/758))
    - update sanity check for picard version 1.124 and above
        ([#796](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/796))
    - use '`module swap`' for all components in `CrayToolchain`
        ([#823](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/823))
    - update PSI4 simpleblock to cope with changed name of PSI4 data dir
        ([#824](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/824))
    - use `find_flexlm_license` function and avoid defining `$CPATH`
        in PGI simpleblock
        ([#837](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/837))
    - use `find_flexlm_license` function in `IntelBase` generic
        simpleblock
        ([#839](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/839))
    - add unit test to check module file generated by `PythonPackage`
        simpleblock
        ([#841](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/841))
    - rework MVAPICH2 simpleblock on top of new MPICH simpleblock
        ([#844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/844))
    - add CUDA support in CP2K simpleblock
        ([#850](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/850))
    - also define `$LD` in `buildopts` for GATE
        ([#855](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/855))
    - use `find_flexlm_license` function in TotalView simpleblock
        ([#839](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/839))
    - enhance `MakeCp` simpleblock to also support renaming of files
        while copying them
        ([#859](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/859))
    - hunt for usable '`python`' command in `PythonPackage`
        simpleblock when system Python is used
        ([#861](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/861))
    - add sanity check in `simplebuild/__init__.py` w.r.t. current
        working dir
        ([#869](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/869))
    - change suffix of original file to `.simplebuild` when using
        `fileinput` in impi simpleblock
        ([#870](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/870))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make sure Python unicode settings match that of the system
        Python
        ([#817](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/817))
    - remove FFTW related statements in HPL simpleblock, since HPL
        doesn't require FFTW at all
        ([#822](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/822))
    - use `pkg_resources.declare_namespace` rather than
        `pkgutil.extend_path` to declare '`simplebuild`' namespaces
        ([#827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/827))
    - fix license headers: Hercules foundation is now FWO
        ([#836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/836))
    - fix check for non-empty lib dirs in `PythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#840](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/840))
    - consider all Python lib dirs in sanity check for libxml2
        ([#842](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/842))
    - correctly handle deprecated configure options
        (`--with-hwloc`/`--enable-mpe`) in MVAPICH2 simpleblock
        ([#853](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/853))
    - use correct configure option for checkpoint/restart in MVAPICH2
        simpleblock
        ([#854](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/854))
    - ensure list of Python lib dirs always has a '`lib/...`' entry
        ([#858](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/858))
    - check whether `rpm`/`rpmrebuild` commands are available using
        '`which`', rather than checking for OS deps
        ([#864](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/864))
    - fix `test_step` in UFC simpleblock
        ([#872](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/872))

## SimpleBuild v2.6.0 (January 26th 2016) {: #release_notes_eb260 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- add (experimental) support for opening/updating (simpleconfigs) pull
    requests (`--new-pr`, `--update-pr`)
    ([#1528](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1528))
- sanitize environment before each installation by undefining
    `$PYTHON*`
    ([#1569](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1569),
    [#1572](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1572))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - allow user-local modules with hierarchical naming schemes
        (`--subdir-user-modules`)
        ([#1472](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1472))
    - enhance `--extended-dry-run` output to include paths for
        requirements in `make_module_req`
        ([#1520](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1520))

- various bug fixes, including:

        ([#1525](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1525))
    - fix 'develop' install script
        ([#1529](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1529))
    - correctly quote FPM option values in packagin support
        ([#1530](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1530))
    - correctly handle '`.`' in software name w.r.t. `$EB*`

    - exclude logs and test reports from packages
        ([#1544](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1544))
    - also pass down `--job-cores` for `pbs_python` job backend
        ([#1547](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1547))
    - skip dependencies marked as external modules when packaging
        ([#1550](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1550))
    - fix syntax for `set_alias` statement in Lua syntax
        ([#1554](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1554))
    - handle the case of all 'offline' nodes correctly for `--job`
        ([#1560](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1560))
    - fix `test_modules_tool_stateless` unit test for stateless

        ([#1570](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1570))

## SimpleBuild v2.5.0 (December 17th 2015) {: #release_notes_eb250 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- add support for IBM XL compilers on Power7 and PowerPC (BlueGene)
    ([#1470](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1470))
- add support for generic compilation using `--optarch=GENERIC`
    ([#1471](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1471))
    - see also
        [Controlling compiler optimization flags][controlling_compiler_optimization_flags]
- update experimental support for `.yeb` simpleconfigs
    ([#1515](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1515))
    - support clean way to specify toolchain + dependencies in `.yeb`
        simpleconfigs
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add support for '`whatis`' simpleconfig parameter
        ([#1271](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1271))
    - add support for SLES 12 and kernel 3.12.x
        ([#1412](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1412))
    - add GCCcore toolchain definition
        ([#1451](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1451))
    - use '`diff --git`' lines to determine patched files in pull
        request with `--from-pr`
        ([#1460](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1460))
    - add proper option parser to bootstrap script
        ([#1468](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1468))
    - add `get_gcc_version()` function in systemtools module
        ([#1496](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1496))
    - don't load fake module in sanity_check_step during a dry run
        ([#1499](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1499))
    - allow string values to be passed in `make_module_req` by
        hoisting them into a list
        ([#1502](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1502))
    - add support for listing build dependencies as hidden
        dependencies
        ([#1503](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1503))
    - also consider `lib32/pkgconfig` and `lib64/pkgconfig` for
        `$PKG_CONFIG_PATH`
        ([#1505](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1505))
    - add support to `make_module_dep` to specify module to unload
        before loading a dependency module
        ([#1506](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1506))
    - add support to `make_module_extra` to specify alternative
        root/version for `$EBROOT`/`$EBVERSION`
        ([#1508](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1508))
    - packaging support is no longer considered experimental
        ([#1510](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1510))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - also consider `lib64` in sanity check performed during SimpleBuild
        bootstrap
        ([#1464](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1464))
    - also add description/homepage to packages created with FPM
        ([#1469](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1469))
    - fix develop setup script to install SimpleBuild-develop module in
        subdirectory
        ([#1480](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1480))
    - don't create a whole set of temporary '`minimal-simpleconfigs`'
        subdirs with `--minimal-toolchains`
        ([#1484](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1484))
    - only keep polling if exit code is `None` in `run_cmd_qa`, to
        correctly deal with negative exit codes
        ([#1486](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1486))
    - fix bootstrap script for missing sys_platform by using newer
        distribute 0.6.49 in stage 0
        ([#1490](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1490))
    - make sure that extra custom simpleconfig parameters are known for
        extensions
        ([#1498](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1498))
    - add missing import for `SimpleBuildError` in
        `simplebuild/toolchains/linalg/libsci.py`
        ([#1512](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1512))
    - isolate tests from possible system-wide configuration files
        ([#1513](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1513))
    - only use `glob` in `make_module_req` on non-empty strings
        ([#1519](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1519))
        - this fixes the problem where `$CUDA_HOME` and `$CUDA_PATH`
            are not defined in module files for CUDA

**simpleblocks**

- update simpleblocks for Intel tools to support 2016 versions
    ([#691](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/691),
    [#745](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/745),
    [#756](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/756),
    [#777](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/777))
    - IntelBase simpleblock has been enhanced to support specifying
        which components to install
- new simpleblocks for 3 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - Intel Advisor
        ([#767](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/767)),
        DIRAC
        ([#778](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/778)),
        MRtrix
        ([#772](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/772))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - update numpy and SuiteSparse simpleblock to use scikit-umfpack
        ([#718](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/718))
    - add an option to allow removal of the `-Dusethreads` flag in
        Perl simpleblock
        ([#724](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/724))
    - update Doxygen simpleblock for 1.10.x (CMake)
        ([#734](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/734))
    - update sanity check in Qt simpleblock for Qt 5.x
        ([#740](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/740))
    - add support for multilib build of GCC on PowerPC
        ([#741](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/741))
    - add support to OpenFOAM and SCOTCH simpleblocks to support 64-bit
        integers, via 'i8' toolchain option
        ([#744](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/744))
    - fix sanity check to support numpy 1.10 (dropped _dotblas.so)
        ([#757](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/757),
        [#761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/761),
        [#762](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/762))
    - update IPP simpleblock for v9.x
        ([#759](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/759))
    - cleaner output for PythonPackage under dry run, make numpy
        simpleblock dry-run aware
        ([#760](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/760),
        [#671](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/671))
    - add support for using netCDF-Fortran as dependency in ALADIN
        simpleblock
        ([#764](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/764))
    - add support for tbb 4.4.x in tbb simpleblock
        ([#769](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/769))
    - add support for specifying altroot/altversion in Bundle
        simpleblock
        ([#773](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/773))
    - update OpenFOAM simpleblock for OpenFOAM-Extend 3.2 + use
        apply_regex_substitutions
        ([#770](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/770))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix module path extension of system compiler in HMNS setup
        ([#742](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/742))
    - only restore `$PYTHONPATH` if it was defined in SimpleBuildMeta
        simpleblock
        ([#743](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/743))
    - make sure `$PYTHONPATH` is defined correctly in module file for
        Python packages created with `--module-only`
        ([#748](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/748))
    - fix WRF simpleblock to produce correct module under
        `--module-only --force`
        ([#746](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/746),
        [#752](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/752))
    - don't hardcode '`openPBS`' in GATE simpleblock, use value for
        `default_platform` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#753](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/753))
    - avoid adding lib subdirs to `$*LIBRARY_PATH` if no libraries are
        there in `PythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#755](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/755))
    - fix installing Python bindings for libxml2 to correct
        installation prefix
        ([#765](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/765))

        ([#2136](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2136)),
        zlibbioc
        ([#2175](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2175))

- added new simpleconfigs for existing toolchains:
    - `intel/2015.08`
        ([#2194](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2194)),
        `intel/2016.00`
        ([#2209](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2209)),
        `intel/2016.01`
        ([#2219](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2219)),
        `iomkl/2015.03`
        ([#2155](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2155))

- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software
    packages: version updates, different toolchains, ...
    - including CMake 3.4.1, HDF5 1.8.16, netCDF 4.3.3.1,
        netCDF-Fortran 4.4.2, numpy 1.10.1, Octave 4.0.0, OpenFOAM
        3.0.0, OpenFOAM-Extend 3.2, Python 2.7.11

- various other enhancements, including:
    - add tidyr to R 3.2.1 simpleconfigs
        ([#2174](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2174))
    - enable C++ support in MIGRATE-N
        ([#2178](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2178))
    - also installed shared libraries for AMD and UMFPACK in
        SuiteSparse
        ([#2061](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2061))
    - fix software name for ParaView (was: Paraview)
        ([#2132](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2132))
    - enable building of shared libraries for binutils
        ([#2133](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2133))
    - harden binutils built with dummy toolchain by linking to system
        libraries via `RPATH`
        ([#2228](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2228))
    - enhance simpleconfig unit tests to check that each simpleconfig file
        is in the right subdirectory
        ([#2232](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2232))

- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix ALADIN patch file to not use relative paths, and adjust list
        of ALADIN sources accordingly
        (([#2207](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2207)),
        ([#2213](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2213)))
    - rename patch files for OpenFOAM to be in line with other patches
        ([#2226](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2226))
    - fix typo in bzip2 source URLs
        ([#2204](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2204))
    - force linking of ncurses in libreadline
        ([#2206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2206))
    - enable `-fPIC` in all zlib 1.2.8 simpleconfigs
        ([#2220](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2220))
    - move Net-LibIDN/SRA-Toolkit/bbftpPRO/o2scl simpleconfigs to right
        location
        ([#2232](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2232))
    - restrict parallel build in OpenFOAM-Extend simpleconfigs via
        '`maxparallel`', not '`parallel`'
        ([#2233](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/2233))

## SimpleBuild v2.4.0 (November 10th 2015) {: #release_notes_eb240 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- add support for `--extended-dry-run`/`-x`
    ([#1388](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1388),
    [#1450](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1450),
    [#1453](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1453),
    [#1455](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1455))
    - detailed documentation is available at
        [Extended dry run][extended_dry_run]
- fix checking of sanity check paths w.r.t. discriminating between
    files and directories
    ([#1436](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1436))
    - this impacts several simpleconfig files where `sanity_check_paths`
        was not 100% correct
- make '`eb`' script aware of Python v3.x, fall back to using
    `python2` if required
    ([#1411](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1411))
- add experimental support for parsing .yeb simpleconfig files in YAML
    syntax
    ([#1447](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1447),
    [#1448](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1448),
    [#1449](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1449))
    - see also [Writing simpleconfig files in YAML syntax][simpleconfig_yeb_format]
- add experimental support for resolving dependencies with minimal
    toolchains
    ([#1306](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1306))
    - see also [Using minimal toolchains for dependencies][minimal_toolchains]
- various other enhancements, including:
    - refactor `extract_cmd` function to get rid of if/elif/else
        spaghetti blob
        ([#1382](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1382))
    - add support for `--review-pr`
        ([#1383](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1383))
    - add `apply_regex_substitutions` function to perform runtime
        patching from simpleblocks
        ([#1388](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1388),
        [#1458](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1458))
    - add support for specifying alternate name to be part of
        generated module name
        ([#1389](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1389))
        - via '`modaltsoftname`' simpleconfig parameter
    - support overriding # used cores via `--parallel`
        ([#1393](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1393))
    - also define `$FC` and `$FCFLAGS` in build environment
        ([#1394](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1394))
    - add support extracting for `.tar.Z` files
        ([#1396](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1396))
    - include simplebuild/scripts in installation
        ([#1397](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1397))
    - ignore hidden directories in find_base_dir
        ([#1413](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1413),
        [#1415](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1415))
    - add `only_if_module_is_available` decorator function to guard
        functionality that uses optional dependencies
        ([#1416](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1416))
    - give simpleblocks the possibility to choose `maxhits` for
        `run_cmd_qa`
        ([#1417](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1417))
    - use class name (string) rather than License instances as values
        for software license constants
        ([#1418](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1418))
    - support controlling recursive unloading of dependencies via
        '`recursive_module_unload`' simpleconfig parameter
        ([#1425](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1425))
    - implement basic support for type checking of simpleconfig
        parameters
        ([#1427](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1427))
    - support auto-converting to expected value type for simpleconfig
        parameters (enabled by default)
        ([#1428](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1428),
        [#1437](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1437))
    - add support for `--rebuild` command line option, alternative for
        `--force` which doesn't imply `--ignore-osdeps`
        ([#1435](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1435))
    - add support for Mercurial simpleconfig repository
        ([#979](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/979),
        [#1446](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1446))
    - add dedicated class for psmpi toolchain MPI component, and use
        it in gpsmpi and ipsmpi toolchains
        ([#1454](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1454))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix extracting of comments from an simpleconfig file that includes
        'tail' comments
        ([#1381](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1381))
    - fix dev version to follow PEP-440, as required by recent
        setuptools versions
        ([#1403](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1403))
        - required to avoid that setuptools transforms the version
            itself
        - see also
            <https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0440/#developmental-releases>
    - allow `get_cpu_speed` to return `None` if CPU freq could not be
        determined
        ([#1421](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1421))
    - relax `sanity_check_paths` in SimpleBuild bootstrap script to deal
        with possible zipped .egg
        ([#1422](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1422))
    - use empty list as default value for src/patches in Extension
        class
        ([#1434](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1434))
    - skip symlinked files in `adjust_permissions` function
        ([#1439](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1439))
    - fix HierarchicalMNS to always use full version number
        ([#1440](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1440))

**simpleblocks**

- 3 new generic simpleblocks: OCamlPackage
    ([#467](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/467)),
    SCons
    ([#689](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/689),
    [#700](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/700)),
    Waf
    ([#722](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/722))
- new simpleblocks for 2 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - OCaml
        ([#467](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/467)),
        Samcef
        ([#678](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/678))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add support for installing OpenFOAM with external METIS, CGAL
        and Paraview
        ([#497](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/497))
    - update netCDF simpleblock updated for netCDF v4.3.3.1
        ([#674](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/674))
    - update Rosetta simpleblock for recent Rosetta versions
        ([#677](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/677))
    - make unpacked source dir detection in simpleblock for VSC-tools a
        little bit more flexible
        ([#679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/679))
    - add support for building with Plumed support enabled in CP2K
        simpleblock
        ([#681](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/681))
    - update Go simpleblock for Go v1.5
        ([#683](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/683))
    - use `apply_regex_substitutions` function in WRF simpleblock
        ([#685](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/685))
    - update MUMPS simpleblock for 5.x
        ([#686](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/686))
    - implement runtime patching of `$WM_*` and compiler variables for
        OpenFOAM
        ([#688](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/688))
    - specify sequential compiler to use in compiler command that gets
        injected in OpenFOAM simpleblock
        ([#692](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/692))
    - make `PythonPackage` and WRF simpleblocks dry-run aware
        ([#696](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/696))
        - see also
            [Guidelines for simpleblocks][extended_dry_run_guidelines_simpleblocks]
    - add support in `PythonPackage` for installing with
        `simple_install` + installing zipped eggs
        ([#698](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/698),
        [#711](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/711),
        [#715](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/715))
    - update Bowtie simpleblock for recent Bowtie versions
        ([#707](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/707))
    - update CUDA simpleblock for CUDA
        7.x([#708](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/708))
    - also consider `config/make.sys.in` for want in QuantumESRESSO
        simpleblock
        ([#714](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/714))
    - define `$NWCHEM_LONG_PATH` if needed in NWChem simpleblock
        ([#720](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/720))
    - remove custom post-install step in PDT simpleblock
        ([#723](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/723))
        - no longer needed now that `adjust_permissions` functions
            ignores symlinks
    - use `$LIBS` in HPL simpleblock
        ([#727](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/727),
        [#736](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/736))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - also define `$MCRROOT` for MCR in module
        ([#687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/687))
    - add missing '`super`' call in `configure_step` of simpleblock
        for python-meep
        ([#694](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/694))
    - only prepend existing non-empty paths to `$PYTHONPATH` in
        `PythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#697](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/697))
    - fix extra_options definition in `CMakePythonPackage` simpleblock
        ([#698](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/698))
    - fix dev version to follow PEP-440, as required by recent
        setuptools versions
        ([#702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/702),
        [#703](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/703),
        [#704](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/704))
        - required to avoid that setuptools transforms the version
            itself
        - see also
            <https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0440/#developmental-releases>
    - consider both `lib` and `lib64` in sanity check paths for flex
        ([#705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/705))
    - also copy signature file and don't copy CMake files in Eigen
        simpleblock
        ([#709](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/709))
    - fix directory names in `make_module_req_guess` of ANSYS
        simpleblock
        ([#713](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/713))
    - fix imports for `set_tmpdir` in simpleblock unit tests after
        function was moved in SimpleBuild framework
        ([#726](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/726))
    - use `--with-tcltk*` configure options for Python to point to
        ensure Tcl/Tk deps are picked up
        ([#729](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/729))
    - fix order of subdirs for QuantumESPRESSO binaries
        ([#730](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/730))
    - correctly handle having both `$FC`/`$FCFLAGS` and
        `$F90`/`$F90FLAGS` defined when building MVAPICH2
        ([#732](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/732))
    - fix OpenSSL sanity check paths: lib/engines is a directory
        ([#731](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/731),
        [#733](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/733))
    - fix sanity check paths for netcdf-python
        ([#735](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/735))

## SimpleBuild v2.3.0 (September 2nd 2015) {: #release_notes_eb230 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- requires vsc-base v2.2.4 or more recent
    ([#1343](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1343))
    - required for `mk_rst_table` function in `vsc.utils.docs`
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add support for generating documentation for (generic)
        simpleblocks in `.rst` format
        ([#1317](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1317))
    - preserve comments in simpleconfig file in `SimpleConfig.dump()`
        method
        ([#1327](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1327))
    - add `--cleanup-tmpdir` option
        ([#1365](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1365))
        - enables to preserve the used temporary directory via
            `--disable-cleanup-tmpdir`
    - enhance `SimpleConfig.dump()` to reformat dumped simpleconfig
        according to style guidelines
        ([#1345](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1345))
    - add support for extracting `.iso` files using 7z (p7zip)
        ([#1375](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1375))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - correctly deal with special characters in template strings in
        `SimpleConfig.dump()` method
        ([#1323](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1323))
    - rework `simplebuild.tools.module_generator` module to avoid
        keeping state w.r.t. fake modules
        ([#1348](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1348))
    - fix dumping of hidden deps
        ([#1354](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1354))
    - fix use of `--job` with hidden dependencies: include `--hidden`
        in submitted job script when needed
        ([#1356](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1356))
    - fix `ActiveMNS.det_full_module_name()` for external modules
        ([#1360](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1360))
    - fix `SimpleConfig.all_dependencies` definition, fix tracking of
        job dependencies
        ([#1359](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1359),
        [#1361](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1361))
    - fix `ModulesTool.exist()` for hidden Lua module files
        ([#1364](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1364))
    - only call `SimpleBlock.sanity_check_step` for non-extensions
        ([#1366](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1366))
        - this results in significant speedup when installing
            simpleconfigs with lots of extensions, but also results in
            checking the default sanity check paths if none were defined
            for extensions installed as a module
    - fix using module naming schemes that were included via
        `--include-module-naming-schemes`
        ([#1370](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1370))

**simpleblocks**

- new simpleblocks for 2 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - MCR
        ([#623](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/623)),
        Molpro
        ([#665](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/665))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - enhance BWA simpleblock to also install man pages
        ([#650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/650))
    - enhance tbb simpleblock to consider lib dirs in order and also
        define `$CPATH`, `$LIBRARY_PATH`, `$TBBROOT`
        ([#653](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/653),
        [#654](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/654))
    - call `PythonPackage.configure_step` in
        `ConfigureMakePythonPackage.configure_step`
        ([#668](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/668))
    - add '`foldx3b6`' as possible binary name in FoldX simpleblock
        ([#671](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/671))
    - enhance/cleanup MATLAB simpleblock
        ([#672](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/672))
    - move preparing of '`intel`' subdir in `$HOME` to
        `configure_step` in `IntelBase` simpleblock
        ([#673](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/673))
- various bug fixes, including:

    - fix regex used to correct `I_MPI_ROOT` in impi `mpivars.sh`

    - fix regex used to patch `.mk` file in configure step of

## SimpleBuild v2.2.0 (July 15th 2015) {: #release_notes_eb220 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- add support for using GC3Pie as a backend for `--job`
    ([#1008](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1008))
    - see also [Submitting jobs using `--job`][submitting_jobs]
- add support for `--include-*` configuration options to include
    additional simpleblocks, toolchains, etc.
    ([#1301](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1301))
    - see [Including additional Python modules][including_additional_python_modules]
- add (experimental) support for packaging installed software using
    FPM
    ([#1224](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1224))
    - see [Packaging support][packaging_support]
- various other enhancements, including:
    - use https for PyPI URL templates
        ([#1286](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1286))
    - add GNU toolchain definition
        ([#1287](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1287))
    - make bootstrap script more robust
        ([#1289](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1289),
        [#1325](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1325)):
        - exclude 'simpleblocks' pkg from `sys.path` to avoid that
            `setup.py` for simplebuild-simpleblocks picks up wrong version
        - undefine `$SIMPLEBUILD_BOOTSTRAP*` environment variables,
            since they do not correspond with known config options
    - improve error reporting/robustness in
        `fix_broken_simpleconfigs.py` script
        ([#1290](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1290))
    - reset keep toolchain component class 'constants' every time
        ([#1294](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1294))
    - make `--strict` also a build option
        ([#1295](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1295))
    - fix purging of loaded modules in unit tests' setup method
        ([#1297](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1297))
    - promote `MigrateFromEBToHMNS` to a 'production' MNS
        ([#1302](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1302))
    - add support for `--read-only-installdir` and
        `--group-writable-installdir` configuration options
        ([#1304](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1304))
    - add support for *not* expanding relative paths in
        `prepend_paths`
        ([#1310](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1310))
    - enhance `SimpleConfig.dump()` method to use simpleconfig templates
        where possible
        ([#1314](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1314)),
        [#1319](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1319)),
        [#1320](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1320)),
        [#1321](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1321))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix issue with cleaning up (no) logfile if `--logtostdout`/`-l`
        is used
        ([#1298](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1298))
    - stop making `ModulesTool` class a singleton since it causes
        problems when multilple toolchains are in play
        ([#1299](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1299))
    - don't modify values of 'paths' list passed as argument to
        prepend_paths in `ModuleGenerator`
        ([#1300](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1300))
    - fix issue with `SimpleConfig.dump()` + cleanup
        ([#1308](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1308)),
        [#1311](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1311))
    - re-enable (and fix) accidentally disabled test
        ([#1316](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1316))

**simpleblocks**

- modified simplebuild.simpleblocks package declaration to support giving
    preference to custom simpleblocks

## SimpleBuild v2.1.1 (May 18th 2015) {: #release_notes_eb211 }

bugfix release

**framework**

- fix issue with missing load statements when `--module-only` is used,
    don't skip ready/prepare steps
    ([#1276](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1276))
- enhance `--search`: only consider actual filename (not entire path),
    use regex syntax
    ([#1281](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1281))
- various other bug fixes, including:
    - fix `generate_software_list.py` script w.r.t. dependencies
        marked as external modules
        ([#1273](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1273))
    - only use `$LMOD_CMD` value if `lmod` binary can't be found in
        $PATH
        ([#1275](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1275))
    - fix location of `module_only` build option w.r.t. default value
        ([#1277](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1277))
    - fix combined use of `--hide-deps` and `hiddendependencies`
        ([#1280](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1280))
    - remove log handlers that were added during tests, to ensure
        effective cleanup of log files
        ([#1282](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1282))
        - this makes the unit test suite run ~3x faster!
    - define `$CRAYPE_LINK_TYPE` if '`dynamic`' toolchain option is
        enabled for Cray compiler wrappers
        ([#1283](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1283))

**simpleblocks**

- fix compatibility of simpleblocks with `--module-only` + dedicated
    unit test module
    ([#610](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/610))
- minor enhancements, including:
    - update GROMACS simpleblock for version 5
        ([#513](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/513))
- various other bug fixes, including:
    - only check compiler being used if FFTW interfaces are being
        built in Intel MKL simpleblock
        ([#606](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/606))

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for **3** new software packages:
    - networkx
        ([#1592](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1592)),
        Platanus
        ([#1597](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1597)),
        SaguaroGW
        ([#1600](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1600))
- added new simpleconfigs for existing toolchains: `ictce/7.3.5`,
    `CrayCCE/5.2.40`, `CrayGNU/5.2.40`, `CrayIntel/5.2.40`
- added simpleconfigs using `CrayGNU/5.2.25` and `CrayGNU/5.2.40`
    toolchains
    ([#1610](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1610),
    [#1611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1611))
- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software
    packages: version updates, different toolchains, ...
    - including Boost 1.58.0, GROMACS 5.0.4, Python 3.4.3
- various bug fixes, including:
    - enable usempi in GROMACS simpleconfig using CrayGNU toolchain (as
        required by GROMACS simpleblock)
        ([#1590](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1590))
    - use system-provided tcsh when building WRF on Cray systems, to
        avoid hanging build
        ([#1595](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1595))
    - only use '`dynamic`' toolchain option, not '`shared`', in
        simpleconfigs using Cray toolchain
        ([#1609](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1609))

## SimpleBuild v2.1.0 (April 30th 2015) {: #release_notes_v2.1.0 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- requires vsc-base v2.2.0 or more recent
    - added support for LoggedException
        ([vsc-base#160](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/160),
        [vsc-base#163](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/163),
        [vsc-base#165](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/165),
        [vsc-base#167](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/167))
    - added support for add_flex action in GeneralOption
        ([vsc-base#162](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/162))
    - added support to GeneralOption to act on unknown configuration
        environment variables
        ([vsc-base#162](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/162))
- add support for only (re)generating module files: `--module-only`
    ([#1018](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1018))
    - module naming scheme API is enhanced to include
        det_install_subdir method
    - see [Only (re)generating (additional) module files using --module-only][module_only]
- add support for generating module files in Lua syntax (note:
    requires Lmod as modules tool)
    ([#1060](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1060),
    [#1255](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1255),
    [#1256](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1256),
    [#1270](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1270))
    - see `--module-syntax` configuration option and
        [Module files syntax][module_syntax]
- deprecate `log.error` method in favor of raising `SimpleBuildError`
    exception
    ([#1218](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1218))
    - see [`error` and `exception` log methods no longer raise an exception][depr_error_reporting]
- add support for using external modules as dependencies, and to
    provide metadata for external modules
    ([#1230](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1230),
    [#1265](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1265),
    [#1267](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1267))
    - see [Using external modules][using_external_modules]
- add experimental support for Cray toolchains on top of PrgEnv
    modules: `CrayGNU`, `CrayIntel`, `CrayCCE`
    ([#1234](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1234),
    [#1268](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1268))
    - see
        <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/SimpleBuild-on-Cray>
- various other enhancements, including:
    - clear list of checksums when using `--try-software-version`
        ([#1169](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1169))
    - sort the results of searching for files (e.g., `--search`
        output)
        ([#1214](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1214))
    - enhance test w.r.t. use of templates in cfgfile
        ([#1217](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1217))
    - define '`%(DEFAULT_REPOSITORYPATH)s`' template for cfgfiles
        (see `eb --avail-cfgfile-constants`)
        ([#1220](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1220))
    - also reset `$LD_PRELOAD` when running module commands, in case
        module defined `$LD_PRELOAD`
        ([#1222](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1222))
    - move location of '`module use`' statements in generated module
        file (*after* '`module load`' statements)
        ([#1232](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1232))
    - add support for `--show-default-configfiles`
        ([#1240](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1240))
        - see [Default configuration files][default_configuration_files]
    - report error on missing configuration files, rather than
        ignoring them
        ([#1240](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1240))
    - clean up commit message used in simpleconfig git repository
        ([#1248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1248))
    - add `--hide-deps` configuration option to specify names of
        software that must be installed as hidden modules
        ([#1250](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1250))
        - see [Installing dependencies as hidden modules using `--hide-deps`][hide_deps]
    - add support for appending/prepending to `--robot-paths` to avoid
        overwriting default robot search path
        ([#1252](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1252))
        - see [Prepending/appending to the default robot search path][robot_search_path_prepend_append]
    - enable detection of use of unknown `$SIMPLEBUILD`-prefixed
        environment variables
        ([#1253](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1253))
        - see [Environment variables][configuration_env_vars]
    - add `--installpath-modules` and `--installpath-software`
        configuration options
        ([#1258](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1258))
        - see [Software and modules install path][installpath]
    - use dedicated subdirectory in temporary directory for each test
        to ensure better cleanup
        ([#1260](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1260))
    - get rid of `$PROFILEREAD` hack when running commands, not needed
        anymore
        ([#1264](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1264))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - make bootstrap script robust against having `vsc-base` already
        available in Python search path
        ([#1212](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1212),
        [#1215](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1215))
    - set default value for unpack_options simpleconfig parameter to
        `''`, so `self.cfg.update` works on it
        ([#1229](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1229))
    - also copy rotated log files
        ([#1238](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1238))
    - fix parsing of `--download-timeout` value
        ([#1242](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1242))
    - make `test_XDG_CONFIG_env_vars` unit test robust against
        existing user config file in default location
        ([#1259](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1259))
    - fix minor robustness issues w.r.t. `$XDG_CONFIG*` and
        `$PYTHONPATH` in unit tests
        ([#1262](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1262))
    - fix issue with handling empty toolchain variables
        ([#1263](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1263))

**simpleblocks**

- replace '`log.error`' with '`raise SimpleBuildError`' in all
    simpleblocks
    ([#588](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/588))
- one new generic simpleblock: `ConfigureMakePythonPackage`
    ([#540](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/540))
- new simpleblocks for 2 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - TINKER
        ([#578](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/578)),
        Xmipp
        ([#581](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/581))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - enhance WIEN2k simpleblock for recent versions + cleanup
        ([#486](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/486))
    - define `$PYTHONNOUSERSITE` in PythonPackage simpleblock so
        user-installed packages are not picked up
        ([#577](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/577))
    - add support in CP2K simpleblock for building on top of
        MPICH/MPICH2
        ([#579](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/579))
    - enhance Hadoop simpleblock to support parallel builds
        ([#580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/580))
    - drop `-noroot` for recent FLUENT versions, honor `installopts`,
        enable `-debug`
        ([#582](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/582))
    - include `prebuildopts` in build command for Python packages
        ([#585](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/585))
    - also install `rosetta_tools` subdirectory for Rosetta
        ([#586](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/586))
    - update SLEPc simpleblock for v3.5 + style cleanup
        ([#593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/593))
    - minor fix in HPL simpleblock w.r.t. checking defined environment
        variables
        ([#595](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/595))
    - tweak CP2K simpleblock w.r.t. LAPACK/FFTW support
        ([#596](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/596))
    - minor update to GCC simpleblock to support GCC v5.x
        ([#598](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/598))
    - update sanity check in R simpleblock for version 3.2.0
        ([#602](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/602))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix Score-P simpleblock for compiler-only toolchains, include Qt
        as optional dependency
        ([#552](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/552))
    - fix definition of `$MKLROOT`, should be set to '`mkl`' subdir
        of install dir
        ([#576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/576))
    - add `-libmpichf90` to list of MPI libraries in NWChem simpleblock
        ([#584](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/584))
    - stop using '`$root`' to make simpleblocks compatible with module
        files in Lua syntax
        ([#590](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/590))
    - also set `$PYTHONPATH` before installing Python package in
        temporary directory in `test_step`
        ([#591](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/591))
    - unset `buildopts`/`installopts` before installing Python
        extensions in Python simpleblock
        ([#597](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/597))
    - allow not including vsc-base sources when installing SimpleBuild
        (gets installed with simplebuild-framework)
        ([#600](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/600))
    - use `self.initial_environ` rather than `self.orig_environ` in
        SimpleBuildMeta simpleblock
        ([#600](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/600))
    - make GCC simpleblock compatible with `--module-only` by setting
        default value for `self.platform_lib` in constructor
        ([#603](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/603))
