        ([#1554](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1554)),
        spglib
        ([#1549](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1549)),
        TINKER
        ([#1465](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1465)),
        tmux
        ([#1369](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1369)),
        Xmipp
        ([#1489](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1489))
- added simpleconfigs for new (Cray-specific) toolchains
    ([#1538](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1538)):
    `CrayGNU`, `CrayIntel`, `CrayCCE`
    - initially supported software (using CrayGNU toolchains): CP2K,
        GROMACS, HPL, Python + numpy/scipy, WRF
        ([#1558](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1558))
    - see also
        <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/SimpleBuild-on-Cray>
- added new simpleconfigs for existing toolchains: `goolf/1.5.16`,
    `intel/2014.06`
- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software
    packages: version updates, different toolchains, ...
    - including GCC v5.1.0, OpenFOAM v2.3.1, R v3.1.3 and v3.2.0,
        PETSc/SLEPc v3.5.3, WIEN2k v14.1
- various other enhancements, including:
    - include pbr dependency for lockfile Python extension in Python
        v2.7.9 simpleconfigs + mock/pytz/pandas
        ([#1462](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1462),
        [#1540](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1540))
    - include SQLite as dependency in Python v2.7.9 simpleconfigs
        ([#1468](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1468))
    - set `$LD_PRELOAD` for Hoard and jemalloc
        ([#1470](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1470))
    - fix homepage in SCOTCH simpleconfigs
        ([#1485](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1485))
    - adding missing six/ecdsa dependencies for dateutil/paramiko
        Python packages in Python simpleconfigs
        ([#1504](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1504),
        [#1505](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1505),
        [#1506](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1506),
        [#1507](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1507),
        [#1508](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1508),
        [#1509](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1509),
        [#1510](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1510))
    - enable `pic` toolchain option in expat simpleconfigs
        ([#1562](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1562))
    - extend list of source URLs for Bioconductor packages in R
        simpleconfigs to include 'release' source URLs
        ([#1568](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1568))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - adding missing zlib dependency in all Tcl simpleconfig files
        ([#1344](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1344))
    - fix homepage in FLUENT simpleconfigs
        ([#1472](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1472))
    - use `--with-verbs` rather than deprecated `--with-openib` in
        OpenMPI configure options
        ([#1511](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1511))
    - stop relying on `OS_NAME` constant to specify OS dependencies in
        OpenMPI simpleconfigs
        ([#1512](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1512))
    - replace use of '`$root`' with '`%(installdir)s`' to ensure
        compatibility with module files in Lua syntax
        ([#1532](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1532))
    - stop relying on '`$MKLROOT`' in ROOT simpleconfigs
        ([#1537](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1537))
    - use proper Bundle simpleblock for biodeps/PRACE
        ([#1566](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1566))
    - make source_urls in Cube and Scalasca simpleconfigs compatible
        with --try-software-version
        ([#1574](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1574))
    - add patch for Cube to fix configure script w.r.t. Qt dependency,
        add --without-java-reader configure option
        ([#1574](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1574))

## SimpleBuild v2.0.0 (March 6th 2015) {: #release_notes_v2.0.0 }

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- requires vsc-base v2.0.3 or more recent
    - avoid deprecation warnings w.r.t. use of `message` attribute
        ([vsc-base#155](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/155))
    - fix typo in log message rendering `--ignoreconfigfiles` unusable
        ([vsc-base#158](https://github.com/hpcugent/vsc-base/pull/158))
- removed functionality that was deprecated for SimpleBuild version 2.0
    ([#1143](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1143))
    - see [Removed functionality][removed_functionality]
    - the fix_broken_simpleconfigs.py script can be used to update
        simpleconfig files suffering from this
        ([#1151](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1151),
        [#1206](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1206),
        [#1207](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1207))
- stop including a crippled copy of vsc-base, include vsc-base as a
    proper dependency instead
    ([#1160](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1160),
    [#1194](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1194))
    - vsc-base is automatically installed as a dependency for
        simplebuild-framework, if a Python installation tool is used
    - see [Required Python packages][required_python_packages]
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add support for Linux/POWER systems
        ([#1044](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1044))
    - major cleanup in `tools/systemtools.py` + significantly enhanced
        tests
        ([#1044](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1044))
    - add support for '`eb -a rst`', list available simpleconfig
        parameters in ReST format
        ([#1131](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1131))
    - add support for specifying one or more simpleconfigs in
        combination with `--from-pr`
        ([#1132](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1132))
        - see [Specifying particular simpleconfig files][github_from_pr_specifying_simpleconfigs]
    - define `__contains__` in SimpleConfig class
        ([#1155](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1155))
    - restore support for downloading over a proxy
        ([#1158](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1158))
        - i.e., use `urllib2` rather than `urllib`
        - this involved sacrificing the download progress report
            (which was only visible in the log file)
    - let `mpi_family` return `None` if MPI is not supported by a
        toolchain
        ([#1164](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1164))
    - include support for specifying system-level configuration files
        for SimpleBuild via `$XDG_CONFIG_DIRS`
        ([#1166](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1166))
        - see [Default configuration files][default_configuration_files]
    - make unit tests more robust
        ([#1167](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1167),
        [#1196](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1196))
        - see [Unit tests][unit_tests]
    - add hierarchical module naming scheme categorizing modules by
        `moduleclass`
        ([#1176](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1176))
    - enhance bootstrap script to allow bootstrapping using supplied
        tarballs
        ([#1184](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1184))
    - disable updating of Lmod user cache by default, add
        configuration option `--update-modules-tool-cache`
        ([#1185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1185))
        - for now, only the Lmod user cache can be updated using
            `--update-modules-tool-cache`
    - use available `which()` function, rather than running
        '`which`' via `run_cmd`
        ([#1192](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1192))
    - fix `install-SimpleBuild-develop.sh` script w.r.t. vsc-base
        dependency
        ([#1193](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1193))
    - also consider robot search path when looking for specified
        simpleconfigs
        ([#1201](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1201))
        - see [Specifying what to install][specifying_simpleconfigs]
- various bug fixes, including:
    - stop triggering deprecated/no longer support functionality in
        unit tests
        ([#1126](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1126))
    - fix `from_pr` test by including dummy simpleblocks for HPL and
        ScaLAPACK
        ([#1133](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1133))
    - escape use of '`%`' in string with command line options with
        `--job`
        ([#1135](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1135))
    - fix handling specified patch level 0 (+ enhance tests for
        fetch_patches method)
        ([#1139](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1139))
    - fix formatting issues in generated simpleconfig file obtained via
        `--try-X`
        ([#1144](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1144))
    - use `log.error` in `tools/toolchain/toolchain.py` where
        applicable
        ([#1145](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1145))
    - stop hardcoding `/tmp` in `mpi_cmd_for` function
        ([#1146](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1146),
        [#1200](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1200))
    - correctly determine variable name for `$EBEXTLIST` when
        generating module file
        ([#1156](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1156))
    - do not ignore exit code of failing postinstall commands
        ([#1157](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1157))
    - fix rare case in which used simpleconfig and copied simpleconfig are
        the same
        ([#1159](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1159))
    - always filter hidden deps from list of dependencies
        ([#1161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1161))
    - fix implementation of `path_matches` function in
        `tools/filetools.py`
        ([#1163](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1163))
    - make sure plain text keyring is used by unit tests
        ([#1165](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1165))
    - suppress creation of module symlinks for `HierarchicalMNS`
        ([#1173](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1173))
    - sort all lists obtained via `glob.glob`, since they are in
        arbitrary order
        ([#1187](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1187))
    - stop modifying `$MODULEPATH` directly in `setUp`/`tearDown` of
        toolchain tests
        ([#1191](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull//1191))

**simpleblocks**

- one new generic simpleblock for installing a bundle of modules:
    `Bundle`
    ([#550](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/550))
    - and let the `Toolchain` generic simpleblock derive from `Bundle`
- new simpleblocks for 2 software packages that require customized
    support:
    - GAMESS-US
        ([#470](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/470),
        [#544](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/544),
        [#558](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/558)),
        Hadoop
        ([#563](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/563))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - move support for `staged_install` from CPLEX simpleblock to
        generic `Binary` simpleblock
        ([#502](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/502))
    - fix sanity check in picard simpleblock for v1.119 that doesn't
        include `sam.jar`
        ([#522](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/522))
    - log warning message when unlinking jellyfish symlink fails in
        Trinity simpleblock
        ([#534](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/534))
    - revamp `EB_libint2` simpleblock into `EB_Libint` that works for
        both Libint v1x and v2.x
        ([#536](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/536))
    - update CP2K simpleblock for recent versions (no more '`fes`')
        ([#537](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/537))
    - update SuiteSparse simpleblock for recent versions
        ([#541](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/541))
    - fix simpleblock unit tests after dropping support for deprecated
        behaviour in framework
        ([#543](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/543))
    - rework PSI simpleblock to support future releases
        ([#545](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/545))
    - enable always generating a 'verbose' Makefile in the generic
        CMakeMake simpleblock
        ([#546](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/546))
    - remove functionality in (generic) simpleblocks that was deprecated
        for SimpleBuild v2.0
        ([#547](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/547))
    - enhance generic RPackage simpleblock to support installing
        extensions in a separate prefix
        ([#551](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/551))
    - deprecate GenomeAnalysisTK simpleblock, since it's basically
        equivalent to Tarball
        ([#557](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/557))
    - update SAMtools simpleblock for v1.2
        ([#562](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/562))
    - take `preconfigopts` simpleconfig parameter into account in ROOT
        simpleblock
        ([#566](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/566))
    - update simpleblock for installing SimpleBuild
        - to support bootstrapping with provided source tarballs
            ([#559](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/559))
        - to also cover vsc-base dependency, and verify
            `simple-install.pth`
            ([#567](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/567))
    - update disabling sanitizer tests for Clang 3.6
        ([#570](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/570))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix handling of LTO in GCC simpleblock
        ([#535](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/535))
    - relocate FDTD RPM to fix installation on SL6
        ([#538](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/538))

**simpleconfigs**

        ([#1416](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1416)),

        ([#1283](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1283)),

        ([#1283](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1283)),

- added simpleconfigs for new (common) toolchains
    - `foss/2015a`

        ([#1380](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1380)),

        ([#1397](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1397)),

        ([#1294](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1294)),

- added new software bundle: `Autotools`

    - use `Bundle` generic simpleblock for HPCBIOS bundles and fix

    - don't list '`lto`' as a language in GCC simpleconfigs

        ([#1287](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1287))
    - fix mpi4py `source_urls` in Python simpleconfigs
        ([#1306](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1306))
    - consistently use CLooG 0.18.0 for GCC 4.8 series
        ([#1392](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1392))
    - rename GenomeAnalysisTk simpleconfigs to GATK
        ([#1399](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1399))
    - include `openssl-devel` SLES11 OS dependency in
        cURL/MySQL/Python simpleconfigs
        ([#1422](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1422))
    - add missing Perl dependency in parallel simpleconfigs
        ([#1430](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1430))
    - correct name in BLAST+ simpleconfigs
        ([#1443](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1443))
    - fix name for sparsehash simpleconfigs
        ([#1452](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1452))

## SimpleBuild v1.16.2 (March 6th 2015)

bugfix release

**framework**

*(no changes compared to v1.16.1, simple version bump to stay in sync
with simplebuild-simpleblocks)*

**simpleblocks**

- make `EB_SimpleBuildMeta` simpleblock aware of vsc-base to make
    upgrading to SimpleBuild v2.0.0 possible
    ([#573](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/573))

**simpleconfigs**

*(no changes compared to v1.16.1, simple version bump to stay in sync
with simplebuild-simpleblocks)*

## SimpleBuild v1.16.1 (December 19th 2014)

bugfix release

**framework**

- fix functionality that is broken with `--deprecated=2.0` or with
    `$SIMPLEBUILD_DEPRECATED=2.0`
    - don't include simpleconfig parameters for `ConfigureMake` in
        `eb -a`, since fallback is deprecated
        ([#1123](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1123))
    - correctly check software_license value type
        ([#1124](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1124))
    - fix `generate_software_list.py` script w.r.t. deprecated
        fallback to `ConfigureMake`
        ([#1127](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1127))
- other bug fixes
    - fix logging issues in tests, sync with vsc-base v2.0.0
        ([#1120](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1120))

**simpleblocks**

- fix SimpleBuild versions for which `$SIMPLEBUILD_DEPRECATED=1.0` is set
    in SimpleBuild sanity check
    ([#531](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/531))

**simpleconfigs**

- set default simpleblock to ConfigureMake in TEMPLATE.eb
    ([#1277](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1277))

## SimpleBuild v1.16.0 (December 18th 2014)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- deprecate automagic fallback to `ConfigureMake` simpleblock
    ([#1113](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1113))
    - simpleconfigs should specify `simpleblock = 'ConfigureMake'` instead
        of relying on the fallback mechanism
    - **note: automagic fallback to** `ConfigureMake` **simpleblock will
        be removed in SimpleBuild v2.0**
    - see also [Automagic fallback to
        ConfigureMake](http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Deprecated-functionality.html#configuremake-fallback)
- stop triggering deprecated functionality, to enable use of
    `--deprecated=2.0`
    ([#1107](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1107),
    [#1115](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1115),
    [#1119](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1119))
    - see [Deprecated
        functionality](http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Deprecated-functionality.html#configuremake-fallback)
        for more information
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add script to clean up gists created via `--upload-test-report`
        ([#958](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/958))
    - also use `-xHost` when using Intel compilers on AMD systems (as
        opposed to `-msse3`)
        ([#960](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/960))
    - add Python version check in `eb` command
        ([#1046](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1046))
    - take `versionprefix` into account in `HierarchicalMNS` module
        naming scheme
        ([#1058](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1058))
    - clean up and refactor `main.py`, move functionality to other
        modules
        ([#1059](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1059),
        [#1064](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1064),
        [#1075](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1075),
        [#1087](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1087))
    - add check in `download_file` function for HTTP return code +
        show download progress report
        ([#1066](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1066),
        [#1090](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1090))
    - include info log message with name and location of used
        simpleblock
        ([#1069](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1069))
    - add toolchains definitions for `gpsmpi`, `gpsolf`, `impich`,
        `intel-para`, `ipsmpi` toolchains
        ([#1072](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1072),
        [#1073](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1073))
        - support for Parastation MPI based toolchains
    - enforce that `hiddendependencies` is a subset of `dependencies`
        ([#1078](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1078))
        - this is done to avoid that site-specific policies w.r.t.
            hidden modules slip into contributed simpleconfigs
    - enable use of `--show_hidden` for `avail` subcommand with recent
        Lmod versions
        ([#1081](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1081))
    - add `--robot-paths` configure option
        ([#1080](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1080),
        [#1093](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1093),
        [#1095](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1095),
        [#1114](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1114))
    - support use of `%(DEFAULT_ROBOT_PATHS)s` template in SimpleBuild
        configuration files
        ([#1100](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1100))
        - see also [Controlling the robot search
            path](http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Using_the_SimpleBuild_command_line.html#controlling-the-robot-search-path)
    - use `-xHost` rather than `-xHOST`, to match Intel documentation
        ([#1084](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1084))
    - update and cleanup `README` file
        ([#1085](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1085))
    - deprecate `self.moduleGenerator` in favor of
        `self.module_generator` in `SimpleBlock`
        ([#1088](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1088))
    - also support `MPICH` MPI family in `mpi_cmd_for` function
        ([#1098](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1098))
    - update documentation references to point to
        <http://simplebuild.readthedocs.org>
        ([#1102](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1102))
    - check for OS dependencies with *both* `rpm` and `dpkg` (if
        available)
        ([#1111](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1111))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix picking required software version specified by
        `--software-version` and clean up `tweak.py`
        ([#1062](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1062),
        [#1063](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1063))
    - escape `$` characters in module load message specified via

        ([#1068](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1068))
    - take available hidden modules into account in dependency
        resolution
        ([#1065](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1065))
    - fix hard crash when using patch files with an empty list of
        sources
        ([#1070](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1070))
    - fix Intel MKL BLACS library being used for MPICH/MPICH2-based

        ([#1072](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1072))
    - fix regular expression in `fetch_parameter_from_simpleconfig_file`

        ([#1096](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1096))
    - don't hardcode queue names when submitting a job
        ([#1106](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1106))
    - fix affiliation/mail address for Fotis in headers
        ([#1105](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1105))
    - filter out `/dev/null` entries in patch file in

        ([#1108](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1108))
    - fix `gmpolf` toolchain definition, to have `gmpich` as MPI
        components (instead of `gmpich2`)
        ([#1101](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1101))
        - 'MPICH' refers to MPICH v3.x, while MPICH2 refers to
            MPICH(2) v2.x (MPICH v1.x is ancient/obsolete)
        - **note**: this requires to reinstall the `gmpolf` module,
            using the updated simpleconfig from
            [simplebuild-simpleconfigs#1217](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1217)

## SimpleBuild v1.15.2 (October 7th 2014)

bugfix release

**framework**

- fix `$MODULEPATH` extensions for Clang/CUDA, to make
    `goolfc`/`cgoolf` compatible with `HierarchicalMNS`
    ([#1050](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1050))
- include `versionsuffix` in module subdirectory with
    `HierarchicalMNS`
    ([#1050](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1050),
    [#1055](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1055))
- fix unit tests which were broken with bash patched for ShellShock
    bug
    ([#1051](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1051))
- add definition of gimpi toolchain, required to make gimkl toolchain
    compatible with `HierarchicalMNS`
    ([#1052](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1052))
- don't override `COMPILER_MODULE_NAME` obtained from `ClangGCC` in
    Clang-based toolchains
    ([#1053](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1053))
- fix wrong code in `path_to_top_of_module_tree` function
    ([#1054](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1054))
    - because of this, load statements for compilers were potentially
        included in higher-level modules under `HierarchicalMNS`

**simpleblocks**

- only disable sanitizer tests for recent Clang versions
    ([#481](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/481),
    [#482](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/482))
- pass down installopts to CUDA install command
    ([#483](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/483))

**simpleconfigs**

- disable parallel build for slalib
    ([#968](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/968))
- fix compatibility of goolfc with HierarchicalMNS by using GCC
    toolchain for installing CUDA
    ([#1106](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1106),
    [#1115](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1115))
- fix zlib OS dependency spec for Debian in Boost simpleconfigs
    ([#1109](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1109))
- fix compatibility of gimkl with HierarchicalMNS by using gimpi
    subtoolchain
    ([#1110](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1110))
- make both GCC and Clang first-class members in Clang-based
    toolchains to fix compatibility with HierarchicalMNS
    ([#1113](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1113))

## SimpleBuild v1.15.1 (September 23rd 2014)

bugfix release

**framework**

- take into account that multiple modules may be extending
    `$MODULEPATH` with the same path, when determining path to top of
    module tree (see
    [#1047](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1047))
    - this bug caused a load statement for either `icc` or `ifort` to
        be included in higher-level modules installed with an
        Intel-based compiler toolchain, under the `HierarchicalMNS`
        module naming scheme
- make `HierarchicalMNS` module naming scheme compatible with `cgoolf`
    and `goolfc` toolchain
    ([#1049](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1049))
- add definition of `iompi` (sub)toolchain to make `iomkl` toolchain
    compatible with `HierarchicalMNS`
    ([#1049](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1049))

**simpleblocks**

*(no changes compared to v1.15.0, simple version bump to stay in sync
with simplebuild-framework)*

**simpleconfigs**

- minor bug fixes, including:
    - use SHLIB_EXT in GMP/MPFR simpleconfigs
        ([#1090](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1090))
    - fix TopHat homepage and source_urls since page moved
        ([#1092](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1092))
    - make iomkl toolchain compatible with HierarchicalMNS
        ([#1099](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/1099))

## SimpleBuild v1.15.0 (September 12th 2014)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- various other enhancements, including:
    - fetch extension sources in fetch_step to enhance `--stop=fetch`
        ([#978](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/978))
    - add `iimpi` toolchain definition
        ([#993](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/993))
    - prepend robot path with download location of files when
        `--from-pr` is used
        ([#995](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/995))
    - add support for excluding module path extensions from generated
        modules
        ([#1003](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1003))
        - see `include_modpath_extensions` simpleconfig parameter
    - add support for installing hidden modules and using them as
        dependencies
        ([#1009](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1009),
        [#1021](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1021),
        [#1023](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1023))
        - see `--hidden` and `hiddendependencies` simpleconfig parameter
    - stop relying on `conflict` statement in module files to
        determine software name of toolchain components
        ([#1017](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1017),
        [#1037](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/1037))

## SimpleBuild v1.14.0 (July 9th 2014)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- important changes
    - required Lmod version bumped to v5.6.3
        ([#944](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/944))
        - required due to enhancements and bug fixes in Lmod, e.g.
            making `--terse avail` significantly faster, and correctly
            handling a `prepend-path` statement that includes multiple
            directories at once
    - required Tcl/C environment modules version set to 3.2.10 (
        - hard requirement due to fixed `modulecmd` segmentation fault
            bug, that only tends manifests itself when making a large
            amount of changes in the environment (e.g.
            `module load <toolchain>`)
    - renamed `SimpleBuildModuleNamingScheme` to `SimpleBuildMNS`
- enhanced custom module naming schemes functionality to support
    hierarchical module naming schemes
    ([#953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/953),
    [#971](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/971),
    [#975](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/975))
    - extended API for custom module naming schemes to allow tweaking
        different aspects of module naming
        - see `simplebuild/tools/module_naming_scheme/mns.py` for
            abstract `ModuleNamingScheme` class
        - an example hierarchical module naming scheme is included,
            see `HierarchicalMNS`
    - split up full module names into a module subdirectory part,
        which becomes part of `$MODULEPATH`), and a 'short' module
        name (is exposed to end-users)
        - example: `GCC/4.7.2` in `Core` subdir, `OpenMPI/1.6.5` in
            `Compiler/GCC/4.7.2` subdir
    - make `ModuleNamingScheme` class a singleton, move it into
        `simplebuild.tools.module_naming_scheme.mns` module
    - implement `ActiveMNS` wrapper class for querying active module
        naming scheme
    - implement toolchain inspection functions that can be used in a
        custom module naming scheme
        - `det_toolchain_compilers`, `det_toolchain_mpi` in
            `simplebuild.tools.module_naming_scheme.toolchain`
    - significant code cleanup & enhanced unit tests
- enhance & clean up `tools/modules.py`
    ([#944](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/944),
    [#953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/953),
    [#963](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/963),
    [#964](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/964),
    [#969](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/969))
    - make `ModulesTool` a singleton to avoid repeating module
        commands over & over again needlessly
    - use `module use`, `module unuse` rather than fiddling with
        `$MODULEPATH` directly
    - improve debug logging (include full stdout/stderr output of
        module commands)
    - remove deprecated functionality (`add_module`, `remove_module`,
        indirect module load)
- various other enhancements, including:
    - added toolchain definitions for 'common' toolchains: `intel`
        and `foss`
        ([#956](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/956))
    - implement caching for simpleconfig files, parsed simpleconfigs and
        toolchains
        ([#953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/953))
    - enable `--ignore-osdeps` implicitly when `-D`, `--dry-run` or
        `--dep-graph` are used
        ([#953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/953))
    - flesh out `use_group` and `det_parallelism` function, include
        them in `simplebuild.tools.systemtools`
        ([#953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/953))
    - make symlinking of module files part of module naming scheme API
        ([#973](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/973))
        - list of symlinks paths can be controlled using
            `det_module_symlink_paths()` method
    - added support for new configuration options:
        - tweaking compiler flags triggered by `optarch` toolchain
            options using `--optarch`
            ([#949](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/949))
        - filtering out dependencies from simpleconfig files using
            `--filter-deps`
            ([#957](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/957))
        - filtering environment included in test reports with
            `--test-report-env-filter`
            ([#959](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/959))
            e.g.
            `--test-report-env-filter='^SSH|USER|HOSTNAME|UID|.*COOKIE.*'`
        - made suffix used for module files install path configurable,
            using `--suffix-modules-path`
            ([#973](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/973))
    - added support for additional simpleconfig parameters:
        - define aliases in module files (`modaliases`)
            ([#952](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/952))
        - add print message on module load (`modloadmsg`) and Tcl
            footer (`modtclfooter`) in module files
            ([#954](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/954),
            [#974](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/974))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - don't try to tweak generated simpleconfigs when using `--try-X`
        ([#942](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/942))
    - currently create symlinks to module files modules/all under a
        custom module naming scheme
        ([#953](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/953))
    - restore traceback error reporting on hard crashes
        ([#965](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/965))

**simpleblocks**

- added **one** new *generic* simpleblock: CmdCp
    ([#395](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/395))
- added support for **2** new software packages that requires

## SimpleBuild v1.13.0 (May 29th 2014)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- make `--try-X` command line options work recursively (i.e.
    collaborate with `--robot`)
    ([#922](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/922))
    - SimpleBuild will first build a full dependency graph of the
        specified simpleconfigs, and then apply the `--try` specifications
        - the elements of the dependency graph for the used toolchain
            and its dependencies are left untouched
    - this makes
        `eb foo-1.0-goolf-1.4.10.eb --try-toolchain=ictce,5.5.0 --robot`
        also work when `foo` has dependencies
    - caveat: the specified simpleconfig files must all use the same
        toolchain (version)
- add support for testing simpleconfig pull requests from SimpleBuild
    command line
    ([#920](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/920),
    [#924](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/924),
    [#925](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/925),
    [#932](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/932),
    [#933](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/933),
    [#938](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/938))
    - add `--from-pr` command line option for downloading simpleconfig
        files from pull requests
    - add `--upload-test-report` command line option for uploading a
        detailed test report to GitHub as a gist
        - this requires specifying a GitHub username for which a
            GitHub token is available, using `--github-user`
        - with `--dump-test-report`, the test report can simply be
            dumped to file rather than being uploaded to GitHub
        - see also
            <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/Review-process-for-contributions#testing-result>
- the `makeopts` and `premakeopts` simpleconfig parameter are
    deprecated, and replaced by `buildopts` and `prebuildopts`
    ([#918](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/918))
    - both `makeopts` and `premakeopts` will still be honored in
        future SimpleBuild v1.x versions, but should no longer be used
- various other enhancements, including:
    - add `--disable-cleanup-builddir` command line option, to keep
        the build dir after a (successful) build
        ([#853](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/853))
        - the build dir is still cleaned up by default for successful
            builds, i.e. `--cleanup-builddir` is the default
    - also consider lib32 in paths checked for `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` and
        `$LIBRARY_PATH`
        ([#912](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/912))
    - reorganize support for file/git/svn repositories into
        `repository` package, making it extensible
        ([#913](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/913))
    - add support for `postinstallcmds` simpleconfig parameter, to
        specify commands that need to be run after the install step
        ([#918](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/918))
    - make `VERSION=` part in version of C environment modules tool
        optional, which is required for older versions
        ([#930](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/930))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix small issues in bootstrap script: correctly determine
        SimpleBuild version and make sure modules path exists
        ([#915](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/915))
    - fix github unit tests
        ([#916](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/916))
    - disable useless debug logging for unit tests
        ([#919](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/919))
    - fix unit test for `--skip`
        ([#929](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/929))
    - make sure `start_dir` can be set based on location of unpacked
        first source file
        ([#931](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/931))
    - the `vsc` package shipped with simplebuild-framework is synced
        with vsc-base v1.9.1
        ([#935](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/935))
        - fancylogger (used for logging in SimpleBuild) is now robust
            against strings containing UTF8 characters
        - the `deprecated` logging function now does a non-strict
            version check (rather than an erroneous strict check)
        - the `simplebuild.tools.agithub` module is removed,
            `vsc.utils.rest` now provides the required functionality
    - fix support for unpacking gzipped source files, don't unpack
        `.gz` files in-place in the source directory
        ([#936](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/936))

**simpleblocks**

- added support for **1** new software package that requires
    customized support:
    - Go
        ([#417](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/417))
- various enhancements, including:
    - enhance OpenFOAM simpleblock so OpenFOAM-Extend fork can be built
        too + style fixes
        ([#253](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/253),
        [#416](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/416))
    - enhance CPLEX simpleblock by adding support for staged
        installation
        ([#372](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/372))
    - include support for `configure_cmd_prefix` simpleconfig parameter
        in ConfigureMake generic simpleblock
        ([#393](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/393))
    - enhance GCC simpleblock for building v4.9.0 and versions prior to
        v4.5
        ([#396](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/396),
        [#400](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/400))
    - enhance simpleblocks for Intel ipp and itac to support recent
        versions
        ([#399](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/399))
    - enhance Clang simpleblock: install static analyzer
        ([#402](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/402)),
        be more robust against changing source dir names
        ([#413](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/413))
    - enhance FoldX simpleblock, update list of potential FoldX binaries
        to support recent versions
        ([#407](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/407))
    - add runtime patching in Boost simpleblock to fix build issue with
        old Boost versions and recent glibc (> 2.15)
        ([#412](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/412))
    - enhance `MakeCp` generic simpleblock: use location of 1st unpacked

        ([#415](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/415))

## SimpleBuild v1.12.0 (April 4th 2014)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - completed support for custom module naming schemes
        ([#879](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/879),
        [#904](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/904))
        - a fully parsed simpleconfig file is now passed to the
            `det_full_module_name` function
        - this does require that an simpleconfig file matching the
            dependency specification is available
    - added more features to better support using a shared install
        target with multiple users
        ([#902](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/902),
        [#903](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/903),
        [#904](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/904))
    - further development on support for new simpleconfig format (v2.0)
        ([#844](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/844),
        [#848](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/848))
        - not considered stable yet, so still requires using
            `--experimental`
    - enhanced bootstrap script to also support Lmod and
        `modulecmd.tcl` module tools
        ([#869](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/869))
    - added support to `run_cmd_qa` function to supply a list of
        answers
        ([#887](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/887))
    - detect mismatch between definition of `module` function and
        selected modules tool
        ([#871](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/871))
        - allowing mismatch now requires
            `--allow-modules-tool-mismatch`; an empty `module` function
            is simply ignored
    - provide lib64 fallback option for directories in default sanity
        check paths
        ([#896](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/896))
    - add support for adding JAR files to `$CLASSPATH`
        ([#898](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/898))
    - enhanced and cleaned up unit tests
        ([#877](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/877),
        [#880](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/880),
        [#884](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/884),
        [#899](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/899),
        [#901](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/901))
    - code cleanup and refactoring
        - get rid of global variable for configuration settings in
            `config.py`, use singleton instead
            ([#874](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/874),
            [#888](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/888),
            [#890](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/890),
            [#892](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/892))
        - track build options via singleton in `config.py` rather than
            passing them around all over
            ([#886](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/886),
            [#889](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/889))
        - avoid parsing simpleconfig files multiple times by passing a
            parsed simpleconfig to the simpleblock
            ([#891](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/891))
        - deprecate list of tuples return type of `extra_options`
            static method
            ([#893](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/893),
            [#894](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/894))
        - move OS dependency check to `systemtools.py` module
            ([#895](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/895))
- bug fixes, including:
    - fix linking with `-lcudart` if CUDA is part of the toolchain,
        should also include `-lrt`
        ([#882](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/882))

**simpleblocks**

- various enhancements, including:
    - also run `Perl Build build` for Perl modules (usually not
        required, but sometimes it is)
        ([#380](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/380))
    - added glob support in generic makecp block
        ([#367](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/367),
        [#384](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/384))
    - enhance sanity check in GCC simpleblock such that it also
        passes/works on OpenSuSE

    - add multilib support in GCC simpleblock
        ([#379](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/379))
- various bug fixes:
    - Clang: disable sanitizer tests when vmem limit is set
        ([#366](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/366))
    - make sure all libraries are installed for recent Intel MKL
        versions
        ([#375](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/375))
    - fix appending Intel MPI include directories to `$CPATH`

    - fix simpleblock unit tests after changes in framework

        [#377](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/377),
        [#378](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/378))

- added additional simpleconfigs for various supported software

## SimpleBuild v1.11.0 (February 16th 2014)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - add checksum support for extensions
        ([#807](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/807))
    - make checksum functionality more memory efficient by reading in
        blocks
        ([#836](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/836))
    - rewrite of dependency solving for speed and better reporting of
        missing dependencies
        ([#806](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/806),
        [#818](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/818))
    - refactoring of `main.py`
        ([#815](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/815),
        [#828](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/828))
        - function/method signatures to pass down build options
        - move functions from main.py into simplebuild.framework.X or
            simplebuild.tools
    - provide better build statistics
        ([#824](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/824))
    - add --experimental, `--deprecated` and `--oldstyleconfig`
        command line options
        ([#838](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/838))
        - with `--experimental`, new but incomplete (or partially
            broken) features are enabled
        - with `--deprecated`, removed of deprecated functionality can
            be tested (anything deprecated will fail hard)
        - with `--disable-oldstyleconfig`, support for the old style
            configuration is disabled
    - define `$LIBRARY_PATH` in generated module files
        ([#832](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/832))
    - more constants for source URLs (e.g. for downloads from
        bitbucket)
        ([#831](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/831))
    - prefer `$XDG_CONFIG_HOME` and `~/.config/simplebuild` over
        `~/.simplebuild` for configuration files
        ([#820](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/820))
    - add support for specifying footers to be appended to generated
        module files
        ([#808](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/808))
        - see `--modules-footer` command line option
    - track version of modules tool + cleanup of `modules.py`
        ([#839](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/839))
    - move actual `run_cmd` and `run_cmd_qa` implementations from
        `tools.filetools` into `tools.run`
        ([#842](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/842),
        [#843](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/843))
    - add support for generating modules that support recursive
        unloading
        ([#830](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/830))
        - see `--recursive-module-unload` command line option
    - add flexibility support for specifying OS dependencies
        ([#846](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/846))
        - alternatives can be specified, e.g. (`openssl-devel`,
            `libssl-dev`)
    - initial (incomplete) support for simpleconfig files in new format
        (v2.0)
        ([#810](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/810),
        [#826](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/826),
        [#827](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/827),
        [#841](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/841))
        - requires `--experimental` to be able to experiment with
            format v2 simpleconfig files
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix problems with use of new-style configuration file
        ([#821](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/821))
    - fix removal of old build directories, unless `cleanupoldbuild`
        simpleconfig parameter is set
        ([#809](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/809))
    - fix support for different types of repository path
        specifications
        ([#814](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/814))
    - fix unit tests sensitive to `$MODULEPATH` and available
        simpleblocks
        ([#845](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/845))

**simpleblocks**

- added **one** new *generic* simpleblock:
    `VSCPythonPackage`
    ([#348](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/348))
- added support for **1** new software package that requires

        ([#613](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/613),
        [#615](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/615))
    - specify OS dependency for SSL support, with OpenSSL dependency
        as fallback
        ([#703](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/703))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix unit tests after (internal) framework API changes
        ([#667](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/667),
        [#672](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/672))
    - fix homepage in vsc-mympirun simpleconfig file
        ([#681](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/681))
    - align OpenMPI simpleconfigs
        ([#650](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/650))
    - add additional source URL in Qt simpleconfigs
        ([#676](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/676))
    - specify correct $PATH specification and define `$CHPL_HOME` for
        Chapel
        ([#683](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/683))

## SimpleBuild v1.10.0 (December 24th 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - set unique default temporary directory, add `--tmpdir` command
        line option
        ([#695](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/695))
    - add support for computing and verifying source/patch file
        checksums
        ([#774](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/774),
        [#777](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/777),
        [#779](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/779),
        [#801](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/801),
        [#802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/802))
        - cfr. `checksums` simpleconfig parameter
    - add support for *eb --confighelp*, which prints out
        an example configuration file
        ([#775](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/775))
    - add initial support for `eb` tab completion in bash shells
        ([#775](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/775),
        [#797](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/797),
        [#798](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/798))
        - see also
            <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/Setting-up-tab-completion-for-bash>
        - note: may be quite slow for now
    - enhancements for using Lmod as modules tool
        ([#780](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/780),
        [#795](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/795),
        [#796](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/796)):
        - ignore Lmod spider cache by setting `$LMOD_IGNORE_CACHE`
            (requires Lmod 5.2)
        - bump required Lmod version to v5.2
        - get rid of slow workaround for detecting module directories
            (only required for older Lmod versions)
        - fix version parsing for Lmod release candidates (rc)
        - improve integration with *lmod spider* by adding
            `Description:` prefix to `module-whatis` field of module
    - add `--dry-short-short`/`-D` and `--search-short`/`-S` command
        line options
        ([#781](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/781))
    - add toolchain definition for 'gompic', intended for using with
        CUDA-aware OpenMPI
        ([#783](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/783))
    - add support for specifying multiple robot paths
        ([#786](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/786))
    - add various source URL constants, add support for
        `%(nameletter)s` and `%(nameletterlower)s` templates
        ([#793](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/793))
    - add `buildininstalldir` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#794](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/794))
    - add `--ignore-osdeps` command line option
        ([#799](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/799),
        [#802](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/802))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - enable `-mt_mpi` compiler flag if both `usempi` and `openmp`
        toolchain options are enabled
        ([#771](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/771))
    - only use `libmkl_solver*` libraries for Intel MKL versions prior
        to 10.3
        ([#776](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/776))
    - fix toolchain support for recent Intel tools
        ([#785](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/785))
    - code style fixes in `main.py` to adhere more to PEP8
        ([#789](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/789))
    - make sure `simpleblock` simpleconfig parameter is listed in `eb -a`
        ([#791](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/791))
    - fix error that may pop up when using `skipsteps=source`
        ([#792](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/792))

**simpleblocks**

        ([#606](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/606))
        - change versionsuffix for non-MPI GROMACS simpleconfigs to
            `-mt`

            there's a dedicated GROMACS simpleblock, which correctly
            specifies building against external BLAS/LAPACK libraries
    - fix Qt dependency for CGAL
        ([#642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/642))

        paths in `guile-config`/`python-config` shebang
        ([#642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/642))
    - make sure HDF simpleconfigs specify dedicated `include/hdf`
        include dir
        ([#642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/642))
        - this is required to avoid build issues with NCL, because HDF
            ships it's own `netcdf.h`
        - this also triggered removal of patch files for NCL that
            rewrote `include/hdf` to `include`
    - fix WPS v3.5.1 patch file after upstream source tarball was
        changed, supply checksum for verification
        ([#642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/642))

## SimpleBuild v1.9.0 (November 17th 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- add support for Tcl environment modules (`modulecmd.tcl`)
    ([#728](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/728),
    [#729](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/729),
    [#739](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/739))
    - special care was taken to make sure also the DEISA variant of
        `modulecmd.tcl` can be used
- code refactoring to prepare for supporting two formats for
    simpleconfig files
    ([#693](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/693),
    [#750](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/750))
    - this prepares the codebase for supporting simpleconfig format v2.0
    - some initial work on adding support for the new simpleconfig
        format is included, but it's by no means complete yet
    - the current simpleconfig format (now dubbed v1.0) is still the
        default and only supported format, for now
    - for more details, see
        <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/Simpleconfig-format-two>
- various other enhancements, including:
    - include a full version of vsc-base (see the `vsc` subdirectory)
        ([#740](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/740))
        - this is a first step towards switching to using vsc-base as
            a proper dependency
    - implement get_avail_core_count function in systemtools module
        that takes cpusets and co into account
        ([#700](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/700))
        - the `get_core_count` function is now deprecated
    - add `impmkl` toolchain definition
        ([#736](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/736))
    - make regtest more robust: put holds on jobs without
        dependencies, release holds once all jobs are submitted
        ([#751](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/751))
    - add support for specifying multiple alternatives for sanity
        check paths
        ([#753](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/753))
    - add `get_software_libdir` function to modules.py (along with
        unit tests)
        ([#758](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/758))
    - add support for more file extensions and constants w.r.t.
        sources
        ([#738](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/738),
        [#760](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/760),
        [#761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/761))
    - add MPICH2 support in `mpi_cmd_for` function
        ([#761](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/761))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fix checking of OS dependencies on Debian/Ubuntu that have `rpm`
        command available
        ([#732](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/732))
    - make unit tests more robust w.r.t. non-writeable `/tmp` and
        loaded modules prior to starting unit tests
        ([#752](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/752),
        [#756](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/756))
    - also call `SimpleBlock`'s sanity check in `ExtensionSimpleblock` if
        paths/commands are specified in simpleconfig
        ([#757](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/757))
    - set compiler family for dummy compiler, add definition of
        toolchain constant for dummy
        ([#759](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/759))
- other
    - add build status badges for master/develop branches to `README`
        ([#742](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/742))
    - add scripts for installing SimpleBuild develop version or setting
        up git development environment
        ([#730](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/730),
        [#755](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/755))

**simpleblocks**

- added support for **8** new software packages that require
    customized support:
    - Allinea DDT/MAP
        ([#279](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/279)),

## SimpleBuild v1.8.0 (October 4th 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- add support for using alternative module naming schemes
    ([#679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/679),
    [#696](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/696),
    [#705](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/705),
    [#706](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/706),
    [#707](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/707))
    - see
        <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/Using-a-custom-module-naming-scheme>
        for documentation
    - module naming scheme classes that derive from the 'abstract'
        `ModuleNamingScheme` class can be provided to SimpleBuild
        - the Python module providing the class must be available in
            the `simplebuild.tools.module_naming_scheme` namespace
        - a function named `det_full_module_name` must be implemented,
            that determines the module name in the form of an string
            based on the supplied dictionary(-like) argument
    - the active module naming scheme is determined by SimpleBuild
        configuration option `--module-naming-scheme`
    - for now, only the `name`/`version`/`versionsuffix`/`toolchain`
        simpleconfig parameters are guaranteed to be provided
        - consistently providing all simpleconfig parameters (i.e., also
            for dependencies) requires more work (see
            [#687](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/687))
    - implementing this involved a number of intrusive changes:
        - the API of the modules.py module needed to be changed,
            breaking backward compatibility
            - the function for which the signatures were modified are
                considered to be internal to the framework, so this
                should have very minor impact w.r.t. simpleblocks not
                included with SimpleBuild
            - affected functions include: `available`, `exists`,
                `show`, `modulefile_path`, `dependencies_for`
        - the format for specifying dependencies was extended, to
            allow for specifying a custom toolchain
            - this allows to fix inaccurate dependency specifications,
                for example:
                `('OpenMPI', '1.6.4-GCC-4.7.2')" to "('OpenMPI', '1.6.4', '', ('GCC', '4.7.2'))`
            - see also
                [simpleconfigs#431](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/431)
        - the recommended version for Lmod was bumped to v5.1.5
            - using earlier 5.x version still works, but may be very
                slow when 'available' is used, due to bugs and a
                missing feature in Lmod versions prior to v5.1.5 on
                which we rely
- various other enhancements, including:
    - only (try to) change group id if it is different from what is
        wanted
        ([#685](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/685))
    - added toy build unit test
        ([#688](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/688))
    - support for specifying a list of source paths in SimpleBuild
        configuration
        ([#690](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/690),
        [#702](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/702))
    - add function to determine CPU clock speed in `systemtools.py`
        ([#694](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/694),
        [#699](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/699))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - avoid importing toolchain modules over and over again to make
        toolchain constants available in toolchain module
        ([#679](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/679))
    - only change the group id if current gid is different from what
        we want in `adjust_permissions` function
        ([#685](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/685))
    - restore original environment after running 'module purge'
        ([#698](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/698))
        - important sidenote: this results in resetting the entire
            environment, and has impact on the sanity check step;
        - any environment variables that are set before the
            SimpleBlock.sanity_check_step method fires, are no longer
            there when the sanity check commands are run (cfr.
            [simpleblocks#268](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/268))

**simpleblocks**

- added **one** new *generic* simpleblock: `BinariesTarball`
    ([#255](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/255))
- added support for **5** new software packages that require
    customized support:
    - DB
        ([#226](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/226)),
        FDTD Solutions
        ([#239](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/239)),
        FoldX
        ([#256](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/256)),
        Mathematica
        ([#240](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/240)),
        MUMPS
        ([#262](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/262))
- various enhancements, including:
    - support optionally running configure in generic `MakeCp`
        simpleblock
        ([#252](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/252))
    - enhanced Clang simpleblock to support building Clang 3.3
        ([#248](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/248))
    - add support for `$INTEL_LICENSE_FILE` specifying multiple paths
        ([#251](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/251))
    - enhanced ATLAS simpleblock to support building ATLAS 3.10.1
        ([#258](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/258))
- various bug fixes:
    - add zlib lib dir in link path dirs for WPS
        ([#249](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/249))
    - stop using deprecated `add_module` function in imkl simpleblock
        ([#250](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/250))
    - fixed PSI simpleblock w.r.t. support for building plugins
        ([#254](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/254),
        [#269](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/269))
    - move OS check for Clang to `check_readiness_step`, to allow a
        build job to be submitted from SL5
        ([#263](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/263),
        [#264](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/264))
    - enable verbose build for DOLFIN, to allow for proper debugging

        ([#265](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/265))
    - make sure `$LDFLAGS` and `$INSTANT_*_DIR` env vars are set for
        DOLFIN sanity check commands
        ([#268](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/268))
        - this is required after resetting the environment after
            running module purge (see framework release notes)
    - don't try to load module in LAPACK test-only build
        ([#264](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/264),
        [#266](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/266))

**simpleconfigs**

        ([#436](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/436)),
        DB

        FoldX
        ([#440](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/440),

- added additional simpleconfigs for goalf, gompi, ClangGCC, cgmvapich2,

## SimpleBuild v1.5.0 (June 1st 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- various enhancements, including:
    - define `SHLIB_EXT` constant for shared library extension (`.so`,
        `.dylib`), deprecate `shared_lib_ext` global var
        ([#630](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/630))
    - enhance support for sanity checking extensions
        ([#632](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/632),
        [#649](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/649))
    - add support for `modextrapaths` simpleconfig parameter
        ([#634](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/634),
        [#637](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/637))
    - allow `source_urls` to be templated for extensions
        ([#639](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/639),
        [#646](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/646),
        [#647](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/647))
    - set `OMPI_*` environment variables for OpenMPI
        ([#640](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/640))
    - make BLACS optional as toolchain element, depending on ScaLAPACK
        version
        ([#638](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/638))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fixed `--list-toolchains`, avoid listing toolchains multiple
        times
        ([#628](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/628))
    - fix templating dictionary after parsing simpleconfig file
        ([#633](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/633))
    - fix support for ACML as compiler toolchain element
        ([#632](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/632))
    - make unit tests clean up after themselves more thoroughly
        ([#641](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/641),
        [#642](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/642),
        [#643](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/643))
