## SimpleBuild v1.4.0 (May 2nd 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- the unit tests for simplebuild-framework were moved to test/framework,
    to make things consistent with simplebuild-simpleblocks and
    simplebuild-simpleconfigs
    ([#611](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/611),
    [#613](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/613),
    [#624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/624))
    - running the framework unit tests should now be using
        `python -m test.framework.suite`
- various other enhancements, including:
    - extend unit test suite
        ([#593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/593),
        [#599](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/599),
        [#603](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/603),
        [#618](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/618),
        [#620](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/620),
        [#622](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/622),
        [#624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/624),
        ...)
    - extended list of constants and templates that can be used in
        simpleconfig files
        ([#566](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/566))
    - add support for additional compiler toolchains
        - CUDA-enabled toolchain: `goolfc`
            ([#603](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/603),
            [#624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/624))
        - Clang(+GCC)-based toolchains: `cgoolf`, `cgmpolf`, `cgmvolf`
            ([#593](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/593),
            [#598](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/598),
            [#600](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/600))
        - gmvolf (GCC+MVAPICH2+...)
            ([#585](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/585))
    - properly decode simpleblock to module name using `decode_*`
        functions
        ([#618](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/618))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - fixed default value for `--stop`
        ([#601](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/601))
    - remove useless `sleep()` calls in `run_cmd`, `run_cmd_qa`
        ([#599](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/599))
    - determine module path based on class name, not software name
        ([#606](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/606))
    - remove unwanted characters in build dirs
        ([#591](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/591),
        [#607](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/607))
    - ignore some error codes spit out by modulecmd that are actually
        warnings
        ([#609](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/609))
    - fix `agithub.py` w.r.t. changes in GitHub API (user-agent string
        is now obligatory for non-authenticated connections)
        ([#617](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/617))
    - fix typo breaking the `adjust_cmd` decorator on SuSE
        ([#615](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/615))
    - fix prepending paths with absolute paths in module file
        ([#621](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/621))
    - clean up open file handles properly
        ([#620](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/620),
        [#624](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/624))
    - fix `--search` help and implementation
        ([#622](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/622))

**simpleblocks**

- added a unit test suite for simpleblocks
    ([#175](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/175),
    [#177](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/177),
    [#178](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/178))
    - every simpleblock is parsed and instantiated as a sanity check
- added **one** new *generic* simpleblock: `PerlModule`
    ([#183](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/183))
- added support for **8** new software packages that require
    customized support:
    - ABAQUS
        ([#179](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/179)),
        Bowtie
        ([#174](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/174),
        [#185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/185),
        [#186](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/186)),
        Clang
        ([#151](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/151)),
        DL_POLY Classic
        ([#118](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/118)),
        ESMF
        ([#171](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/171)),
        Perl
        ([#183](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/183)),

        ([#180](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/180))

## SimpleBuild v1.3.0 (April 1st 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- added script to bootstrap SimpleBuild with SimpleBuild, see
    <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/Bootstrapping-SimpleBuild>
    ([#531](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/531))
- reorganize framework/simpleconfig.py module into framework/simpleconfig
    package with modules
    ([#574](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/574),
    [#580](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/580))
- support SimpleBuild configuration via command line, environment
    variables and configuration files
    ([#529](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/529),
    [#552](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/552),
    [#556](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/556),
    [#558](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/558),
    [#559](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/559))
- various other enhancements, including:
    - extended set of unit tests for eb command line options and
        SimpleBuild configuration
        ([#517](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/517),
        [#556](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/556),
        [#559](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/559),
        [#571](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/571))
    - made `--search` also useful when simplebuild-simpleconfigs package
        is not installed
        ([#524](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/524))
    - extended set of default module classes
        ([#525](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/525))
    - add support for license simpleconfig parameter (which will be
        mandatory in v2.x)
        ([#526](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/526),
        [#569](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/569))
    - added `setup.cfg` for `setup.py` to allow creating RPMs
        ([#528](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/528))
    - added support for obtaining system information, see `get_os_*`
        functions in `simplebuild/tools/systemtools.py`
        ([#543](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/543),
        [#546](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/546),
        [#547](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/547))
    - added support for iterated builds that require cycling over
        multiple sets of configure/build/install options, e.g. FFTW
        ([#549](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/549))
    - added support for OpenBLAS as toolchain lib for linear algebra
        ([#537](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/537),
        [#565](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/565))
    - added support for tweaking prefix and separator for library
        toolchain variables (`LIB*`)
        ([#572](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/572),
        [#576](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/576))
    - skip already built modules in regression testing mode, to ease
        regression testing
        ([#582](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/582))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - added `zip_safe` flag to `setup.py`, to silence multitude of
        warnings
        ([#521](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/521))
    - only define `LIBFFT` for Intel MKL if FFTW interface libraries
        are available
        ([#518](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/518),
        [#567](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/567),
        [#579](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/579))
    - set POSIX group early in build process, make SimpleBuild aware of
        consistent chmod/chown failures
        ([#527](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/527))
    - properly order the name/version keys for the toolchain
        simpleconfig parameter when using `--try-toolchain`
        ([#563](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/563))
    - take the `skipsteps` simpleconfig parameter into account in
        regression testing mode as well
        ([#583](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-framework/pull/583))

**simpleblocks**

- added support for **2** new software packages that require
    customized support:
    - CUDA
        ([#145](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/145)),
        Ferret
        ([#160](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/160),
        [#163](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/163))
- remove `license` simpleconfig parameter from `IntelBase`, since it
    clashes with generic `license` parameter
    ([#153](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/153),
    [#158](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/158))
    - `license_file` should be used instead (see
        [framework#569](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/569/files))
    - using `license` instead of `license_file` will be supported
        until v2.x for legacy purposes
- various enhancements, including:
    - stop hardcoding Python site-packages library dir, obtain it via
        `distutils.sysconfig` instead
        ([#141](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/141),
        [#156](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/156),
        [#159](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/159),
        [#161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/161))
    - stop hardcoding list of libraries for BLAS libs, ask toolchain
        modules or use `$LIBBLAS` instead
        ([#150](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/150),
        [#155](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/155))
    - enhanced CP2K simpleblock, following Intel guidelines for `ictce`
        builds
        ([#138](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/138))
    - added `setup.cfg` for `setup.py` to allow creating RPMs
        ([#140](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/140))
    - clean up specifying BLAS/LAPACK libs for building numpy, check
        whether requires patch is being used for IMKL builds
        ([#155](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/155),
        [#161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/161))
- various bug fixes, including:
    - added `zip_safe` flag to `setup.py`, to silence multitude of
        warnings
        ([#135](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/135))
    - install SimpleBuild packages in reversed order to avoid funky
        setuptools issues
        ([#139](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/139))
    - fixed a typo in the ScaLAPACK simpleblock, and set CCFLAGS and
        FCFLAGS for v2.x
        ([#149](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/149),
        [#162](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/162))
    - fix sanity check for python-meep
        ([#159](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/159))
    - exclude Python tests from DOLFIN sanity check, since they hang
        sometimes
        ([#161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/161))
    - add support in ALADIN simpleblock for answering question on
        location of `libgrib_api.a`
        ([#165](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleblocks/pull/165))

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for **13** new software packages:
    - Bash, CUDA, ccache, Ferret, gzip, libxc, ns, numactl, OpenBLAS,
        otcl, Tar, tclcl, tcsh
    - several of these simpleconfig files were contributed by attendees
        of the SimpleBuild hackathon in Cyprus!
- added example simpleconfigs for goolf toolchain
    ([#158](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/158))
- added example simpleconfigs for builds with goolf toolchain, i.e. for
    all goalf simpleconfigs
    ([#189](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/189))
    - for several software packages, a patch file was needed to get
        them to build with GCC 4.7:
        - AMOS, BEAGLE, Cufflinks, DOLFIN, GATE, ns, Pasha, Trilinos,
            Trinity
    - for PETSc, a patch file was required to make it build with a
        toolchain that doesn't include BLACS
- added additional example simpleconfig files for:
    - gompi, hwloc, LAPACK, MVAPICH2, OpenMPI, ScaLAPACK
- various enhancements, including:
    - define a proper module class in *all* simpleconfigs,
        cfr. default module classes defined in framework
        ([#150](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/150),
        [#159](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/159),
        [#161](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/161),
        [#162](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/162),
        [#179](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/179),
        [#181](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/181))
    - extend FFTW simpleconfig to 'fat' builds that include single,
        double, long double and quad precision libraries in the same
        module
        - quad precision is disabled for Intel compiler based builds
            (it requires GCC v4.6+)
    - the imkl simpleconfigs used for the ictce 3.2.2.u3 toolchain now
        also enable FFTW interfaces
- various 'bug' fixes, including:
    - fix filename for Mercurial and ROOT simpleconfig files
    - fix homepage/description for Hypre
    - fix enabling OpenMP support in OpenMPI: use `--enable-openmp`,
        not `--with-openmp`
    - use correct configure flag for enabling OpenMPI threading
        support in v1.6
        ([#186](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/186))
        - `--enable-mpi-thread-multiple` instead of
            `--enable-mpi-threads`
    - explicitly add `--without-openib --without-udapl` configure
        options in OpenMPI simpleconfig using versionsuffix `-no-OFED`
        ([#168](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/168))
        - this avoids that OpenMPI auto-detects that it can enable
            Infiniband (OpenIB) support, which doesn't fit the -no-OFED
            versionsuffix
        - Note: this makes goalf-1.1.0-no-OFED effectively not
            suitable to produce software builds that are IB-capable!
    - remove explicit `--with-udapl` from OpenMPI simpleconfigs, does
        more harm than good
        ([#178](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/178))
    - remove libibvers, libibmad, libibumad as explicit dependencies
        for OpenMPI/MVAPICH2
        ([#173](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/173),
        [#182](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/182))
        - leave it up to the OS to provide these, since the required
            version is too much tied to the version of IB drivers
    - use `license_file` in Intel tools simpleconfigs, as opposed to the
        new generic `license` parameter with a different meaning
        ([#180](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/180))
    - modify patch for impi to avoid installation problems due to
        hardcoded path in /tmp
        ([#185](https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild-simpleconfigs/pull/185))
        - now uses `$USER-$RANDOM` subdir to avoid clashes between
            different users on the same system
    - the patch file for numpy was extended to also supporting ATLAS
        and other BLAS libraries spread across multiple directories
        - the extension for ATLAS is required because we now no longer
            rely on the automatic numpy mechanism to find the ATLAS libs
    - fixed dependencies:
        - libibumad as dependency for libibmad
        - ncurses as dependency for libreadline
        - ncurses and zlib as dependency for SAMtools (+ enhanced
            patch)
        - remove explicit FFTW dependency for Meep, ... since
            toolchain already provided FFTW

## SimpleBuild v1.2.0 (February 28th 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- new backend module for option parsing: generaloption
- support for using constants and string templates in simpleconfig files
    - currently disabled for `exts_filter` and `exts_list` simpleconfig
        parameters, for backward compatibility
- various other enhancements, including:
    - support for iqacml and iiqmpi toolchains (Intel compilers +
        QLogic MPI based)
    - clearer errors messages when sanity check failed
    - unit tests for (about half of) the `eb` command line options
    - support for specifying build/install steps to skip in simpleconfig
        file (`skipsteps`)
    - support for allowing certain dependencies to be resolved by the
        system instead of modules (`allow_system_deps`)
    - cache ppn value required by regtest, clean up temporary files
        let behind by `--regtest`/`--job`
    - make sure MPD is used as process manager for Intel MPI (required
        for impi v4.1 and later)
    - rename template names `name` and `version` used in exts_filter
        to `ext_name`, `ext_version`
        - `name` and `version` are still supported for legacy reasons
    - cleaned up module docstrings w.r.t. list of authors
- various bug fixes, including:
    - print correct (lowercase) toolchain names with
        `--list-toolchains`
    - correct simpleconfig parameter name `license_server_port`
    - fix string quoting in develop modules
    - ensure `modulecmd` is run with original `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` value
        - to avoid breaking `modulecmd`, see
            <https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=719785>
    - remove use of hardcoded files/dirs in unit tests
    - fix various inconsistencies w.r.t. paths considered with
        `--robot`
    - various cleanup and fixes w.r.t. logging
        - use correct logger instance in main script
        - stop passing logger instances around
        - make module logging variables private
    - get rid of `ModuleGenerator` deconstructor, clean up via
        `SimpleBlock.clean_up_fake_module`
    - fix disabling of `optarch` toolchain option (and extend unit
        tests to check on this)

**simpleblocks**

- added **one** new *generic* simpleblock: `Rpm`
- added support for **6** new software packages that require
    customized support:
    - SimpleBuild, EPD (Enthought Python Distribution), freetype,
        MATLAB, QLogic MPI (RPM), TotalView
    - support for installing SimpleBuild with SimpleBuild enables
        bootstrapping an SimpleBuild installation!
- various enhancements, including:
    - corrections in WRF/WPS to also enable building with iqacml
        toolchain
        - use `mpi_cmd_for` instead of hardcoding test commands, using
            correct Fortran compilers (F90)
    - fix NCL simpleblock to also support v6.1.x
        - use correct Fortran compiler (F90), set correct lib/include
            paths for dependencies (netCDF-Fortran, GDAL)
    - cleanup sweep of license headers and authors list in simpleblock
        module docstrings
    - use new `ext_name` template name in `exts_filter` in Python and
        R simpleblocks
- various bug fixes, including:
    - general code cleanup
        - don't set `sanityCheckOK` in `Toolchain` simpleblock
        - get rid of using `os.putenv`
    - NEURON simpleblock: don't hardcode number of processes used in
        test cases
    - make sure `simplebuild.simpleblocks.generic` namespace is extendable

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for **41** new software packages:
    - a2ps, AnalyzeFMRI, aria, bbcp, bbFTP, bbftpPRO, binutils,
        Bonnie++, ccache, cflow, cgdb, Corkscrew, SimpleBuild, Elinks,
        EPD, FLUENT, fmri, GDB, GDAL, gnuplot, gnutls, gperf, Iperf,
        lftp, libyaml, lzo, MATLAB, mc, nano, NASM, nettle, numexpr,
        parallel, pyTables, QLogic MPI, Stow, TotalView, Valgrind, VTK,
        Yasm, zsync
- added example simpleconfigs for iqacml and iiqmpi toolchains
- added additional example simpleconfig files for:
    - ABINIT, ABySS, ACML, BFAST, Bison, BLACS, Cython, cURL, Doxygen,
        FFTW, flex, g2clib, g2lib, GHC, h5py, HDF, HDF5, HMMER, JasPer,
        icc, ictce, ifort, imkl, impi, libpng, libreadline, M4,
        matplotlib, MCL, MEME, mpiBLAST, NCL, ncurses, netCDF,
        netCDF-Fortran, NWChem, R, ScaLAPACK, Tcl, Tk, WPS, WRF, zlib
- various enhancements, including:
    - fix version of xtable R library in list of extensions for R, to
        avoid installation failures
- various 'bug' fixes, including:
    - fix toolchain and file names for ABINIT simpleconfigs
    - fix sanity check paths for cURL
    - don't disable `optarch` for WRF, it's not needed (only disable
        heavy optimizations is required)
    - fix homepage/description for ALADIN

## SimpleBuild v1.1.0 (January 27th 2013)

feature + bugfix release

**framework**

- improvements w.r.t. support for software extensions (tested on
    Python and R, see simpleblocks package)
    - cleaned up support for building/installing extensions
    - define `ExtensionSimpleblock` class that implements support for
        installing extensions as stand-alone module as well
    - return to build dir before building/installing each extension
    - define `EBEXTSLIST<NAME>` environment variable in module if
        `exts_list` was defined
    - make sure sanity check for extensions results in an error if it
        fails
- various enhancements, including:
    - log both framework and simpleblocks versions
    - add support for `gimkl`, `gmacml`, `iccifort`, `iomkl` and
        `ismkl` toolchains
    - define `*_SEQ compiler` variables for sequential compilers
    - add `--list-toolchains` command line option for listing
        supported toolchains
    - add support for customizing software and modules install path
        suffixes
    - support both setuptools and distutils installation methods for
        finding installed simpleconfigs
    - also consider robot path in list of paths searched for patch
        files
    - allow skipping of default extension sanity check (by setting
        `modulename` to False in options)
- various bug fixes, including:
    - typos in toolchain Python modules w.r.t. `imkl` support,
        handling of `i8`/`optarch`/`unroll` options
    - purge before loading 'fake' module, unload 'fake' module
        before removing it, use original `$MODULEPATH`
    - restore environment after unloading fake module, set variables
        that were incorrectly unset, i.e., that were defined before as
        well
    - unset `$TMPDIR` for builds submitted as jobs (required by
        `IntelBase` simpleblock)
    - correctly track simpleconfig parse error
    - always run all jobs in regtest, also if dependency jobs failed
    - cosmetic adjustments to default SimpleBuild configuration file to
        avoid confusion between e.g. `build_dir` and `build_path` (only
        latter matters)
    - fix SuSe hack, only prefix command with sourcing of
        `/etc/profile.d/modules.sh` if it is there
    - leave build directory before it is removed during cleanup step
    - load generated module file before running test cases

**simpleblocks**

- added **3** new *generic* simpleblocks:
    `CMakePythonPackage`, `JAR`, `RPackage`
- added support for **23** new software packages that require
    customized support:
    - ACML, ALADIN, ant, Bioconductor (R packages), Chapel, Cufflinks,
        ESPResSo, FLUENT, Geant4, GHC, Java, NEURON, NWChem, PyZMQ,
        QuantumESPRESSO, R, Rmpi, ROOT, Rserve, SCOOP, Trinity,
        VSC-tools, XML
- various enhancements, including:
    - clean up of `python.py` simpleblock:
        - merge `EB_DefaultPythonPackage` and `PythonPackage`
            simpleblocks into generic *simpleblock*
            `PythonPackage`, which derives from `ExtensionSimpleblock`
        - move `EB_FortranPythonPackage` into dedicated
            *generic* `FortranPythonPackage` simpleblock
            module
        - split off support for building/installing `nose`, `numpy`,
            `scipy` into dedicated `EB_*` simpleblock modules, which
            allows them to be built as stand-alone modules as well
    - clean up testing of Python packages (`PythonPackage` simpleblock)
    - make sure there is no `site.cfg` in home dir when building
        Python packages, because e.g. `scipy` will pick it up
    - added support for building Intel MKL wrappers with OpenMPI
        toolchain
    - cleaning up of fake module that was loaded for running tests
    - move calls to functions that rely on environment up in the chain
        of steps (mostly for cleanup reasons)
    - use better module name for UFC sanity check, minor change to
        sanity check paths for UFC
- various bug fixes, including:
    - only call `make ptcheck` for ATLAS when multi-threading support
        is enabled
    - use a symbolic link for $HOME/intel instead of a randomly
        suffixed subdirectory in home and patching of Intel install
        scripts
        - latter does not work anymore with recent versions of Intel
            tools (2013.x)

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for **48** new software packages:
    - ABINIT, ABySS, ACML, ALADIN, ant, BFAST, BLAST, Chapel, CLHEP,
        Cufflinks, ESPRresSo, GATE, GHC, Geant4, Greenlet,
        google-sparsehash, grib_api, HMMER, Java, JUnit, libibmad,
        libibumad, libibverbs, MCL, MDP, MEME, mpiBLAST, NCBI Toolkit,
        NEURON, NWChem, numpy, MDP, Oger, OpenPGM, paycheck, PyZMQ,
        QuantumESPRESSO, R, ROOT, SCOOP, scipy, Tophat, Trinity,
        util-linux, VSC-tools, wiki2beamer, XML, ZeroMQ
- added example simpleconfigs for gmacml, gmvapich2, iccifort, ictce,
    iomkl toolchains
- added additional example simpleconfig files for:
    - ATLAS, BLACS, Boost, Bowtie2, bzip2, CP2K, Doxygen, FFTW, GCC,
        HDF5, hwloc, icc, ifort, imkl, impi, JasPer, Libint,
        libreadline, libsmm, libxml, ncurses, netCDF, M4, Meep,
        MVAPICH2, OpenMPI, Python, ScaLAPACK, Szip, zlib
- various enhancements, including:
    - major style cleanup of all example simpleconfig file (PEP008
        compliance)
    - added setuptools to list of Python extensions
    - get rid of `parallel` versionsuffix for HDF5, as its meaningless
        (MPI-enabled build is always parallel)
- various 'bug' fixes, i.e. added missing dependencies or replaced
    OS dependencies with proper dependencies

## SimpleBuild v1.0.2 (December 8th 2012)

bugfix release

**framework**

- properly catch failing sanity check commands
- fix bug in toolchain support which cause linking environment
    variables set by toolchain to include too many libraries
    - elements in toolchain variables were being passed by reference
        instead of by value
- fix selecting a compiler toolchain for a specified software package
    (`--software-name`) if only a template is a viable option
- fix passing command line parameters with `--job`
- fix list of valid stops (`-s`/`--stop`)
- fix minor issues in help messages (`-h`/`--help`)

**simpleblocks**

- fix typos in WIEN2k simpleblock (missing commas after list elements)

**simpleconfigs**

- fixed source URL for ligtextutils (toolchain refactoring error)

## SimpleBuild v1.0.1 (November 24th 2012)

bugfix release

**framework**

- fix support for installing with `distutils` (broken import in
    `setup.py`)
- fix support for ACML as a toolchain element
    (`toolchains/linalg/acml.py`)
- add name to aggregated regtest XML so that is parsed correctly by
    Jenkins
- reorder code in `main.py` so that regtest also works with incomplete
    simpleconfig paths
- add bash script for running regression test and sending a trigger to
    Jenkins to pull in the XML with results
- get rid of assumption that loaded modules should have name like
    `foo/bar`, make it more flexible
- retry failed builds in regtest twice to ignore fluke errors
- report leaf nodes in dependency graph when regtest is submitted
    - this is required for setting job dependencies in the regtest
        script for the Jenkins trigger job
- implement and use rmtree2 as more (NFS) robust replacement for
    `shutil.rmtree`
- bump max hit count for `run_cmd_qa` from 20 to 50, to make false
    positives of unasnwered questions less likely

**simpleblocks**

- fix support for installing with `distutils` (broken import in
    `setup.py`)
- only build GMP/CLooG/PPL libraries during GCC build in parallel,
    don't install in parallel
    - `make -j N install` doesn't work consistently for GMP
- fix GCC build on OS X
    - location of libraries is slightly different (`lib` vs `lib64`
        dir)
- add support to `ConfigureMake` simpleblock for pre-passing tar options
    to configure
    - see `tar_config_opts` simpleconfig parameter
    - workaround for issue with pax hanging `configure` with an
        interactive prompt
- enhance Q&A for WRF and WIEN2k by adding entries to `qa` dict and
    `no_qa` list
- use `rmtree2` from `tools/filetools.py` as more (NFS) robust
    replacement for `shutil.rmtree`

**simpleconfigs**

- remove patch file for OpenMPI to resolve issue with pax hanging
    configure
    - `tar_config_opts` should be enabled as needed
- disable parallel build for PAPI, seems to be causing problems

## SimpleBuild v1.0 (November 13th 2012)

- split up SimpleBuild across three repositories: framework, simpleblocks
    and simpleconfigs
- packaged SimpleBuild, different parts can now be installed easily
    using `simple_install`

**framework**

- various changes to both internal and external API:
    - renamed main script to main.py (from `build.py`)
    - file and directory organisation
    - module, class, function and function argument renaming and
        reorganisation
    - split up `Application` into `SimpleBlock` and `ConfigureMake` (see
        simplebuild-simpleblocks for the latter)
    - created `SimpleConfig` class for handling simpleconfig files
    - renaming of SimpleBuild configuration parameters (non-camelCase)
    - renaming of various simpleconfig parameters (non-camelCase)
    - rename `SOFTROOT` and `SOFTVERSION` environment variables set in
        generated module files to `EBROOT` and `EBVERSION`
    - use 'extension' as generic terminology for Python packages, R
        libraries, Perl modules, ...
- added support for building software packages in parallel via PBS
    jobs
- added unit testing framework and initial set of unit tests for basic
    functionality
    - and run them in Jenkins continuous integration service, see
        <https://jenkins1.ugent.be/view/SimpleBuild/>
- implement single-command regression test (e.g. to test building all
    supported software)
    - eb `--regtest` --robot
- switch to new style Python classes
- replaced `toolkit` module with `toolchain` package (total rewrite),
    providing modular support for toolchains
- adjust default SimpleBuild configuration to only use
    `$HOME/.local/simplebuild` by default
- added support for running SimpleBuild without supplying an simpleconfig
    file
    - make SimpleBuild search for a matching simpleconfig file
    - support automatic rewriting of an existing partially-matching
        simpleconfig file (use this with care!)
    - support for automatically generating an simpleconfig file
        according to given specifications (best effort!)
- add support for looking for simpleconfig file in Python search path if
    it can't be found on specified (relative) path (that way,
    simpleconfig files available in the simplebuild-simpleconfigs package can
    be used easily)
- various other enhancements and bug fixes, e.g.:
    - extended sanity check capabilities
    - cleaned up logging
    - creating of devel module which allows to mimic environment that
        was used by SimpleBuild to build the software
    - support for creating dependency graphs for a set of simpleconfig
        files
    - grouped options in help output and categorised available
        simpleconfig parameters
    - more consistent code style

**simpleblocks**

- implement class name encoding scheme, see wiki
    <https://github.com/simplebuilders/simplebuild/wiki/Encode-class-names>
    - (non-generic) simpleblock class names are now prefixed with `EB_`
        and non-alphanumeric characters are escaped
- split off generic simpleblocks into separate package
    `simpleblocks.generic`
- added custom support for **39** software packages:
    - Armadillo, BiSearch, Boost, Bowtie2, BWA, bzip2, CGAL, CPLEX,
        DOLFIN, Eigen, flex, FSL, Hypre, libxml2, MetaVelvet, METIS,
        MTL4, MUMmer, ncurses, OpenFOAM, OpenSSL, ParMETIS, Pasha,
        PETSc, Primer3, python-meep, SAMtools, SCOTCH, SHRiMP, SLEPc,
        SOAPdenovo, SuiteSparse, SWIG, Tornado, Trilinos, UFC, Velvet,
        WIEN2k, XCrySDen
- various enhancements and bug fixes to existing simpleblocks

**simpleconfigs**

- added example simpleconfig files for **106** new software packages:
    - AMOS, Armadillo, ASE, Autoconf, BiSearch, Boost, Bowtie2, BWA,
        byacc, bzip2, CGAL, ClustalW2, CMake, CPLEX, cURL, CVXOPT,
        Cython, Docutils, DOLFIN, ECore, Eigen, expat, FASTX-Toolkit,
        FFC, FIAT, freetype, FSL, GEOS, git, glproto, GMP, gmvapich2,
        gompi, GPAW, GSL, guile, h5py, h5utils, Harminv, hwloc, Hypre,
        Infernal, Instant, Jinja2, libctl, libdrm, libffi,
        libgtextutils, libmatheval, libpciaccess, libpthread-stubs,
        libreadline, libtool, libunistring, libxcb, libxml2, makedepend,
        matplotlib, Meep, Mercurial, Mesa, MetaVelvet, METIS, MPFR,
        MTL4, MUMmer, ncurses, OpenFOAM, OpenSSL, ORCA, PAPI, ParMETIS,
        Pasha, PCRE, PETSc, petsc4py, pkg-config, Primer3, python-meep,
        RNAz, SAMtools, ScientificPython, SCOTCH, setuptools, Shapely,
        SHRiMP, SLEPc, SOAPdenovo, Sphinx, SuiteSparse, SWIG, Tcl,
        Theano, Tk, Tornado, Trilinos, UFC, UFL, Velvet, ViennaRNA,
        Viper, WIEN2k, xcb-proto, XCrySDen, xorg-macros, xproto
- added additional example simpleconfig files (versions, builds) for
    several software packages
    - Bison, BLACS, Doxygen, flex, GCC, HDF5, icc, ifort, libpng, M4,
        MVAPICH2, OpenMPI, Szip, tbb, zlib
- replaced GCC/OpenMPI based simpleconfig files with equivalents using
    the *gompi* toolchain
    - ATLAS, BLACS, FFTW, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK

## SimpleBuild v0.8 (June 29th 2012)

- added support for building/installing 17 additional software
    packages:
    - BEAGLE, Doxygen, g2clib, g2lib, HDF, HDF5, JasPer, libpng,
        Maple, MrBayes, NCL, netCDF, netCDF-Fortran, Szip, WPS, WRF,
        zlib
- the build procedure for WRF and WPS includes running the tests
    available for these packages
- various bug fixes and enhancements:
    - made support for interactive installers (`run_cmd_qa`) more
        robust
    - fixed Python git package check
    - implemented toolkit functions for determine compiler family, MPI
        type, MPI run command, ...

## SimpleBuild v0.7 (June 18th 2012)

- fixed BLACS build
    - diagnostic tools to determine `INTERFACE` and `TRANSCOMM` values
        are now used
- added support for building Bison, CP2K, flex
    - with regression test enabled for CP2K as part of build process
    - note: BLACS built with SimpleBuild prior to v0.7 needs to be
        rebuilt for CP2K to work correctly
- added `--enable-mpi-threads` to OpenMPI example simpleconfigs
    - required for correct CP2K psmp build
- adjusted libsmm example simpleconfig for lower build time
    - to make the full regression test finish in a reasonable amount
        of time
- added script to make porting of simpleblocks from old to new SimpleBuild
    codebase easier
    - takes care of refactoring, checks for PyLint warnings/errors,
        ...
- fixed several small bugs
- prefixed SimpleBuild messages with `==`
- full regression test passed (58 simpleconfigs tested)

## SimpleBuild v0.6 (May 11th 2012)

- added support for Intel compiler toolkit (ictce)
    - which included the Intel compilers, Intel Math Kernel Library
        (imkl) and Intel MPI library (impi)
- added support for building Python with nose/numpy/scipy packages
- added simple regression test
- this version is able to build all supplied example simpleconfigs

## SimpleBuild v0.5 (April 6th 2012)

- first public release of SimpleBuild
    - after a thorough cleanup of the SimpleBuild framework of the
        in-house version
- supports building HPL with goalf compiler toolkit
    - the goalf toolkit consists of the GCC compilers, and the
        OpenMPI, ATLAS, LAPACK, FFTW and ScaLAPACK libraries
- also support build and installation of MVAPICH2
